{color:#ff5630}2nd  bannerline to be placed underneath 1st bannerline{color}

[~accountid:6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d] [~accountid:6389c29d77acd224b341d312] Additional question: Is it possible to make words bold? If so, can we format it like this:
*[Copy organisaties]*
Op *maandag 2 december* gaat het vernieuwde platform van Tadaah live. Wij zullen de belangrijkste informatie hierover in +het Nieuwscentrum+ plaatsen; houd deze dus de komende tijd in de gaten.
*Let op:* het platform zal vanaf 28.00 november 23.00 tot 2 december tijdelijk niet beschikbaar zijn i.v.m. het onderhoud. Probeer daarom zoveel mogelijk vooruit te plannen.
*[Copy freelancers]*
Op *maandag 2 december* gaat het vernieuwde platform van Tadaah live. Wij zullen de belangrijkste informatie hierover in +het Nieuwscentrum+ plaatsen; houd deze dus de komende tijd in de gaten.

*Let op*: het platform zal vanaf 28.00 november 23.00 tot 2 december tijdelijk niet beschikbaar zijn i.v.m. het onderhoud: *stuur daarom je facturen uiterlijk 28 november vóór 23.00.* Probeer verder zoveel mogelijk vooruit te plannen en diensten aan te nemen.

Solve issue >>VERIFIED AT = NULL<<,TDD-957,11570,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,30/Oct/24 10:41 AM,08/Nov/24 10:41 AM,,04/Nov/24 10:49 AM,,0,,,,"*ISSUE:* Status of issue with “Verified at date”, when freelancers verified & active without any “Verified at date” (critical for user migration process, because this parameter participate in decision about freelance migration)
Run Query: find freelancers where there’s no 'verified at' date filled in DJANGO
Solution: if  >>VERIFIED AT<< = NULL change to >>Registration_Date + 7 days <<

{color:#ff5630}*BUT this date should be earlier than the date of first accomplished job..*{color}",,ICT Tadaah,Tellache Imad,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@1229d33b,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Adviceteam] Reminders PRK linking to arrive prior to shift,TDD-948,11504,Bug,To Do,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,14/Oct/24 11:33 AM,08/Nov/24 11:54 AM,,,,0,,,,"Email: Subject: Notification Regarding Linking Person Register
Good morning,

Whenever I start working with a new organization through your platform, I receive an automated reminder in my inbox to link myself. This is obviously very useful, but the email always arrives at 3:00 PM, when I am already working at the respective organization.

I manage the linkages quite well myself, but I can imagine that many people would really benefit from this email. Perhaps you could send it a day before the service or, for example, early in the morning?
Best regards,

Tessa te Loo",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@6ed82411,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: Create all the AWS resources as part of CI/CD in cloudformation.yml file,TDD-933,11407,Story,blocked,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,Priti,712020:05742443-3f81-43d0-9037-b8826757f3f0,Priti,712020:05742443-3f81-43d0-9037-b8826757f3f0,01/Oct/24 2:04 PM,08/Nov/24 11:54 AM,,,,0,,,,,,Priti,,,,712020:05742443-3f81-43d0-9037-b8826757f3f0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@1810ff7d,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1
column2: hzzzwf:,,,,,,,,,,,,,,Expired/blocked tickets  1.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"01/Oct/24 2:05 PM;712020:05742443-3f81-43d0-9037-b8826757f3f0;To run a CloudFormation YAML file as part of your CI/CD pipeline in GitHub, you can leverage GitHub Actions. Here's a step-by-step guide on how to set it up:

column1: h3. 1. *Create an IAM Role/Policy for GitHub Actions*

Before running AWS CloudFormation commands, ensure GitHub has access to your AWS account. Create an IAM role or policy in AWS that grants GitHub permissions to manage CloudFormation resources. You'll need permissions like:
* {{cloudformation:CreateStack}}
* {{cloudformation:UpdateStack}}
* {{cloudformation:DeleteStack}}
* {{cloudformation:DescribeStacks}}
Attach the role to your GitHub repository using AWS credentials (more on this later).
h3. 2. *Set Up AWS Credentials in GitHub Secrets*
To securely store your AWS credentials in GitHub, follow these steps:
# Go to your GitHub repository.
# Click on *Settings* > *Secrets and variables* > *Actions* > *New repository secret*.
# Add two secrets:
#* {{AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID}}: Your AWS access key ID.
#* {{AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY}}: Your AWS secret access key.
h3. 3. *Create a GitHub Actions Workflow*
Next, you’ll create a GitHub Actions workflow that will execute the CloudFormation template whenever a change is pushed to your repository or a specific branch.
# In your repository, create a {{.github/workflows/deploy.yml}} file.
# Add the following configuration to the file to deploy your CloudFormation stack:
{noformat}name: Deploy CloudFormation Stack
on:
push:
branches:
- main  # You can change this to your desired branch
jobs:
deploy:
runs-on: ubuntu-latest
steps:
- name: Checkout code
uses: actions/checkout@v3
- name: Configure AWS credentials
uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v2
with:
aws-access-key-id: ${{ secrets.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID }}
aws-secret-access-key: ${{ secrets.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY }}
aws-region: us-east-1  # Set your desired AWS region
- name: Deploy CloudFormation Stack
run:
aws cloudformation deploy \
--template-file cloudformation.yml \  # Your CloudFormation YAML file path
--stack-name my-stack \  # Name of the CloudFormation stack
--capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM  # If your template uses IAM resources
{noformat}
h3. 4. *Explanation of Workflow*
* *Checkout code*: This step retrieves the code from your repository.
* *Configure AWS credentials*: This step uses the AWS credentials stored in GitHub Secrets to authenticate the AWS CLI.
* *Deploy CloudFormation Stack*: This runs the AWS CLI command {{aws cloudformation deploy}} to create or update your CloudFormation stack.
h3. 5. *Test the Workflow*
* Push changes to the branch (e.g., {{main}}) to trigger the workflow.
* Go to *Actions* in your GitHub repository to monitor the execution of the pipeline.
h3. 6. *Handling Updates and Rollbacks*
* If you need to update the stack, simply modify the CloudFormation template and push the changes. The pipeline will update the stack automatically.
* You can also configure rollback policies in the template or handle failures via the {{aws cloudformation deploy}} command.
h3. Example for S3 and Lambda Notification
If your {{cloudformation.yml}} contains S3 bucket creation and Lambda functions (for example), the pipeline will deploy the stack, configure the resources, and handle the necessary permissions.
h3. Summary

By following these steps, you can fully automate your AWS CloudFormation deployments using GitHub Actions as part of your CI/CD pipeline. This approach enables easy deployment, updates, and management of AWS infrastructure from your GitHub repository.",,,,,,,,,,,,11004,FreelancePlaza roadmap,In Progress,08/Nov/24 11:51 AM

[WEB/ORG] Actual worked hours to be visualised when planned hours are changed,TDD-916,11207,Bug,To Do,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,05/Sep/24 2:45 PM,08/Nov/24 11:54 AM,,,,0,not-refined,,,"*Goal*: is to visualize that the posted hours are different than the hours that will be invoiced

the only thing we need is to make sure the hours are also changed in the weekplanner. When organisations adjust hours its not communicated in the weekplanner, the adjusted/corrected hours are not visualised.

The planner shows the jobad as posted, however, there is confusion when the hours are adjusted. The actual started and worked hours are nowhere to be seen in ther planner, I do see it in the archive but that is not clear/visible enough (when you have that many jobs/invoices)",,ICT,,,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,05/Sep/24 2:47 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermafbeelding 2024-09-05 om 14.17.20.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10563,05/Sep/24 2:47 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermafbeelding 2024-09-05 om 14.36.50.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10562,05/Sep/24 2:49 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermopname 2024-09-05 om 14.10.40.mov;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10566,05/Sep/24 2:49 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermopname 2024-09-05 om 14.11.58.mov;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10565,05/Sep/24 2:48 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermopname 2024-09-05 om 14.15.54.mov;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10564,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@69d2a,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Remove current text:
{noformat}Je BSN nummer wordt alleen gebruikt voor de koppeling in het personenregister, alleen door opdrachtgevers waarmee wij een speciale verwerkingsovereenkomst hebben.
Het BSN nummer wordt enkel doorgegeven aan opdrachtgevers waarmee een specialeovereenkomst is getekend, deze opdrachtgevers gebruiken het BSN nummer voor koppeling in het personenregister.
{noformat}
*Replace by New text:*

{noformat}Je BSN nummer in combinatie met je geboortedatum worden alleen gebruikt voor de koppeling in het Personenregister kinderopvang (PRK). Deze gegevens worden alleen doorgegeven aan opdrachtgevers waarmee een Verwerkersovereenkomst is getekend. Daarin verklaren zij zich te houden aan de AVG richtlijnen.{noformat}",,ICT,,,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@6a59b65a,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[APP/WEB] Move Name/Surname to account creation page for migration to AUTHo1,TDD-885,10988,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Dharmesh Bhalala,6389c29d77acd224b341d312,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,10/Jul/24 1:17 PM,07/Oct/24 9:46 AM,,07/Oct/24 9:46 AM,,0,,,,"Migration is dealing with the fact that we have  141 afm freelancers with no name & surname in Django

We don't want this number to grow and we want to be able to address these accountholders/users with their name and surname if we ever want to approach them. Therefore my suggestion is to move the field: “name” and Surname” to the account creation page.

We don't want this number to grow and we want to be able to address these accountholders/users with their name and surname if we ever want to approach them. Therefore my suggestion is to move the field: “name” and Surname” to the account creation page so we will have these details in Django.

NB Name and Surname is required for account creation in Autho1  and therefore for 2.0 its mandatory",,ICT,,,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,10/Jul/24 1:29 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermafbeelding 2024-07-10 om 13.28.46.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10520,10/Jul/24 1:29 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermafbeelding 2024-07-10 om 13.29.03.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10521,10/Jul/24 1:29 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;image-20240710-111739.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10522,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@16e714a1,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[DJANGO] Data request Sales/Marketing,TDD-881,10984,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,10/Jul/24 8:55 AM,16/Jul/24 11:07 AM,,15/Jul/24 10:34 AM,,0,,,,"The Sales/Marketing team have come up with new ideas to increase revenue by approaching existing organisations: those are non active/giving less revenue
*Their definition of non-active is: not placing jobad for the last 3 months*
However, to get a full overview they would like the numbers of placed jobads over ‘lifetime’, actual numbers on organisational level thereafter on locational level (per location).

They require contactdetails to approach the right person/function at the organisation. We dont have the certainty of providing that to them because we don’t actually who is the superuser/planner in each organisation.
Data regarding contactdetails (general/HR/Director/Finance): *emailadresses/phone number* to be found at: [https://platform.tadaah.nl/admin/register/organisation/175/change/
Data regarding name_contactdetails (admins): [https://platform.tadaah.nl/admin/auth/user/?groups__id__exact=4
Data regarding Jobads: [https://platform.tadaah.nl/admin/register/jobad/
*Criteria: to provide following data:*
Organisation
Organisation address info
Organisation Telephonenumber (general)
Emailaddress (HR)
Phonenumber (HR)
Emailaddress (Finance)
Phonenumber (Finance)
Emailaddress (Director)
Phonenumber (Director)
Admin (users)  Emailaddresses
Admin (user) Name
Admin (user) Surname
Phonenumbers (admin users)
Total # placed jobads (on organisational level)
Locations
Address (location)
Telephonnumber (location)
Jobads on location	level
Last completed jobad
Last placed ( not completed jobad )
Online link : [https://tadaahbv229-my.sharepoint.com/:x:/r/personal/gulhan_tadaah_nl/Documents/Hans%20van%20der%20Klok.xlsx?d=w7d7246ff65c44deb8b12c286a28fbbc6&csf=1&web=1&e=IKL3zv

[~accountid:6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302] To contact what the exact purpose is of the data request in terms of future synchronisation",,ICT,,,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,10/Jul/24 9:14 AM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Hans van der Klok-1.xlsx;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10517,10/Jul/24 9:15 AM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermopname 2024-07-10 om 09.08.58.mov;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10518,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@eef13a2,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column2: hzzzsl:,,,,,,,,,,,,,,Expired/blocked tickets  1.0,,,,,,,,,,,,3.0,,,,,,,,2024-07-29 07:51:54.425,,"29/Jul/24 9:51 AM;6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d;[~accountid:637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3]  I am debugging this issue now, I noticed that the reason of “None” in the contract is that the organization doesn’t have hq address, hq postal code and hq city filled correctly. the location placeholder can take either a location 'if provided from the frontend” or the organization hq address as default values.","29/Jul/24 9:52 AM;6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d;I think in this edge case, we can just keep it blank rather than ‘None’",,,,,,,,,,,10094,Fast-Track / High Urgency,In Progress,29/Jul/24 8:53 AM

[WEB ORG Frontend]: changes to content writing on: https://platform.tadaah.nl/organisation/jobs/place/,TDD-878,10981,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,02/Jul/24 3:46 PM,12/Jul/24 12:39 PM,,03/Jul/24 9:23 AM,,0,not-refined,Web-Frontend,,"change text on URL: [https://platform.tadaah.nl/organisation/jobs/place/
Current text:

{quote}Dit is een dienst waarbij een organisatie een freelance pedagogisch medewerker inhuurt om de werkzaamheden van een vaste medewerker over te nemen gedurende een bepaalde periode. Dit kan bijvoorbeeld nodig zijn bij zwangerschapsverlof, langdurige ziekte, sabbatical of een tijdelijk project.{quote}

{noformat}Dit is een dienst waarbij een organisatie een pedagogisch medewerker inhuurt gedurende een bepaalde korte periode. Dit kan bijvoorbeeld nodig zijn bij zwangerschapsverlof, langdurige ziekte, sabbatical of een tijdelijk project.{noformat}",,ICT,,,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,02/Jul/24 3:47 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermafbeelding 2024-07-01 om 14.39.26.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10508,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@d16f938,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

WEB [ORG] [Frontend]: Changes to content writing on: https://platform.tadaah.nl/organisation/period_jobs/,TDD-877,10980,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,02/Jul/24 3:08 PM,12/Jul/24 12:39 PM,,03/Jul/24 9:23 AM,,0,Web-Frontend,,,"Current text [https://platform.tadaah.nl/organisation/period_jobs/
{quote}{color:#bf2600}“TOELICHTING{color}

{color:#bf2600}Lange opdrachten zijn bedoeld als hulpmiddel om een invaller te vinden voor een langere periode, bijvoorbeeld bij een onvervulde vacature of een zwangerschap. Door een lange opdracht te plaatsen kun je makkelijk een vast gezicht vinden.{color}
# {color:#bf2600}Dienst plaatsen Je voert de details van de dienst in, de locatie en voor welke periode.{color}
# {color:#bf2600}Kandidaten zoeken De freelancers zien de dienst en kunnen interesse tonen.{color}
# {color:#bf2600}Toewijzen. Wijs een kandidaat toe aan de diensten.{color}
{color:#bf2600}Tip Zodra er genoeg kandidaten zijn, kun je de inschrijving sluiten.TOELICHTING{color}
{quote}
Correct text to be:
{noformat}TOELICHTING
Lange opdrachten zijn bedoeld als hulpmiddel om een invaller te vinden voor een langere periode, bijvoorbeeld een zwangerschap.
1. Dienst plaatsen. Je voert de details van de dienst in, de locatie en voor welke periode.
2. Kandidaten zoeken. De freelancers zien de dienst en kunnen interesse tonen.
3. Toewijzen. Wijs een kandidaat toe aan de diensten.
Tip Zodra er genoeg kandidaten zijn, kun je de inschrijving sluiten.{noformat}
Please also at “bold” styling to the text:
Text should look like below:
{quote}TOELICHTING
Lange opdrachten zijn bedoeld als hulpmiddel om een invaller te vinden voor een langere periode, bijvoorbeeld een zwangerschap.
# *Dienst plaatsen.* Je voert de details van de dienst in, de locatie en voor welke periode.
# *Kandidaten zoeken.* De freelancers zien de dienst en kunnen interesse tonen.
# *Toewijzen.* Wijs een kandidaat toe aan de diensten.

column1: [ORG] [WEB] 3rd Warning- warning flow - notification, Implications up until blacklisting,TDD-876,10979,Story,To Do,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,24/Jun/24 1:25 PM,08/Nov/24 11:53 AM,,,,0,,,,"h3. *Business Need:* Send correct “No show /late cancellation notification email and implement actions from platform if needed when freelancer gets a warning for late cancellation or no show within given period
[https://tadaah.atlassian.net/wiki/x/AYB6Bw
h3. *STAFF*
h3. *UX NO show Warning Flow :*
* Tile No show/Late cancellation shows details of “remarkable” no shows of freelancers over a period of 2 weeks
* Current URL [https://platform.tadaah.nl/staff/stats/sickness/
* Staff determines whether the freelancer should get a warning depending on valid reason for frequent late cancellations or a ‘no show’ within that period
* Freelancer receives a notification mail when she has a late cancellation or no show based on current platform policy.
* When staff decided to send a notification mail, the button warning is clicked and a preview of the notification email is shown to the staff member
* Each warning notification email is different, according to which number of warning, in content: i.e. 1st warning, 2nd warning and final warning
* When freelancer receives a warning, the date of warning is logged on the freelancer’s profile together with the staff member.
* The no show warning is also to be found in Django: “ [https://platform.tadaah.nl/admin/register/noshowwarning/
h3. *Implications  of the third warning sent to freelancer:*
h3. *What happens, access, limitations for freelancer and his her existing jobads including existing invoices and history:*
Repeating implications of 1st and 2nd warning for informational purposes:
*Consequences of 1st and 2nd warning for the freelancer*
h4. *#1 warning is sent:*
{noformat}{noformat}
* freelancer is set on *“not available” for 24 hours*
* Cannot accept any new shifts but can proceed with all other activities in the platform.
* Can see already accepted shifts, interest jobs etc..
* after *24 hours* the freelancer can use platform as normal
* If freelancers tries to check new shifts within the “punishment period of 24 hours” the freelancer sees message:
{noformat}Momenteel kun je geen nieuwe diensten aannemen omdat je profiel 24 uur is geblokkeerd.
De reden hiervoor is dat je te vaak hebt afgemeld of niet op bent komen dagen voor een dienst. {noformat}
h4. *#2 warning is sent:*
* Freelancer is set on *“not available” for 48 hours,*
* Cannot accept any new shifts but can proceed with all other activities in the platform..
* Can see already accepted shifts, interest jobs etc..
* After *48 hours* the freelancer can use platform as normal.
* If freelancers tries to check new shifts within the “punishment period of 48 hours” the freelancer sees message:
{noformat}Momenteel kun je geen nieuwe diensten aannemen omdat je profiel 48 uur is geblokkeerd.
De reden hiervoor is dat je te vaak hebt afgemeld of niet op bent komen dagen voor een dienst. {noformat}
This ticket deals only with :
h4. *#3 warning is sent:*
* Freelancer receives #3 notification mail content
* Freelancer is set on *“not available”* until further notice. - {color:#ff991f}TBD what status to use and if this will done manually or by system{color}
* Freelancer can see completed shifts, interest jobs
* Freelancer *cannot* see new shift,
* *cannot* show interest in new shifts.
* Freelancer is allowed to send invoices for a period of 30 days from the date of the 3rd and final warning.
* Freelancer has 30 days access to exisiting contracts and sent invoices
* After 30 days freelancer is moved to blacklisting list.
* If freelancers tries to check new shifts within the 3rd warning is given “blacklisting pending” the freelancer sees message:
{noformat}Je kunt geen nieuwe diensten zien omdat je profiel definitief is geblokkeerd.
Vanaf {{date_blacklisting}} heb je geen toegang meer tot je profielgegevens.{noformat}

* Future planned jobads are cancelled (Organizations receive a notification ""cancelled services"", {color:#bf2600}new!{color} {color:#bf2600}notification of cancellation due to blocked user”{color} -*find below*
{noformat}Beste {{ user.get_full_name }},
Helaas hebben wij alle opdrachten die ingepland stonden van onderstaande freelancer moeten annuleren:
Freelancer: {{ freelancer_name }}
Voor meer informatie hierover kunt u ons mailen.
Met vriendelijke groet,
Tadaah
info@tadaah.nl
{noformat}
*Acceptance Criteria*
* Error message when freelancer tries to find new shift when 3rd and final warning has been given
*Notification email Warning #3*
{noformat}Beste {{ user.get_full_name }},
Tot onze spijt moeten wij onze samenwerking beëindigen. Wij streven ernaar het platform te zijn en blijven voor freelancers en organisaties om
flexibel te werken in de kinderopvang. Helaas heb je de afgelopen periode {{ n_worked }} diensten gewerkt en je {{ n_sick_days }} keer afgemeld zonder geldige reden.
Dit is de derde keer dat je niet bent komen opdagen en/of je te laat hebt afgemeld.
De eerste melding was op {{date _#1warning}}.
De tweede melding was op {{date _#2warning}}.
Dit gedrag past niet binnen ons platform.
Wat betekent dit voor jou?
- Je profiel wordt inactief gesteld: Je kunt niet reageren op nieuwe oproepen of diensten aannemen.
- Annulering van geplande diensten: Alle reeds ingeplande diensten worden geannuleerd. Organisaties worden middels een email
op de hoogte gesteld van de annulering van deze diensten.
- Intrekking van interesses: Eventuele interesse die je hebt getoond in diensten wordt ingetrokken.
- Facturatie: Je hebt de komende 30 dagen de tijd om je facturen te versturen en reeds verstuurde facturen te downloaden.
Na 30 dagen, {{date_start_blacklisting}} wordt persoonlijke informatie in je profiel geanonimiseerd of verwijderd
in overeenstemming met de AVG-regels.
Ben je het niet eens met deze beslissing? Neem dan contact op met ons adviesteam via e-mail.
Met vriendelijke groet,
Tadaah{noformat}

After 3rd and final warning the future planned jobads are cancelled (Organizations receive a notification ""cancelled services"", {color:#bf2600}new!{color}  {color:#bf2600}notification of cancellation due to blocked user”{color} -*find below*
{noformat}Beste {{ user.get_full_name }},
Helaas hebben wij alle opdrachten die ingepland stonden van onderstaande freelancer moeten annuleren:
Freelancer: {{ freelancer_name }}
Voor meer informatie hierover kunt u ons mailen.
Met vriendelijke groet,
Tadaah
info@tadaah.nl

*Notification emails Warning #1*
{noformat}Beste {{ user.get_full_name }},
Samen werken we aan een betrouwbaar platform. Wij willen voor freelancers en organisaties het platform zijn en blijven om flexibel te werken in de kinderopvang.

Niet op komen dagen en/of je te laat afmelden past niet binnen ons platform. Afgelopen periode heb jij {{ n_worked }} diensten gewerkt en je hebt je {{ n_sick_days }} keer afgemeld zonder geldige reden.
Wat gaat er nu gebeuren?

De komende 24 uur sta jij op niet-beschikbaar en kun je geen diensten aannemen. Over 24 uur plaatsen we jouw profiel weer op actief.  Meld je je in de komende periode weer te laat af zonder geldige reden

of kom je niet opdagen voor een aangenomen dienst? Dan ontvang je een tweede melding op jouw profiel. Op dat moment staat jouw profiel 48 uur op non-actief. Bij drie meldingen op jouw profiel wordt de
toegang tot het platform ontzegd en kun je niet meer werken via Tadaah.
Voorkom dit soort waarschuwingen door je op tijd af te melden of door vervanging te regelen.
Ben je het niet eens met bovenstaande melding? Stuur dan een mail naar het adviesteam.
Met vriendelijke groet,
Tadaah{noformat}

[WEB/APP][FREELANCER] Replacement flow via platform needs adjusting,TDD-868,10969,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,11/Jun/24 12:02 PM,27/Aug/24 11:14 AM,,25/Jul/24 11:22 AM,,0,,,,"Change text to :
{noformat}Vervanging (gewijzigd per juni 2024)

Als opdrachtnemer laat ik mezelf voor deze opdracht vervangen conform artikel 4 van de opdrachtovereenkomst. De vervanging zal ik registreren met behulp van de modelvervangingsovereenkomst en voldoen aan alle daarin opgenomen voorwaarden. Als opdrachtnemer blijf ik verantwoordelijk voor de uitvoering en financiële afhandeling van deze overeenkomst. Ik breng de betreffende organisatie op de hoogte van deze vervanging, zodat de vervangende freelancer bekend is bij de organisatie en de registratie in het Personenregister kan plaatsvinden voorafgaand aan de aanvang van de dienst {noformat}
When clicked on “vervangen”,  url should open in new tabnstead of leaving platform

Txt content styled and Attached in Word: ",,ICT,Tellache Imad,,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,11/Jun/24 12:03 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermopname 2024-06-11 om 12.00.05.mov;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10503,04/Jul/24 1:58 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Text plus hovertext for the modal for replacement.docx;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10509,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@5d354adb,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2024-07-05T19:42:11.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[WEB/APP] [Freelancer] Change text freelancer settting "VAT-number" to be replaced by BTW ID-nummer,TDD-857,10954,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,21/May/24 3:19 PM,03/Jul/24 9:24 AM,,03/Jul/24 9:24 AM,,0,,,,"Story (both web/APP)
We have BTW-nummer “VAT-number” as a required field in both
* freelancer company profile page
* freelancer invoices pdf
* freelancer invoices xml
Hoever, the official term to be used, stated by the tax office/ by the government, is:
{noformat}BTW-ID nummer{noformat}
Because the composition of the number has changed..
*What is a VAT identification number (VAT ID)?*

You use your VAT identification (VAT ID) for all your contacts with customers and suppliers. This shows that you are a VAT-registered entrepreneur. For example, you put your VAT ID on your stationery, invoices and website.
Your VAT ID looks like this:
* country code NL
* 9 digits
* letter B
* 2 digits, also called 'subnumber'
An example of a VAT ID: NL123456789B01
*Acceptance Criteria:*
* Change text in WEB:  “BTW-nummer” to
{noformat}BTW-ID nummer{noformat}
* Change text in APP (ios & Android):  BTW-nummer” to
{noformat}BTW-ID nummer{noformat}
* change data base field
* Check consequences of this change for migration.

* Check/change api endpoint.",,ICT,Tellache Imad,,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,21/May/24 3:20 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermafbeelding 2024-05-21 om 15.20.23.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10496,28/May/24 10:39 AM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermafbeelding 2024-05-28 om 10.37.55.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10500,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@56fd530e,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2024-06-11T08:45:25.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: [Freelancer] Rounding up issues in invoicing user Broza- jobad 954311,TDD-853,10950,Story,To Do,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,14/May/24 10:50 AM,08/Nov/24 11:54 AM,,,,0,,,,"*Update: Another freelancer with same issue: Jobadd 995838 freelancer: Meryam El Bousklati, invoice attached (missing 1 minute  in respect to what is stated in jobad)*
Dear,
I noticed today that there are occasional errors in the invoicing calculations.
Often, rounding is not done correctly.

For example: When I have worked somewhere for 8 hours and 20 minutes at a rate of EUR 34.50 per hour, Tadaah calculates the following: 8.33 x 34.50, resulting in 287.385. On the Tadaah invoice, 287.38 is filled in, however, that is not the correct rounding. The digit after the 8 is 5 or higher, so the 8 should be rounded up to 9.

Therefore, it should be EUR 287.39. Moreover, upon closer inspection, the calculation of 8.33 x 34.50 is already incorrect. If I work 8 hours and 20 minutes (out of 60), the calculation should be as follows: (8 + (20/60)) x 34.50 *8.33333333* x 34.50 = EUR 287.50 Currently, everyone is undercharged by 12 cents whenever a situation like this occurs.
Acceptance Criteria:
* Don’t round up hours until hours x rate is multiplied and calculated on invoice, not 8,33 but 8,333333334
*  same rounding up logic for mediation fee, xml invoice *discuss consequences prior to changing*
* pls check why Jobad [954311
column2: https://platform.tadaah.nl/admin/register/jobad/954311/change/?_changelist_filters=q%3D2024-04-26%2Broza] - 26 april 2024 as seen on invoice also shows a mistake in calculating the hour. 8 hr and 19 minutes instead of 8 hrs and 20 minutes. Its unclear why..

*As a valued DocuSign customer, your success is of utmost importance to us.*
With that in mind, I wanted to schedule a *brief Zoom meeting* with you to +align with your goals+, and +explore opportunities+ for growth together.
Here are some of the *solutions our customers are implementing* as part of their *2024/25 Roadmap*:

column2: https://click.docusign.] - Make your business faster, simpler and more cost-efficient with electronic agreements.

column1: # [Document Generation

column1: # [Multi-Channel Delivery

column1: # [IDV Verification

column1: # [Intelligent Repository

column1: If you let me know your *availability* I would be happy to schedule a meeting at the date and time that best suits you.
I look forward to the opportunity to collaborate more closely and drive your business forward.
Many thanks,
Dean
Dean Higgins

[WEB/APP] [Freelancer] Initial contract not to be overwritten in case of replacement. ,TDD-839,10936,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,01/May/24 10:03 AM,05/Jun/24 11:26 AM,,05/Jun/24 11:26 AM,,0,,,,"*Current replacement flow:*
Freelancers who choose to be replaced for a jobad they have accepted in the first place now  have the option to find replacement via a link that they can share via whatsapp, see screenshot.

If a 'suitable/available/qualified enough freelancer takes the replacement then the name of this freelancer is overwritten in the contract. Meaning Freelancer A, initial acceptant, is not mentioned anymore on the contract but freelancer B, the “replacing” freelancer is stated on the contract. In the definition of “replacement” in a legal sense this is not entirely how we should register the change of freelancer. The name of the initial freelancer should always be part of the contract.

We have however decided , not to go this far with the development as there aren’t actually many instances of replacements between jobads. Therefore we choose a more definitive, clear solution/approach which will decrease liability for Tadaah as a party facilitating replacement not inline with legislation, which wil always be a grey area..
Solution options to be evaluated:
* allow the freelancer to share the jobad details via a whatsapp link
* Dont allow to accept the replacement via the whatsapp link
* In case “a replacement is found” direct the freelancer A and B to the replacement contract
* Replacement should to link to: [https://www.tadaah.nl/vervanging/

column1: Hi [~accountid:6389c29d77acd224b341d312] [~accountid:6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d] I corrected the message:

Als opdrachtnemer laat ik mezelf voor deze opdracht vervangen conform artikel 4 van de opdrachtovereenkomst. De vervanging zal ik registreren met behulp van de model vervangingsovereenkomst op [http://www.tadaah.nl/vervanging
column3: smart-link]  en voldoen aan alle daarin opgenomen voorwaarden. Als opdrachtnemer blijf ik verantwoordelijk voor de uitvoering en financiële afhandeling van deze overeenkomst. Ik breng de betreffende organisatie op de hoogte van deze vervanging, zodat de vervangende freelancer bekend is bij de organisatie en de registratie in het Personenregister kan plaatsvinden voorafgaand aan de aanvang van de dienst.""",,,,,,,,,,,,,,Done,05/Jun/24 11:26 AM

Reason: this sentence implicates that all organisations are of a certain business structure i.e. “limited company” but there are also “stichting” organisations, funded by the government , non-commercial and non-profit.

[ORGANISATION] Ludens: Request of additional fields on XML of freelancer invoices,TDD-820,10912,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,10/Apr/24 8:00 AM,08/Nov/24 11:54 AM,,08/Nov/24 11:50 AM,,0,,,,"Ludens our largest client has asked for help to process the xml invoices of the freelancers. They have indicated that it would be helpful and timesaving if we could add total # worked hours and also explain in which period/month year the jobads took place.  Therefore I suggest the following the following:
*Acceptance Criteria*
(Regarding freelancer invoices in Django):
* add new xml data field to show total number of  worked hours.
* “periode” to show: “maand/jaar:” month/year, example
{noformat} month 04/2024 {noformat}
* Add start-end week underneath periode to give exact dates: for example:
{noformat} 15 april -21 april {noformat}
* Correct sentence “verval datum” - corresponds the date to when the invoice has to be paidto

{noformat}“vervaldatum”{noformat}",,ICT,Priti,Tellache Imad,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,712020:05742443-3f81-43d0-9037-b8826757f3f0,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-882,,,,,,,,16/Apr/24 12:22 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Document2.pdf;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10459,11/Apr/24 11:58 AM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;image004.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10458,14/Jul/24 1:40 PM;ug:2257c32d-0458-4860-a73c-59a1454031bc;invoice ex.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10523,14/Jul/24 3:00 PM;ug:2257c32d-0458-4860-a73c-59a1454031bc;invoice hours.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10524,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@2eb6d608,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Backend] Explore criteria notification of "Potentieel Schijnzelfstandigheid" - risk message of collaboration freelancer/organisation for information purposes on 2.0,TDD-814,10905,Story,blocked,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,08/Apr/24 9:00 AM,08/Nov/24 11:51 AM,,,,0,,,,"{color:#bf2600}*Blocked due to new announced legislation to become active 1st of Jan: “amount of hours might not be a good indicator for schijnzelfstandigheid”*{color}

When freelancers work more than 700 hours for one organisation, this might be seen as potential “avoiding employment” and this is against Dutch law. Reason: government might expect that employers/organisations avoid paying taxes, pensions, unemployment taxes by hiring people as freelancers.

Freelancers are only paid per hour and are not obligated to arrange insurances for sickness, pensions etc. If a freelancer doesnt take care of its own future, the govenrment will have to take care of this freelancer by using taxes/funds. Therefore the government is watching organisations and freelancers very strictly to avoid this.

Organisations and freelancers both get a notice when they seem to work with an organisation/freelancer “too often within a year”. There is a calculation/formula coded  that determines whether this message is shown or not: please check what the current criteria is because there is new upcoming law (in healthcare but to extend to childcare) says that a freelancer can work up to a maximum of 70% at one organisation. *EXAMPLE* if a freelancer has worked 200 hours in total (in a year). Then the hours worked at 1 individual organisation shouldn’t exceed 140 hours.
For more info pls read:[https://www.zipconomy.nl/2024/04/extra-gesprekken-nodig-voor-fiscaal-kader-zzp-zorg/

*Goal*: The ‘risk’ message should only show when 70% of total hours is almost reached (TBD when exactly). Second, this message already shows up at the beginning of the year even though the year has not ended yet. Ideally this message would only appear from the month of September as principally there is still time to close' the gap'/reducing the risk by working together with other freelancers//organisations.
*Acceptance Criteria:*
* First we need to double check out what the current rule/formula is used in the backend to show message to the organisation
* Second we need to double check what the current rule/formula is used in the backend to show message to the freelancer.
* Only show message of “RISK” when collaboration of organisation/freelancer reaches TBD threshold, i.e. close to 60-65%? and starting from the month of July- August

+*[Content of risk message might be changed] - to show hours instead of #services. This is same as in 2.0*+",,ICT,,,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,14/May/24 10:22 AM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermafbeelding 2024-05-14 om 10.15.16.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10490,14/May/24 10:25 AM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermafbeelding 2024-05-14 om 10.25.38.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10491,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@15de5eac,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Always create a contract when a job ad is assigned including jobs assigned from admin,TDD-813,10904,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,08/Apr/24 12:47 AM,21/Apr/24 10:02 AM,,21/Apr/24 10:02 AM,,0,,,,"Now we are extending the usage of contract in the code,
In the last release, we adjusted the invoices code by linking few fields of the invoice with their respective fields in contract, namely, organization name and location,
Motivation: The contract data is static.
issue: after the release, we noticed that there are few assigned job ads, that do not have an active contract which is consistent.
Source of this issue:
After scanning the code and debugging, we noticed two main scenarios that lead to a have a job ad, assigned but without active contract.
1- Splitting shifts, after splitting a job ad into two shifts (morning / afternoon), the resulted job ad is created without its respective contract
2-   assigning freelancers to a job ad front Django admin doesn’t create the respective contract as well.
Actions:
1- Generate all the missing contracts in production   (DONE )

2- make sure all assigning scenarios lead to a correct contract creation. (including the Django admin if we are willing to use it in the next weeks / months, this is considered a direct assignment) [~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41]  please let me know your opinion about this specific situation. 66 Organisaties die ontdubbeld moeten worden,TMP-28,10884,Task,Done,TMP,Tadaah Migration project,business,Valerie Ballieux,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,,Medium,Done,,,Valerie Ballieux,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,Valerie Ballieux,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,02/Apr/24 1:57 PM,11/Oct/24 10:57 AM,,11/Oct/24 10:57 AM,10/Jun/24 12:00 AM,0,Adviesteam,Communication,,"Context Saleh:
Issue:
In Tadaah 1.0, one user can be admin of multiple organizations (multi-tenancy). In Tadaah 2.0, this is not possible, as users can only be admin of 1 organization at the time.

There are currently 66 organizations which are possible duplicates and should perhaps be consolidated under a single organization instance. In the attached Excel file, I tried to structure and map it the best I can. Keep in mind this was a partly manual approach because there is no way to simply write a query to find the duplicates.
Action:
We need to take a decision on how to deal with this for each organization. I can think of only 2 options:

We decide to keep the organizations as is (separate). The consequence of this, is that the existing admins will have to create multiple accounts, one for each organization that they want to manage. IMO this is not great UX.

More ideal option. We consolidate / deduplicate the organizations into a single organization instance. Also, all other related data, such as jobs, invoices, etc. should be mapped appropriately to the newly created organisation instance.

The decision on whether to choose option 1 or 2 is a business decision and someone should probably contact these organizations to choose the right option. @Jacco Huisman can you please ask someone to provide this information to us?

[https://tadaahbv229.sharepoint.com/:x:/r/sites/managementteam/_layouts/15/Doc.aspx?sourcedoc=%7BEF53220F-3A02-4177-A686-5EBCAECF55DD%7D&file=duplicate-organisations.xlsx&action=default&mobileredirect=true

column4: *_10009_*:*_1_*:*_0,"16/Apr/24 11:55 PM;6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d;Apparently, the KVK API new version (v2) is partial, ie:

column1: There is no update for the endpoint we are using in 1.0 ([https://api.kvk.nl/api/v1/basisprofielen
column2: https://api.kvk.nl/api/v1/basisprofielen])  which means there is no adjustment needed in 1.0 code

Phone nr clean-up freelancers,TMP-25,10879,Task,Done,TMP,Tadaah Migration project,business,Valerie Ballieux,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,,Medium,Done,,,Valerie Ballieux,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,Valerie Ballieux,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,27/Mar/24 2:38 PM,29/May/24 3:54 PM,,29/May/24 3:54 PM,,0,Adviesteam,Communication,,"*Context*
J: Earlier this week I discussed with Anastasia/Gulhan the data that is mandatory for OPP to be present and correct, in order to properly run them through the KYC process.
The telephone number of each freelancer is a field that is mandatory for OPP.
We saw that most freelancers in Tadaah 1.0 have a phone number (mobile nr) in the database. Only sometimes there is a - in the number, or a space, or other differences in notation.
And maybe not all phon numbers are present…? We only checked a few screens with data.
We will most likely have to do a cleanup run in the current Phonemumber data in Tadaah.
Can you add this topic to the migration plan?

Can you give it your thoughts about how we could do a cleanup and (if necessary) a completion of the existing data in Tadaah 1.0?",,Valerie Ballieux,,,,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TMP-44,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@9e1b58e,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,1
* 980 numbers are missing
* 218 numbers are not completely numeric
* Non-10 numbers (more or less than 10)
Proposal Saleh:
* Let’s not make phone nr field requirement

* When doing KYC, check if phone nr is valid. If not, then they need to fill this (additional request to WAB, [~accountid:6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302] will email Anastasia) ",15/Apr/24 2:41 PM;712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2;Formatting issues will be solved through migration script,,,,,,,,,,,,,Done,29/May/24 3:54 PM

To check: organisations with multiple organisations & users who have access to multiple organisations, and decide how to migrate ,TMP-16,10870,Task,Done,TMP,Tadaah Migration project,business,Valerie Ballieux,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Valerie Ballieux,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,Valerie Ballieux,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,25/Mar/24 3:32 PM,28/Mar/24 12:48 PM,,28/Mar/24 12:48 PM,,0,,,,"Context:

# Organizations: currently in Tadaah we have a case where one physical organization has multiple organizations in the Tadaah. We need to have a list of them and make a decision one by one: union them and migrate or still have them separated.

# Organizations: currently in Taddah one user has access to the multiple organization. In FreelncePlaza you can’t have one account = one access. We need to get a list of users with organizations where they admin and one by one take a decision, to which organizations they stay.",,Saleh Rabbaniy,Valerie Ballieux,,,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@2d91fe1a,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Check if there is API available to map debiteuren nummer with organisations > NOT NEEDED ANYMORE,TMP-15,10869,Task,Done,TMP,Tadaah Migration project,business,Valerie Ballieux,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Valerie Ballieux,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,Valerie Ballieux,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,25/Mar/24 3:28 PM,28/Mar/24 10:26 AM,,28/Mar/24 10:26 AM,,0,Development,,,"Context:

_We need to ensure that the same debtor numbers will be used in Tadaah 2.0. The easiest thing would be to already have the debtor numbers in 1.0, so we can easily migrate it to 2.0. However, this is currently not the case. We do have some kind of API connection with Exact Online which is used to export relations & invoices out of our system. I would have to investigate if we can also easily fetch the debtor numbers and add it to our system. If not, it must be a somewhat manual approach. Perhaps in the form of a csv file with organization id + debtor number could be sufficient for Pavel to use in his migration script._

Checked with Pavel, this should be possible.",,Jacco Huisman,Valerie Ballieux,,,712020:e5f35307-63ea-467f-ad23-d4194b0767e5,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@1e387129,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,1

App needs to be moved to Business Boosters account for App store

Step 1: create new account on BB and move app from Gulhan's private account to BB organisation account. Also create BB website with T&C's. Provider should be Freelance Plaza. < needs to be done in March
Step 2: account migration request. < needs to be done in April
Once this is done, you are updating app instead of downloading new app.

Step 3: Enforce update in old app to new app ",,Valerie Ballieux,,,,712020:cf3e30e8-35d8-4e94-ae0d-213ee4451da2,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@53a639af,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[DJANGO]When freelancer deletes profile or is blacklisted save internal remarks/reviews/warnings,TDD-795,10844,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,12/Mar/24 2:06 PM,01/May/24 11:03 AM,,25/Apr/24 10:21 AM,,0,,,,"*Current*: When a freelancer deleted his/her account we might lose  data regarding the history of the freelancer from the [https://platform.tadaah.nl/staff/poule/freelancers/Freelancer_IDnumber/profile/
column2: https://platform.tadaah.nl/staff/poule/freelancers/3671/profile/]. The data which is mostly important on the profile pages of the freelances are the activity logs, such as reviews from organistions, contact logs from teh advice team and warnings from the warning model [https://tadaah.atlassian.net/browse/TDD-752

column1: On many occassions the contact log records mention comments about diploma’s/documents, bad behaviour, bad reviews, complaints of different nature.

Recent example: freelancer deleted account after being verified 1 mnth and signed up again within 3 weeks with a reason. We noticed there was a review from an organisation straight before she deleted her account but we cannot determine whether the review made her delete the account to start a clean slate/profile.

Note: Recent changes to staff tile “late cancellations/no shows” will also have to be recorded there. Its important to evaluate if the freelancer has past warnings if we decide to let her back on the platform
*Goal:*  when a freelancer deletes account we need to be able to see the contact log/data/review/comments to determine whether we want to allow that person back on the platform.
Acceptance criteria:
* preventing deletion of received ratings when freelancer ‘deletes’ accoumt or is blacklisted by staff.
* Keep warnings (warningsmodel) if freelancer has received any warning for no show or late cancellation
!Schermafbeelding 2024-03-20 om 14.45.44.png

[WEB][ORGANISATION] update  https://platform.tadaah.nl/organisation//locations/ to create a userfriendly way to allow search/add/edit data faster ,TDD-792,10841,Story,blocked,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,05/Mar/24 12:47 PM,08/Nov/24 11:54 AM,,,,0,,,,"Closer to the migration to platform 2.0 we need to make sure that the organisations will help us prepare their accounts for the new platform. There are man differences between platform 1.0 with 2.0. To start off with the users of the *organisations* and the data we collect from them during signup and onboarding:
*INTRODUCTION ON THE LRK number*:

*The LRK* stands for the National Register of Childcare and Preschools. An unique identification number assigned to each childcare or preschool facility that meets the quality requirements set by the government. This number is used to register the location in the national register, so that parents can verify whether a childcare location is officially recognized and meets the legal requirements. The LRK number is often listed on the website of the childcare organization and on contracts or documents provided to parents. Each location has 1 unique LRK number eventhough there might be multiple [activities.
I*Issue/goal*

In 2.0 the LRK field is mandatory when you create a location as an organisation to your account. All locations are unique in 2.0 To achieve this goal we need to start collecting all LRK numbers of the organisations. We need to facilitate the easy data entry of the LRK number and other data TBD. On the current platform the entry fields aren’t super user friendly. The seqence is not sorted alfabetically,. a lot of scrolling is needed, non alphabetical overview of locations without any logic.. To enhace user friendliness we could provide a ‘row view’, sorting and mutating/adding info easier? {color:#ffc400}Lets discuss options{color}
*This ticket is linked to Documentation on Confluence:* [https://tadaah.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SD/pages/77987850/Onboarding+Organisations+1.0+vs+2.0
*Goal*: Create a User-friendly page for organisations to fill in all required field, possibly  with the help of LRK register CsV file {color:#ff991f}To be determined at refinement{color}
*Acceptance Criteria: discussed at refinement:*
*Suggested changes in regard to LRK to be made to page:*[https://platform.tadaah.nl/organisation/settings/locations/
*Design changes:*
First part, is to recognize duplicates and addidng LRK accordingly
* Table view
* Editable
* {color:#ff991f}Search and pagination{color}
* Add selectionbox “tick/untick”. label “niet meer gebruiken/is dubbel”:
* We need to visualize the locations differently as scrolling can be frustrating when you have a lot of locations as an organisation.
* Can we visiualize the locations in rows such as we do in the table view of the weekplanner?
* Alphabetical order
* Sorting
* Add a Search bar (name/city)
* using LRK data to confirm entry as an existing. (address doesn't need to be validated).
* Make sure Kind en Co Ludens *ID-598” has access to the new page to edit but not to create new location
{color:#ff991f}Second part (new ticket){color}
* {color:#ff991f}Future story - We need to check what to do with the jobads of fused locations/not used loactions, under which location to show them, and to whom{color}
* cleaning up the database
!Schermafbeelding 2024-03-12 om 16.10.33.png

[DATA REQUEST] No shows - late cancellations,TDD-790,10839,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,05/Mar/24 10:21 AM,07/Mar/24 10:14 AM,,05/Mar/24 1:19 PM,,0,,,,"* Hoeveel procent/aantallen van alle diensten zijn een no show
** {color:#ff5630}Vanaf 1 Jan 2023 tot heden: 3.805 no shows op 247.208 diensten met toegewezen freelancers. (1.5%){color}
* Hoeveel procent/aantallen van alle diensten worden binnen 24 uur voor aanvang geannuleerd?
** {color:#ff5630}Vanaf 1 Jan 2023 tot heden: 569 late cancelations op 247.208 diensten met toegewezen freelancers. (0.2%){color}
* Hoeveel procent/aantallen van de geannuleerde diensten binnen 24 uur worden weer ingevuld en dus hoeveel niet?
** {color:#ff5630}Een dienst die door een organisatie binnen 24 uur wordt geannuleerd wordt niet meer opengezet. (er kan niet meer worden gereageerd op deze dienst).{color}
Een no show registratie
* als een organisatie aangeeft dat een freelancer niet is komen opdagen voor een dienst maar ook
* als een freelancer zich binnen 24 uur voor aanvang van de dienst afmeldt.
{noformat}SELECT
COUNT(*) as all_jobs
, 	COUNT(CASE WHEN job.assigned_to_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) AS fulfilled_jobs
,	COUNT(CASE WHEN nsh.id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as jobs_with_noshows
,	COUNT(CASE WHEN job.cancelled IS TRUE THEN 1 END) AS cancelled_jobs
,	COUNT(CASE WHEN job.late_cancellation IS TRUE THEN 1 END) AS jobs_late_cancellation
FROM register_jobad job
LEFT JOIN register_noshow nsh ON job.id = nsh.job_id
WHERE 1=1
AND job.date >= '2023-01-01'
AND job.date < CURRENT_DATE{noformat}
{noformat}SELECT
COUNT(*) as all_jobs
,	COUNT(CASE WHEN job.late_cancellation IS TRUE THEN 1 END) AS jobs_late_cancellation
FROM register_jobad job
WHERE 1=1
AND job.date >= '2023-01-01'
AND job.date < CURRENT_DATE{noformat}

[Freelancersview] increase visibility/notifications of Personal Invitations for jobads,TDD-787,10836,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,28/Feb/24 12:14 PM,28/May/24 1:58 PM,,03/Apr/24 10:14 AM,,0,,,,"Since we dont have the fiunction “directly assign” anymore on our platform, we are receiving concerns and complaints form organisations and freelancers.
Reported:
* Notifications of personal jobads dont arrive in mailbox of freelancers
* Notifications of personal invitations are not to be found/visible in jobads
* JObads need to be assigned to the freelancer by the advice team (after jobad starts).
This change causes more phone calls, offline jobads ( placed with a date in past), complaints about notifications in general.
*Business goal:*

we need to make sure that the freelancer recieves all personal invitation, regardless of availability (only if not placed on other job), notification or push settings. We need to make the personal invitations most visibile in the jobads overview, a message that pops out!
*Acceptance Criteria:*
* alle notifications related to personal invitations are place on status “urgent” so we can make sure the notification is sent out from the platform no matter the settings..
* Personal jobads in the {APP} and [WEB] should ether have an own tab
* or.. we can show a message (box) above to show/alert freelancer that there are pending personal invitations that require their attention.
* We can tackle this and ticket

* Rejection notification mail oriority changed to “urgent” to ensure the organisation rev=ceives the rejection.",,ICT,ICT Tadaah,Tellache Imad,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@234502cd,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2024-03-17T22:43:47.000+0100"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: DATA REQUEST: VVE related,TDD-784,10833,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,26/Feb/24 12:36 PM,07/Mar/24 10:13 AM,,04/Mar/24 1:22 PM,,0,,,,"Could you please provide following info over the period:  +placed since 2023- till present+
In numbers and percentages
* How many VVE-Voorschool jobads are placed and how does this relate to all other jobad types?
** {color:#ff5630}From 01-01-2023 until today (04-03-2023), there were 11.200 jobs placed with competence “vve”. This is 3.3% of all jobs in that period (339.420){color}
* How many of the placed VVE-Voorschool jobads are fullfilled and how many not?
** {color:#ff5630}Out of the 11.200 VVE jobs, 7.237 jobs were assigned to a freelancer (64%). However, 980 jobs were cancelled, so 6.257 were completed (55.9% of total).{color}
* How many of the placed jobads have required a “vve-certificate”?

** {color:#ff5630}From 01-01-2023 until today (04-03-2023), there were 11.795 jobs placed with a certificate requirement which includes “vve”. Out of the total 339.420 jobs placed, this is 3.5%. One interesting insight is that for 3.973 of these jobs, the required competence was NOT “vve” but something else like peuter/speelzaal/verticaal/baby.{color}
* How many freelancers have the competence “vve-voorschool”?

** {color:#ff5630}There are 533 freelancers with the “vve” competence. Out of those, 400 freelancers are active and verified. Out of total 4601 active and verified freelancers, this means 8.7% of active and verified freelancers have the “vve” competence. {color}
{code:sql}SELECT
COUNT(*) as all_vve_jobs
,	COUNT(CASE WHEN assigned_to_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as assigned_vve_jobs
,	COUNT(CASE WHEN assigned_to_id IS NOT NULL AND cancelled IS False THEN 1 END) as assigned_not_cancelled_vve_jobs
FROM register_jobad
WHERE 1=1
AND date < CURRENT_DATE
AND competence = 'vve'{code}
{code:sql}SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM register_freelancer
WHERE 1=1
AND competences like '%vve%'
AND active IS True

AND verified IS True{code}",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@396db0db,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Jacco] [FP] categorisation overview of freelancers by usage,TDD-783,10832,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,20/Feb/24 1:49 PM,13/Mar/24 9:17 AM,,13/Mar/24 9:17 AM,,0,,,,"Een andere vraag, die verband houd met onze 7000 freelancers:
Kun jij een top-down verdeling maken van heavy users naar non-users? Hoeft niet op indiv freelancer nivo, maar bijvoorbeeld per groepen van 100 freelancers.
Bv. van de 7000 freelancers, maken er 3000 helemaal geen gebruik van Tadaah in 2023. Van de 4000 overgebleven freelancers is de verdeling als volgt:
-top 1 tot 100 freelancers (=1,4% van de hele populatie) : xxx aantal diensten (is xxx% van het totaal)
-Freelancers nr 101 - 200 : xxx aantal diensten gedraaid.
-Freelancers nr 201 - 300 : xxx aantal diensten gedraaid.
-Freelancers nr 301 - 400 : xxx aantal diensten gedraaid.
-Freelancers nr 401 - 500 : xxx aantal diensten gedraaid.
-Freelancers nr 501 - 600 : xxx aantal diensten gedraaid.
-Freelancers nr 601 - 700 : xxx aantal diensten gedraaid.
etc",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@539592f4,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Jacco] [FP] cost estimation payment automation & OPP transaction cost,TDD-782,10831,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,20/Feb/24 1:47 PM,12/Mar/24 1:15 PM,,12/Mar/24 10:38 AM,,0,,,,"Beschrijving:

We gaan toe naar wekelijkse cycli, van facturatie en de daaropvolgende betalingsverzoeken (gestuurd aan de Organisaties) en betalingen daarvan. OPP hanteert kosten per betaling (door Organisaties aan het OPP platform, vanwaaruit ze direct worden doorbetaald aan de freelancers). Per betalingsverzoek aan 1 Organisatie of 1 lokatie kost dit 0,28 (28 cent). De ontvangen betaling wordt vervolgens opgeknipt naar individuele betalingen per freelancer. Die uitbetaling aan 1 indiv. freelancer kost 0,09 (9 cent).
Mijn vragen:

-Hoeveel organisaties per week hebben wij (week 1 t/m week 52 van 2023), oftewel hoeveel Organisaties zijn er wekelijks die 1 of meer diensten via Tadaah platform hebben afgenomen (uitgevoerde diensten)

-Hoeveel indiv. freelancers zijn er die wekelijks diensten hebben uitgevoerd en die door Organisaties worden uitbetaald?",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@5a7cee74,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[DJANGO]KVK- numbers to be be entered in kvk api, missing work adresses to be completed,TDD-775,10824,Bug,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,15/Feb/24 11:33 AM,07/May/24 10:55 AM,,02/May/24 8:54 AM,,0,,,,"*Description*

Working on changing the contract from old to new, Imad found out that many freelancers don’t have a filled in work address field. In the new contract This field is being used to ‘introduce' the freelancer as one of the two business parties
Logic of the Work address:
This field is and can only be filled in/ stored when a freelancer enters the kvk number in the kvk api and saves it.
*Solution:*
* We need to ‘check all present kvk numbers’ and store the work address in business information (settings page of freelancer) and as “work adress” in Django (this happens automatically)?
* We also require a list of all bounced kvk numbers. They will be approached by the advice team to enter a valid KvK number
*Acceptance Criteria:*
* freelancers need to enter their Coc number via the api link in business profile information (freelanceriew) if not ran yet. This info can be found via existing work address in Django or not.
* If kvk mandatory field: make sure that 100% of missing work addresses are completed.
* [suggestion to be discussed with Saleh} If work address are missing we can add home address instead

* {color:#ff991f}*To be discussed: what to do if 2 company names are fetch by the kvk-Api? Option: ask freelancer to contact advice teamfor help with kvk?*{color}",,ICT,ICT Tadaah,Priti,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,712020:05742443-3f81-43d0-9037-b8826757f3f0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@7fd14785,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2024-05-03T12:01:46.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,Impediment,,,,,,,,,1

[STAFF] DRAFT Manually entered competences shouldnt be rejected by system updates,TDD-773,10822,Bug,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,14/Feb/24 1:14 PM,21/Mar/24 9:19 AM,,21/Mar/24 9:19 AM,,0,,,,"Staff currecntly add competences manually, due to shortcomings in technical possibilities. We decided not to develop those as they are available in 2.0

Issue: When a competence is “selected via django admin' manually this competence is  stored only until a new update of information. Apparently, the system performs a full scan when an update is made in the profile or elsewhere. This means that the competence is also removed. The system does not have a rule built in to accept that competence based on uploaded documents.
We need going to do something about this. We could change this logic and make sure that changes in company or personal data do not affect manually entered competencies.
Until the migration, this is a solution but not completely foolproof.
*Acceptance Criteria:*
* Seperate competences updates from updates regarding personal information.
* Changes from freelancers should also keep the competences in tact.

* Django admin to keep secured and only changes via dvice team members.",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@754768e7,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2024-03-14T14:39:33.000+0100"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Freelancer] Competence VVE Voorschool explained, pls adjust code if necessary,TDD-767,10816,Bug,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,13/Feb/24 9:51 AM,03/Apr/24 10:14 AM,,03/Apr/24 10:14 AM,,0,,,,"The competence VVE-Voorschool can be achieved by the presence of following documents:
Combination of 2 +*approved*+ documenttypes:
{color:#bf2600}1 of the following 4 document Types and id’s: {color}
* Piramide - VVE (id 487)
* VVE, Kaleidoscoop (id 477)
* VVE, Uk en Puk methode (id 439)
* VVE, Vroege Voorschoolse Educatie (Certificaat) (id 437)
{color:#ff5630}plus{color}
# Taaleis 3F (Certificaat) (441)
*Conclusion:* +*the combination*+ *of (487,477,439,437) + (437) or diploma’s (qualifiying for taaleis 3F) give VVE/Voorschool competence*
*Acceptance Criteria:*
* Situation explained above is the only way freelancers will gain VVE-Voorschool competence
* Taaleis 3F is not just a document type

* Taaleis 3 F is also  a qualification that is also achieved when someone has a higher education or university level: Please explore how this is coded in the system and pls give results to discuss is correct.
* When VVE voorschool is selected as a competence: certificate types “vve” plus “taaleis 3f” boxes in job creation form should be “ticked”

* Check api’s for visibilty of jaobads according to this rule",,ICT Tadaah,Yashavnt Andure,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,63e0a07bc2b1cb6b3472df23,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-742,,,,,,,,13/Feb/24 9:57 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2024-02-13 om 09.57.29.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10429,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@d64751a,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[WEB] Freelancers receive incorrect notice of expiring document,TDD-764,10813,Bug,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,07/Feb/24 11:20 AM,15/Feb/24 11:49 PM,,15/Feb/24 11:49 PM,,0,,,,"I received a bug report:
freelancers are seeing messages “vve certificate soon to expire” in their accounts, see screenshots.
This is strange because the mentioned expiring document: “vve certificate” doesn’t require a validation date.
(2 cases have been reported to me so far). Freelancer id: 12051 (iris Rietbergen) and 258 (Haidy Kromotiko)
Can we check if document type numbers 498, 1836 are associated?

As far as I can see Document types 438 (ehbo), 443 (bhv) are the only document types requiring a validation date ",,ICT Tadaah,Tellache Imad,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,07/Feb/24 11:21 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;MicrosoftTeams-image (1) (1).png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10426,07/Feb/24 11:21 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;MicrosoftTeams-image.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10425,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@f20f4cd,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1
column7: *_10014_*:*_1_*:*_2313,"07/Feb/24 1:15 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Saleh “ : Gulhan, there can be 2 things happening here.

column1: # The freelancer is missing the required certificates

IMO it's better to have separate messages if possible, if it's too difficult we can try a general message","07/Feb/24 1:16 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;in case 1 msg :

{noformat}Let op! Deze freelancer heeft één of meerdere certificaten die binnenkort niet meer geldig zijn.{noformat}","09/Feb/24 8:22 AM;6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d;url : /organisation/poule/

column1: [WEB] Organisation name should be static and be synced with name as stated in contract (static),TDD-757,10806,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,05/Feb/24 12:16 PM,03/Apr/24 10:14 AM,,03/Apr/24 10:14 AM,,0,,,,"Some organisations are not using our platform anymore. One of the most obvious examples Partou Smallsteps with more than 500 locations.
There are however, still invoices and jobads related to this organisation, which are downloaded, used and necessary for freelancers' admin.

Problem: Staff has changed the name of the organisation Partou/Smallsteps to “Smallsteps/Partou -Account not in use” and this is now showing in all possible platform data in history related to this account. Most important: the invoices should be static.
*Acceptance Criteria:*
* Make the account name/location name static in invoices - sync with contract
* Can imagine same happens to freelancer changing name? TBD
* Use the static contract organisation profile data related to specific jobad,

* Make sure also that there is a static location name in the contract",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@19307986,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2024-04-02T17:40:17.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[APP/WEB] SIGNUP FLOW - Personal Information Page to be updated with mandatory profile picture, profile text, Kvk and SBI,TDD-756,10805,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,05/Feb/24 12:10 PM,03/Apr/24 10:14 AM,,03/Apr/24 10:14 AM,,0,,,,"GH_ Updated 15 feb:
When freelancers request profile verification at sign up stage: redirect freelancers to freelancer settings page if  following fields are not complete:
# profile picture
# Profile text
# Kvk (sbI is retrieved)
These elements are necessary for freelancers to start working. Currently, the advice team emails all user-to-be-verified to send these via email.
Proposition is to add these elements to the Persoonlijke gegevens screen.
*Proposition:*

The profile picture will be added to the top of the screen and the profile text can be added to the bottom of the screen. This is also relevant for the backend, for the check if the Persoonlijke gegevens are complete.

Kvk_number and sbi codes need to be added to the freelancer verification page for the staff members. They originally used a Kvk document from the freelancer to access the information, but since we are asking the freelancer to fill this in in the Sign up flow, we can just show this info on the verification page.
*Acceptance criteria:*
* Sign up flow: profile picture and profile text are mandatory and  check if the Persoonlijke Gegevens are complete when verification of account is requested
* Add kvk_number and sbi code to the frontend of the Persoonlijke Gegevens part of the Sign up flow
* Add freelancer kvk number and sbi codes to verification page
* Until freelancer is verified, he/she is able to upload/reupload a picture
* After verification the profile picture is set and cannot be deleted/replaced
* To be able to re-upload another (new) picture, freelancer needs to request an update via [info@tadaah.nl
column2: mailto:info@tadaah.nl] (until we create an ‘request update button’ as in documents). We need to show this info to the freelancer via textbox: ” je kunt je profielfoto wijzigen via een ail.TBDXXX.”

column1: * Verified Freelancers without a profile picture in their account are prompted to the settings/bio to upload a profile picture.",,Dharmesh Bhalala,ICT Tadaah,,,6389c29d77acd224b341d312,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-704,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@43de0881,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1
Need to setup view and backend logic for update profile request and approve from web by staff member.",,,,,,,,,,,,,,Done,03/Apr/24 10:14 AM

[WEB] Explore and adjust how Taaleis 3F is accredited to freelancers:  check code/backend,TDD-753,10802,Subtask,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,01/Feb/24 2:24 PM,11/Apr/24 11:12 AM,,11/Apr/24 11:12 AM,,0,,,,"Taaleis 3F is a qualification in Dutch language. Speaking, understanding and Writing the Dutch Language on a above medior level
Goal:
* Explore which combinations/rules there are more to qualify for the taaleis 3 F apart from an approved documenttype ID 441 and correct is not according to the two rules above
How do freelancers gain this qualification:

* {{ d.dtype.is_hbo or d.dtype.is_wo}} plus document type ID 441",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-742,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@ca6d87a,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1
