column1: [Web]- STAFF - Check/update data provided to staff tile "staff/stats/sickness/",TDD-752,10801,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,01/Feb/24 2:24 PM,21/Apr/24 10:02 AM,,21/Apr/24 10:02 AM,,0,,,,"*Current:*
Staff uses the tile “stats sickness” to monitor freelancers who have called in sick/cancelled (late cancellation) no show  in the last 7 days.
The stats/data provided to them is calculated using the Bradford Factor.  If a certain freelancer cancels too often this transalates in a high Bradfor score.
Freelancer who have a hig Bradford Score receive a warning via mail (notification).
3 warnings means exit : access to the platform is denied for freelancer
Cynthia would like to see the Brafdord SCore calculated over a 2 week period.
*What needs to be done:*
* Keep track of warnings - absolute number
* Create a warningmodel, when new instance is created we can show that on the freelancer profile . Cleaner/easier to migrate.
* On [https://platform.tadaah.nl/staff/stats/sickness/
column2: https://platform.tadaah.nl/staff/stats/sickness/] we need to filter out that we dont warn a person more than once for one speciifc calendarweek

column1: * When freelancer is warned using this button, a msg is timestamped and placed on freelancer profile: “
{noformat}freelancer is warned for late cancellation/no show on >>date:time<<{noformat}
* Create possibilty to revoke warning via Django/Admin.
* Revoking warning from django result in message in staff/poule/freelancer profile to sent a msg saying warning was revoked
* Instruct Staff that revoking a warning doesnt trigger “mail to notifiy cancellation of sent warning” Has to be done Manual by email.
* Modal when you click on warn should show email notifcation to staff before sending/confirm (explain freelancer is placed on inactive when warning is sent).
* Stats namechanges (illustrated by screenshot):  #latecancellations&no shows, #worked days, #warnings
* Change the scope of this page to the past 2 working weeks (giving a new overview every 2 weeks)
* Change tile name/url to “late afzeggingen en no shows/ late cancellations and no shows”
Notification emails is to be updated to:
{noformat}Beste {{ user.get_full_name }},
Samen werken we aan een betrouwbaar platform.  We willen voor freelancers en organisaties het platform zijn en blijven om flexibel te werken in de kinderopvang.

Niet op komen dagen en te laat afmelden past niet binnen ons platform. Afgelopen periode heb jij {{ n_worked }} diensten gewerkt en je {{ n_sick_days }} keren afgemeld zonder geldige reden. Dit is niet doorgegeven aan de organisatie en ook niet aan Tadaah.
Wij hebben hier een melding van gemaakt. Op dit moment hebben we je op niet-beschikbaar gezet voor 24 uur. Over 24 uur staat jouw profiel weer op actief en kun je weer diensten aannemen.
Meld je je in de komende periode weer te laat af zonder geldige reden? Dan ontvang je een 2e melding op jouw profiel. Op dat moment staat jouw profiel 48 uur op non-actief.
Bij 3 meldingen op jouw profiel wordt de toegang tot het platform ontzegd en kun je niet meer werken via Tadaah. Voorkom dit door je op tijd af te melden óf door vervanging te regelen.
Ben je het niet eens met bovenstaande melding? Stuur dan een mail naar het adviesteam.
Met vriendelijke groet,
Tadaah

{noformat}",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-795,,,14/Mar/24 12:01 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermafbeelding 2024-02-06 om 12.00.43(3)(1).png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10441,13/Feb/24 10:54 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;striking_absenteeism.txt;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10431,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@3fe91253,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2024-04-15T19:58:02.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[WEB] Organisationview - Edit period jobads as with regular (speed/interest) jobads,TDD-751,10800,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,01/Feb/24 2:24 PM,21/Mar/24 9:19 AM,,21/Mar/24 9:19 AM,,0,,,,"Organisations have expressed their wish several time to have the possibility to mutate period job derived jobads similar as regular (speed/interest ) jobads.
Acceptance criteriaL
* use same logic and rules as to what is allowed to be mutated and what not ((open/fulfilled, on time cancellation/late cancellaton)
* Best to use same ‘page’ as we use now to mutate/change existing jobads.
* edit page for jobad{color:#ff5630}s:  “ https://platform.tadaah.nl/organisation/job/<<jobad_number>>/edit{color}
* Weekplanner - derived jobad from periodic job should link to “job edit page” when clicked on “bewerken”/mutate: [{color:#ff5630}https://platform.tadaah.nl/organisation/job/{color}
* Period jobads page should not show model but direct to jobeditpage [{color:#ff5630}https://platform.tadaah.nl/organisation/job/{color}

[WEB] when selecting "certificate type VVE' in jobad creation , Taaleis 3F is auto selected,TDD-742,10791,Bug,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,22/Jan/24 11:59 AM,21/Mar/24 9:19 AM,,21/Mar/24 9:19 AM,,0,,,,"Selecting VVE certificate in jobcreation form as a required certificate is still not solved
Issue remains: if any VVE certificate is selected ({{id's 437, 439, 477, 487}})  is selected, the organisation assumes a VVE competence is selected as a requirement, but that is not the case.
After discussing this with the advice team and our previous dev brainstorm we came up with the following solution:
*Solution at jobcreation level: to make sure that in* +*all job creation forms*+*: if VVE certificaat box is selected, taaleis 3F is selected*
{{If vve certificate is ""true"", VVE certificate is ""true""}}
{noformat}has_vve = any(d.dtype.pk in (437, 439, 477, 487) for d in diplomas)
has_taaleis = any(d.dtype.pk == 441 or d.dtype.is_hbo or d.dtype.is_wo for d in diplomas)          {noformat}

* check wizard, jobad edit pages, job creation forms, Invalpoule can be different",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-753,TDD-767,,13/Feb/24 10:28 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2024-02-13 om 10.25.32.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10430,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@7df0395c,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2024-03-17T22:26:28.000+0100"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[APP] Ask users of the app if they would like to review the app,TDD-735,10785,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Dharmesh Bhalala,6389c29d77acd224b341d312,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,11/Jan/24 3:18 PM,06/Feb/24 8:08 AM,,06/Feb/24 8:08 AM,,0,,,,"“Getting happy users to review your app is an essential component in any app marketing strategy, which is why app rating requests are such an important thing to get right.”
Since we have a nice new, clean look and feel of our app, let’s try to benefit from that and ask the users to review our app.
Acceptance Criteria:
* Both IOS and Android

* Users only asked once and able to ignore/postpone rating to another time and moment",,Dharmesh Bhalala,ICT,,,6389c29d77acd224b341d312,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,22/Jan/24 10:32 AM;ug:485834d9-faf3-4c58-b2bc-acde72ee95ea;Screenshot_1705915945.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10413,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@411d2331,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

We integrated a rating library that will show one-time ratings. One option “*Rate us*” from settings which will redirect to the Play Store /  App Store. So users can update reviews on both platforms.",,,,,,,,,,,,,,Done,06/Feb/24 8:08 AM

Lets find out what we have and then determine what needs to be done.",,ICT,,,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,18/Jan/24 10:32 AM;ug:485834d9-faf3-4c58-b2bc-acde72ee95ea;Long Job Accept.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10410,23/Jan/24 7:47 AM;ug:485834d9-faf3-4c58-b2bc-acde72ee95ea;Notification.jpeg;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10414,18/Jan/24 10:32 AM;ug:485834d9-faf3-4c58-b2bc-acde72ee95ea;Short Job Accept.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10412,18/Jan/24 10:32 AM;ug:485834d9-faf3-4c58-b2bc-acde72ee95ea;Short Job Cancel.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10411,30/Jan/24 12:30 PM;ug:485834d9-faf3-4c58-b2bc-acde72ee95ea;Signup Submit Doc.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10419,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@5e9b01a7,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[DATA REQUEST] Can we confirm 250 new freelancers/organisations over november en december 2023 resulting from marketing campaign?,TDD-726,10776,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,08/Jan/24 5:57 PM,11/Jan/24 9:12 PM,,11/Jan/24 9:12 PM,,0,,,,"Alona Marketing claims their marketing campaigns on socials have resulted in 250 new users, organisational and freelancers, in total.
Can we confirm below numbers sent by Iris by looking at our analytics?
– Hi Gulhan,
Bijgaand de getallen ook van december wat om en nabij binnen gekomen zou moeten zijn in nov en dec. We hebben afgesproken hier voor vrijdag antwoord op te hebben, dus ik wacht het rustig af!
Nogmaals dank!
Zou jij voor mij kunnen navragen of de conversieaantallen van de maand November en December kloppen?
In November meten wij in zijn totaliteit 234 freelance inschrijvingen en 16 organisatie inschrijvingen.
In December zijn deze aantallen respectievelijk 202 en 15.

Deze statistieken zullen overigens nooit 1 op 1 overheen komen met wat jullie binnenkrijgen i.v.m. tracking limitaties door verschillende browser, adblockers en cookie consent. Maar het is natuurlijk wel belangrijk dat we enigszins in de buurt zitten van het werkelijk aantal inschrijvingen.",,ICT,,,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@7718ac3f,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[DATA REQUEST] emailadresses for marketing purposes - 2 reference groups,TDD-725,10775,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,08/Jan/24 5:20 PM,11/Jan/24 9:12 PM,,11/Jan/24 7:52 PM,,0,,,,"Marketing and Legal teams requested data for the following 2 purposes:
* *Legal information obligation:*  We need to contact, send correct data /update our active users on the Terms & Conditions.
* Additionally, it can add *business value* as our marketing agency can import the email addresses, allowing us to *maximize returns on our investment.*
Can we create a query and create a tile on the staff side for marketing and legal teams to export emailaddresses of these 4 groups seperately?
*They will need E-mailadresses of users over the period of 2023 complying to the following conditions:*
# Active freelancers including Geographical information, profile text information. Definition “Active”, interaction/transactions take place.
# Active organisations
# Subgroup of Active freelancers: “Non-active freelancers” over the period of 2023. Definition “non-Active” to be defined.
# Non-active organisation (Subgroup of Active {color:#ff5630}-freelancers-{color} not using the platform frequently/at all) , organisations over the period of 2023.
*Definitions:*

* *Active*: interaction/transactions have taken place. if a freelancer/organisation +*HAS*+ accepted/placed *# jobads* over the period of 2023.  or could refine further: I.e. most frequent occurring count of minimum accepted/placed jobad
* *Non-active:* NO/few (TBD) interaction/transactions have taken place. If a freelancer/organisation has +*NOT*+ accepted/placed *# jobad* over the period of 2023. i.e. stopped taking/placing jobads
*Important to exclude in all lists:*
* Blacklisted freelancers/organisation emails are *not included* in the export
Comments Saleh:
* Button in staff??
* for both active and inactive freelancers, do we still want to filter on verified = True, and active=True (freelancer is technically allowed to take jobs, but hasn’t done so)

* When you say email addresses of active organisations - what do you want exactly? We have Organisation and location admins who have email addresses.",,ICT,,,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@6b0e45ab,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[WEB]- Delete text regarding hygiene policy " from all locations  of Blos,TDD-719,10769,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,04/Jan/24 3:57 PM,01/Feb/24 5:32 PM,,01/Feb/24 1:12 PM,,0,,,,"All locations of all organisations with the name “Blos” have the following additional information: “per 1 mei nieuwe hygienerichtlijnen”. This information is not accurate anymore and should be removed.
Acceptance Criteria:
* Delete Paragraph/text  “per 1 mei nieuwe hygienerichtlijnen”
* Each location will still have the following text:
** - VOG Koppelen aan BLOS kinderopvang B.V. - 30278497
** ""LET OP!!!! Wij nemen enkel facturen in behandeling die zijn verstuurd via het platform van Tadaah''
Done. Script used:
locations = Location.objects.filter(organisation__id__in=blos_organisation_ids)
start_string = 'Per 1 mei 2023'
end_string = 'ons aan deze norm te houden.'
pattern = re.compile(re.escape(start_string) + r'.*?' + re.escape(end_string), re.DOTALL
for location in locations:
if location.information and pattern.search(location.information):
print(f'SUCCESS: found pattern for {location.id}')
location.information = pattern.sub('', location.information)
location.save()
else:

print(f'FAILURE: not found for location id {location.id}')}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,16/Jan/24 11:30 AM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermafbeelding 2024-01-16 om 11.26.57.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10408,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@462cbac5,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Backend] Urgent! Solve bug where freelancer cancels interest job, and it will be open for everyone the day before,TDD-709,10759,Bug,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,14/Dec/23 1:28 PM,02/Feb/24 10:14 AM,,01/Feb/24 8:57 PM,,0,,,,"There is a bug related to the interest jobs that was overlooked during development.

When a freelancer is assigned to an interest job in time, the interest job will not be cancelled when the cron job checks for interest jobs that are unassigned and cancels them. But the freelancer can still cancel for this job, which unassigns them from the job and the job will be open again. This can also happen between 48-24 hours before the job starts. There is no check anymore for this job and it won’t be cancelled. This is how some interest jobs are open the day before they take place.
This needs to be solved. There are a number of possibilities that can be discussed during refinement of this ticket.

* If we add the functionality for organisations to transform an unassigned interest job to a speed job, this could also be used in the scenario described above. The interest job should then not be cancelled, because then the organisation cannot find it anymore. Suggestion to set the interest job to *invite_only*, then no freelancers see it, inform the organisation and let them transform it into a speed job if needed. If we add the functionality to invite freelancers to an interest job, then that will not interfere, because if *invite_only = True* and the *invited_list* is empty, the job won’t be visible to any freelancer.
* We already have the option to transform a personal jobad to a speed job by “iedereen uitnodigen” functionality (invite everyone) so we can use that.

* Add info to the existing the Notification that informs organisation of a cancelled jobad:  If an interest jobad has been cancelled saying that the jobad can we cancelled or converted to a speedjob”",,ICT,Jona Bosman,,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@70c1d49a,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2024-01-08T10:01:38.000+0100"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: [Backend] Fill the Kostenplaatsnummers for Ludens locations and add Kostenplaats to company name,TDD-708,10758,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,14/Dec/23 1:04 PM,06/Feb/24 2:58 PM,,06/Feb/24 10:36 AM,,0,,,,"Kind and Co Ludens (an organisation) has provided us with a .csv file containing the Kostenplaatsnummers for all their locations. Moving to FreelancePlaza, the {{kostenplaats}} field on the Location model will be required for all organisations. Instead of manually updating all 546 locations, we want to save the Kostenplaatsnummers to the locations with code.
Suggestion is to write a management command to proces the .csv file to get the location id and the kostenplaatsnummer en save it for all locations and add it in brackets to the location name.
The kostenplaats nummer will then also be visible for all freelancers in the available jobs.
Please test if location id correspond to those in excel file (attached) prior to making changes
Acceptance criteria:
* Process included .csv file to get the *id, name* and *kostenplaats*
* Fetch the locations for the corresponding *id’s*
* Set the *kostenplaats* value from the .csv to *location.kostenplaats*
* Update the [*location*
e.g. '(24201) BSO Blitsers’
* Save all locations
[^aangepaste Lijst Tadaah_Ludens.xlsx]

,,Jona Bosman,Saleh Rabbaniy,,,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,14/Dec/23 1:04 PM;633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1;aangepaste Lijst Tadaah_Ludens.xlsx;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10385,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@5424c649,,,,,{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2024-02-02T10:07:58.000+0100"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1
we will change the location name to “{name} {kostenplaats}” instead of “{kostenplaats} {name}”",,,,,,,,,,,,10021,Support-Tickets,Done,06/Feb/24 10:36 AM

column2: hzzyvj:,,,,,,,,,,,,,,Expired/blocked tickets  1.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,10028,Tech-Debt & General Platform Improvements,In Progress,17/Oct/24 1:06 PM

column1: Document statuses of Jobads and adjust Weekplanner jobs accordingly,WORKFLOW-97,10755,Task,To Do,WORKFLOW,Minor Workflow Improvements,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,12/Dec/23 4:33 PM,12/Dec/23 4:33 PM,,,,0,,,,"The Weekplanner already shows some colours for when a job is cancelled and when someone is assigned. It would be nice to expand this.

When a freelances rejects a personal job, the job is no longer open to accept by any freelancer. The organisation should be notified of this in the Weekplanner. They have to take some action to get the job filled.
The same holds for a speed job when all invited freelancers have rejected the job.

Organisations also have to take action when an interest job has at least 1 interested freelancer. We can also work with labels, or hover over texts.",,Jona Bosman,,,,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@121feac2,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

It would be nice to also show per location which freelancers are favourited and which are not.",,Jona Bosman,,,,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@5915e6e8,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[UI][Org] Create design to show freelancers blocked by locations,TDD-705,10753,Story,To Do,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,12/Dec/23 4:07 PM,08/Nov/24 11:53 AM,,,,0,,,,"Currently, [https://platform.tadaah.nl/organisation/settings/blocked/
column2: https://platform.tadaah.nl/organisation/settings/blocked/] shows only the freelancers that are blocked for a full organisation. We want to show an overview of freelancers that are blocked per location.  Users that are admin of multiple organisations should be able to see all freelancers blocked per location. See image of how it looks like now.

column1: !Screenshot 2023-12-12 at 14.50.50.png

It would be nice to have clear overview, maybe you can see a list or locations you’re admin of and click on one to make it expand. Or some kind of search functionality. Some users are admin of 600/700 locations, so keep that in mind while designing! We can always have a call if you want to discuss this!",,Jona Bosman,Niels Rozemeijer,,,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-697,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,12/Dec/23 4:07 PM;633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1;Screenshot 2023-12-12 at 14.50.50.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10382,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@1d9013b4,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1
column2: hzzzye:i,,,,,,,,,,,,,,BACKLOG FREELANCE PLAZA,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,2023-12-14 12:29:10.998,,"14/Dec/23 1:29 PM;70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2;Hey Jona, thanks! Can you share a bit more about the following questions?

column1: * How does blocking work? Is there a reason logged when a user is blocked, can there be a note added? Is a user always blocked for one/all location(s), can that be done for multiple locations at the same time? Just generally curious how the blocking a user flow works.
* Same goes for unblocking. How does unblocking work?
* How many users a typically blocked per org and/or per location?
* Is that 600/700 location number accurate or an exaggeration (really surprised by that amount)?

Lastly, how would you like the designs presented? The screenshot you shared is of the current styling, it would help me if we can work on the new react design system that Saleh and I worked on. Would that be possible?

[App] Freelancer settings: request profile picture update,TDD-704,10752,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Yashavnt Andure,63e0a07bc2b1cb6b3472df23,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,12/Dec/23 2:15 PM,14/May/24 9:40 AM,,14/May/24 7:46 AM,,0,jona,,,"Instead of just updating their profile picture, freelancers need to request an update for their profile picture. Currently, they can click on their profile picture and after uploading it, the picture is updated.
We want to change this: instead of directly making the API request to save the new picture, first show a modal with the following message:
”Als je je profielfoto wilt wijzingen, moet het adviesteam de nieuwe foto eerst goedkeuren. Het is belangrijk dat je gezicht goed zichtbaar is op de foto, anders wordt je verzoek afgekeurd.
Klik op “Verzoek indienen” om een verzoek te sturen naar het adviesteam om je nieuwe foto in te stellen.
Klik op “Terug” om je oude profielfoto te behouden.”

(The advice team first has to approve your new profile picture. It is important that the new picture shows your face, otherwise the request will be declined. Click on “Send request” to sent a request to the advice team to update your profile picture. Click on “Back” to keep your old picture.)
Acceptance criteria:

* Update the function to set a profile picture to show a modal first where the freelancer can agree to send the profile picture request. Only when the freelancer clicks on “Send request”, the API patch request the api/myself has to be made, with the new picture as value for *picture_request* on the freelancer model.

* When the freelancer clicks on the profile picture while a profile picture request is already pending (because the value of *picture_request* is not empty) , they should be notified of that and it should not be possible to update the picture. Maybe a disappearing message on the settings page.",,Jona Bosman,,,,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-696,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-756,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@5b0b7730,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[DRAFT] [Backend] Create documentation for notification settings,WORKFLOW-98,10748,Task,To Do,WORKFLOW,Minor Workflow Improvements,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,12/Dec/23 10:15 AM,20/Mar/24 6:02 PM,,,,0,5_dec,not-refined,,"Users still receive notifications when “Receive notifications per email” is checked off.

Each notification is associated with a “level”. This can either be ‘Level Normal’ or ‘Level Urgent’. This seems to imply that some notifications are more important than other and might be able to overrule the notifications settings. This is to be confirmed even though we know that “cancelled shift” notification for example is sent regardless of settings and has level “urgent”.

It would be good to investigate how the level system exactly works and create some documentation for it. For mobile app, there are different notification settings allowing also mobile push notifications.

Users, especially organisations, would like to completely mute all notifications for some accounts, so if it turns out that this is not possible on the current platform, a follow up story should be created to add this change. Reasons to mute: maternity leave, sickness, holiday, full inbox etc.
*Attached*: zipfile with mail notifications in html and .txt. Evaluate if there are push notifications for each of these mail notifications.
*Goal: Use*
*Acceptance criteria:*

* Document which email notifications added to a summary and sent to *organisations* when the “Hoeveelheid notificaties” (Number of notifications)  is set to “Samenvatting van meldingen ontvangen” (Receive summary of notifications) *and* “Meldingen per email” (Email notifications)  is checked. Also check when the summary email is sent (it is sent through a cronjob), and if there are any email notifications are still sent separately from the summary email.

* Document which (if any) email notifications are sent to *organisations* when the “Hoeveelheid notificaties” (Number of notifications)  is set to “Samenvatting van meldingen ontvangen” (Receive summary of notifications) *and*  “Meldingen per email” (Email notifications) is not checked.

* Document which (if any) email notifications are sent to *organisations* when the “Hoeveelheid notificaties” (Number of notifications)  is set to “Alle meldingen ontvangen” (Receive all of notifications) *and*  “Meldingen per email” (Email notifications) is not checked.
For freelancers, an extra checkbox is present to receive push notifications on mobile.

* Document which email notifications added to a summary and sent to *freelancers* when the “Hoeveelheid notificaties” (Number of notifications)  is set to “Samenvatting van meldingen ontvangen” (Receive summary of notifications) *and* “Meldingen per email” (Email notifications)  is checked. Also check when the summary email is sent (it is sent through a cronjob), and if there are any email notifications are still sent separately from the summary email.

* Document which (if any) email notifications are sent to *freelancers* when the “Hoeveelheid notificaties” (Number of notifications)  is set to “Samenvatting van meldingen ontvangen” (Receive summary of notifications) *and*  “Meldingen per email” (Email notifications) is not checked.

* Document which (if any) email notifications are sent to *freelancers* when the “Hoeveelheid notificaties” (Number of notifications)  is set to “Alle meldingen ontvangen” (Receive all of notifications) *and*  “Meldingen per email” (Email notifications) is not checked.

* Document which push notifications are sent to *freelancers* when the “Hoeveelheid notificaties” (Number of notifications)  is set to “Samenvatting van meldingen ontvangen” and the “Meldingen via de app” (Notifications through the mobile app) checkbox is checked.

* If necessary, create a story to completely mute all notifications for *organisation* admin accounts and if needed also for *freelancer.*",,Jona Bosman,,,,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,20/Mar/24 4:05 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;email.zip;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10443,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@7f5b09ee,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Freelancer] [Backend] Modify JobAd method to notify organisation when freelancer refuses a personal jobad,TDD-698,10746,Bug,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,06/Dec/23 4:29 PM,02/Feb/24 10:14 AM,,01/Feb/24 8:57 PM,,0,jona,,,"A freelancer can refuse a jobad. This will make the jobad disappear from their available jobs page. The organisation of the job is currently not notified of this action. That makes sense when many or all freelancers are invited for a speed or interest job, but for personal jobs (when only 1 freelancer is invited) it would be nice if the organisation receives a message stating that the freelancer refused the job. The job is then not available anymore for other freelancers. If the organisation is notified, they can decide what further action to take, but currently they don’t know that a freelancer refused a personal job.
Acceptance criteria:
* Add/change method on JobAd model “not_available” for when a job is personal and the freelancer rejected it, that it places them on rejected list and sends notification to the organisation.
* A new notification has to be created, of type “REFUSE_PERSONAL”. (Not to be confused with the existing notifcation type “REFUSE”.
* The notification should look like this:
{noformat}    NotificationType(Notification.TYPE_REFUSE_PERSONAL,
'REFUSE_PERSONAL',
'Dienst geweigerd',
'{job.assigned_to.first_name} {job.assigned_to.last_name} heeft de dienst op {job.date} geweigerd',
'email/job_refuse_personal_organisation.txt',
'email/html/job-refuse-personal-organisation.html'),{noformat}
The text of the email should be:
{noformat}Beste {{ job.organisation.company_name }},

Onderstaande dienst is geweigerd door {{ job.assigned_to.get_full_name }}. Om de dienst toch te laten vervullen, kunt op bij de dienst klikken op ""Iedereen uitnodigen"", of de dienst verwijderen en een nieuwe persoonlijke dienst uitzetten voor een andere freelancer.
Freelancer: {{ job.assigned_to.get_full_name }}
Telefoon: {{ job.assigned_to.freelancer.phone_number }}
Organisatie: {{ job.organisation.company_name }}
Vestiging: {{ job.location.name }}
Adres: {{ job.location.address }}, {{ job.location.postal_code }} {{ job.location.city }}
Datum: {{ job.date }}
Van: {{ job.start
Tot: {{ job.end
Met vriendelijke groet,
Tadaah
info@tadaah.nl
tadaah.nl
{noformat}",,Jona Bosman,,,,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@374f526d,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[WEB] [ORG] Show which freelancers are blocked for each location, in addition to freelancers that are blocked for the whole organisation,TDD-697,10745,Story,To Do,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,05/Dec/23 10:52 AM,08/Nov/24 11:53 AM,,,,0,jona,,,"Need UI first!
[https://dev.tadaah.nl/organisation/settings/blocked/

This page gives an overview of freelancers that are blocked by the organisation for the whole organisation. Freelancers can already be blocked for a location only, which means they can accept job ads for other locations of this organisation. The overview in the settings does not show which freelancers are block for which location.
A suggestion to implement this would be to add tabs for each location a user is admin of, similar to the rate rules settings page ([https://dev.tadaah.nl/organisation/settings/rates/
column2: https://dev.tadaah.nl/organisation/settings/rates/]). Furthermore, it should have the same functions as are currently on the page: it should show some details of the freelancer, a link to the profile, a button to remove the freelancer from the blocked for location list, and a button to add a new freelancer to the blocked by location list.

column1: Acceptance criteria:
* Recreate design created by Niels in the ‘new’ React
* Show the list of blocked freelancers for each location. If the location *is_hidden*, don’t show it.
* Keep multi tenancy in mind (viewsets): include *org_id* in all API requests

* Check thoroughly if it works for admins with a large number of locations",,Jona Bosman,,,,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-705,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@7db3cc47,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Web] [Staff/Freelancer] Create function for verified freelancers to request a profile picture update,TDD-696,10744,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,05/Dec/23 10:30 AM,07/May/24 10:55 AM,,02/May/24 10:32 AM,,0,jona,refined,,"Some freelancers update their profile picture to an image that does not show their face (eg a flower). Organisations would like to see the face of the freelancer they plan for a job. This makes them more reliable.

We want to create a function where they can request an update for their profile picture, similar to requesting a document update. So it should not be possible anymore to easily update their profile picture, without the advice team approving their new picture.
Acceptance criteria:
* Add a new field on the Freelancer model: *profile_picture_request*. This field will be empty, unless the freelancer requests a new profile picture.
* Freelancer settings view: [https://platform.tadaah.nl/freelancer/settings/
column2: https://platform.tadaah.nl/freelancer/settings/] they can upload a new picture, but when they’ve uploaded it, a modal should show up with a text explaining the request, and two buttons: “Verzoek indienen” (Send request) and “Terug” (Back). The explaining text:

column1: ”Als je je profielfoto wilt wijzigen, moet het adviesteam de nieuwe foto eerst goedkeuren. Het is belangrijk dat je gezicht goed zichtbaar is op de foto, anders wordt je verzoek afgekeurd.
Klik op “Verzoek indienen” om een verzoek te sturen naar het adviesteam om je nieuwe foto in te stellen.
Klik op “Terug” om je oude profielfoto te behouden.”

(The advice team first has to approve your new profile picture. It is important that the new picture shows your face, otherwise the request will be declined. Click on “Send request” to sent a request to the advice team to update your profile picture. Click on “Back” to keep your old picture.)
!Screenshot 2023-12-05 at 10.19.43.png

* While the request is pending, the text below the profile picture on the Freelancer settings says: “Verzoek in afwachting” (Request pending). This can be based on whether the *profile_picture_request* is empty or not.
* [https://platform.tadaah.nl/staff/poule/freelancers/
column2: https://platform.tadaah.nl/staff/poule/freelancers/] should have an extra filter for profile picture updates. See image. The values for this filter should be “Onbekend” (Unknown, “Ja” (Yes) and “Nee” (No). Filtering on “Yes” should retrieve all Freelancers for which *profile_picture_request* is nog empty, filtering on “No) should retrieve all freelancers for which *profile_picture_request* is empty. Filtering on “Onbekend” should not apply filtering on this field.

column1: !Screenshot 2023-12-12 at 13.37.19.png
* [https://platform.tadaah.nl/staff/poule/freelancers/0000/verify/

This page should show the profiel picture request, just as it shows the document request. The staff can view the new profile picture and decide to approve it by clicking “Profielfoto goedkeuren” (Accept profiel picture). In this case, the profile picture will be updated by setting the value of *profile_picture_request* to *profile_picture* on the Freelancer model, and the *profiel_picture_request* will be cleared/set to empty. When the request is denied, the staff member
the staff member needs to provide a reason which will be communicated to the freelancer. The *profile_picture_request* will be clear/set to empty. This way, the Freelancer could request a new update.
!Screenshot 2023-12-12 at 13.32.53.png

Added notification email content for a rejected profile picture",25/Apr/24 7:40 PM;6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302;[~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] I don’t see any changes. perhaps you didnt press update?,"25/Apr/24 7:46 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;{noformat}Beste {{ user.get_full_name }},
We hebben je verzoek om je profiel foto te wijzigen ontvangen maar helaas voldoet de foto niet aan de vereiste voorwaarden.
Het is belangrijk dat de foto scherp is en je gezicht goed zichtbaar is op de foto, anders wordt je verzoek afgekeurd.
Probeer alsjeblieft een andere foto te uploaden die wel voldoet aan de bovenstaande criteria
Voor vragen of verdere informatie kun je altijd contact opnemen!
Met vriendelijke groet,
Tadaah
info@tadaah.nl
http://www.tadaah.nl
020-7702280{noformat}","25/Apr/24 7:48 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Small change: corrected +wijzingen+ to +wijzigen+ in this text below:
{noformat}Als je je profielfoto wilt wijzigen, moet het adviesteam de nieuwe foto eerst goedkeuren. Het is belangrijk dat je gezicht goed zichtbaar is op de foto, anders wordt je verzoek afgekeurd.
Klik op “Verzoek indienen” om een verzoek te sturen naar het adviesteam om je nieuwe foto in te stellen.
Klik op “Terug” om je oude profielfoto te behouden.”

[APP] Optimizing display of jobads for freelancers,TDD-677,10724,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Dharmesh Bhalala,6389c29d77acd224b341d312,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,21/Nov/23 2:21 PM,08/Feb/24 6:39 AM,,08/Feb/24 6:39 AM,,0,,,,"In de webapp Freelancers can see the day of the week and underneath it, it shows jobads for that day with the jobad starting and ending time, pls find screenshot. In de mobile app the jobads are shown chronologically but the day of the week and the start/end time is not mentioned anywhere. This means the freelancer need to click on jobad to see the exact times and day of the week.
Business goal: freelancers should be able to se in one glance which day and starting times a jobad has. To make our platform user friendly, we should reduce @clicks needed to access full jobad info.
Acceptance Criteria:
* jobads show which day of the week
* jobads have start/-end time displayed
* Jobad display:  a jobad is first sorted on day (mon til friday), then starttime (early til late) and finally sorted on distance to postcode (low to high)
* Please also check period jobs design

As we can see the colourscheme and our logo has changed.
Goal:  We want to make the mobile app also to blend in with this colourscheme.

We already have the new figma screens for the signupflow in the mobile app: [https://www.figma.com/file/kEHK4WDTLUVpYn8kHSsehp/Design-system---mobile-app?type=design&node-id=373-11131&mode=design&t=g1d7y8EKZDcbDV3T-0

We have the new styleguide also to be implemented in the mobile app: [https://www.figma.com/file/kEHK4WDTLUVpYn8kHSsehp/Design-system---mobile-app?type=design&node-id=0%3A1&mode=design&t=H19nZW2XukNvHBDP-1
Acceptance Criteria:
* Change logo and colours (legenda)- New logo [https://www.figma.com/file/vZWPnDihMkmSyexMSO57Je/Design-System---webapp?node-id=2747%3A27303&mode=dev
* Focus on changing existing coloured fields, blocks, gradients into new colour scheme
* Typography changes need to be considered
* Colour codes to be found in [https://www.figma.com/file/kEHK4WDTLUVpYn8kHSsehp/Design-system---mobile-app?type=design&node-id=362-11210&mode=design&t=C1ozUsquD3HzNBO4-0
We need a new app icon image similar to the existing app icon.
*Note*: Tadaah icon and title show vertically in the image

Make sure newly verified freelancer sees jobads (within their competence) for all days as default,TDD-671,10718,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,16/Nov/23 12:50 PM,02/Apr/24 2:46 PM,,02/Apr/24 2:46 PM,,0,,,,Newly verified freelancers are informed to manage their availability if they want to see any jobads. System currently doesn't show any jobad until you have a day/timeslot set as available.
*Business Goal:* From business value point of view, we want freelancers to see that we have plenty jobad for everyone. This might motivate them to work more/and also on days they usually don't work.
*Changes*:
* Decision: When database value changes, we should run the code, regardless of where the changes are made..We cannot trust the verification date “verified at” in admin to rely on.
* A new Freelancers’s availability is set on available for all days when he/she is verified, 3 months from verification date..
* Message Modular : to recommend to use availability function if freelancer sees jobads within their own competence but on days that they aren’t available for sure.
* Filter on [https://platform.tadaah.nl/freelancer/ads/all/
column2: https://platform.tadaah.nl/freelancer/ads/all/] page, add toggle/switch for freelancer to show all jobads regardless of availabilty : Disregarding/ignoring set future dates in availability when filtering jobads

column1: * Use similar styling as in the “disable state” grey button to highlight “an unavailable” day, freelancer is able to accept the jobad anyway
Consider: if “verified at” is not only used for other purposes, manually changes by advice team
Consider changes to be made in availabilty logic, where are “available” days are used: applying for a job, showing interest , visibilty to organisations vice versa..

Consider changes to existing api’s",,Saleh Rabbaniy,,,,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@52612cab,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=3}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":3,""lastUpdated"":""2024-04-02T14:12:26.000+0200"",""stateCount"":3,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":3,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Web] [Backend] [Org] Add VAT-status of freelancer to Job export,TDD-666,10713,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,14/Nov/23 10:48 AM,15/Feb/24 11:49 PM,,15/Feb/24 11:49 PM,,0,jona,,,"Organisations can request a job export, from the Weekplanner, where a number of job properties will be added to a .csv file. The properties are:

*Date, Start time, End time, Break, Start time (actual), End time (actual), Break (actual), Location, Address, Postcode, City, LRK number, Freelancer, Company Name, KvK-number, Rate, Total, Worked hours, Competence, Mediation costs, Cost place of location.*
We want to add a field: *Btw-keuze* (VAT-status) with two options: *Btw-vrijgesteld*  (VAT-exempt) and *21% btw*. This value can be extracted from the Freelancer model.
Discuss:
* It is possible that the freelancer will have changed their VAT-status after completing the jobad. The ‘wrong' VAT status will then be added to the job.
* Possibility of adding the VAT-status to the JobAd.
Acceptance criteria:
* Add field *Btw-keuze* to job export.
[^opdrachten (9).csv]

[Web] [Frontend] [Org] Add freelancers blocked per location to the blocked freelancers page,TDD-665,10712,Story,To Do,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,14/Nov/23 10:36 AM,08/Nov/24 11:53 AM,,,,0,jona,,,"[https://platform.tadaah.nl/organisation/settings/blocked/
column2: https://platform.tadaah.nl/organisation/settings/blocked/] shows an overview of freelancers that are blocked for an organisation. This means freelancers won’t see JobAd from this organisation and thus can’t accept them.

column1: Freelancers can also be blocked by a specific location. The platform only gives an overview of freelancers that are blocked for the whole organisation, but not per location. We will expand the blocked page to also show the blocked by location freelancers.
Acceptance criteria:
* Expand settings-blocked page with blocked-by-location freelancers
* Users can only see blocked-by-location freelancers if they are admin of that location
* The button to Block a freelancer ('Freelancer blokkeren') should be available for the locations

[organisation view] Delete/hide function directly assign to a jobad,TDD-659,10706,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,02/Nov/23 12:36 PM,15/Feb/24 11:49 PM,,15/Feb/24 11:49 PM,,0,,,,"We have/had allowed organisations to directly assign a freelancer to a jobad to save time.

*Problem*: organisation used this function without confirming the jobad first with the freelancer. Freelancers have complained that organisation push them to take jobads in this manner, by directly assigning them.

*Business Model:* Tadaah is a platform matching suplly to demand and doesn’t facilitate employer and employee-like hierarchy. First, by enabling the organisations to directly assign a freelancer the freelancer doesnt’t agree to the jobad him/herself. Second, the contract (opdrachtovereenkomst) should be result of both parties agreeing by clicking themselves.
Directly assign function is now available via URL’s:
* repeat freelancer : organisation/archive,
* repeat freelancer: organisation/jobs/week
* repeat freelancer: organisation/weekplanner
* repeat known freelancer: organisation/poule
[https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/jobs/schedule/483/
!Function directly assign https www.tadaah.nl organisation jobs schedule 483 .png

Secure 'random api' that shows all freelancer documents,TDD-653,10700,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,30/Oct/23 11:07 AM,03/Jan/24 10:49 PM,,03/Jan/24 10:49 PM,,0,to-refine,,,"
There are 2 api’s disclosing freelancer documents to organisations with a verified account.
Changing the freelancer id number in the url shows freelancer profile documents regardless of familiarity with organisations
reported by Saleh:
{quote}{{We don't discuss a lot about privacy & security, but I just came across one of our  APIs/api/organisation/freelancers/{freelancer_id}/details/}}

{color:#ff5630}which is (almost) freely accessible. you only need to be logged in as an organisation admin account.You can use it for example to download all documents of any freelancer. should this be possible / is this allowed?{color}
{color:#ff5630}e.g. {color}
{{1.https://platform.tadaah.nl/api/organisation/freelancers/5001/details/}}{color:#ff5630}same for{color}
{{2. https://platform.tadaah.nl/api/organisation/users/{user_id}/details/}}{quote}
[https://tadaahbv.slack.com/archives/C04QYBMGKV1/p1698326242709479?thread_ts=1698326238.397289&cid=C04QYBMGKV1
Acceptance Criteria:
* allow organisation to fetch documents of familiar /known/favourite freelancers,
* we don’t allow organisations to see documents of freelancers who have shown interest in period jobs or interest jobs on location level.
* organisation will always see titles of verified documents of a freelancer when they are not assigned
* In UI of not assigned jobads, such as in period, interest jobads there is no download link for documents in jobad details
* endpoint to look at jobid/jobad to fetch only documents for assigned freelancers

* Only location admins have access to the api.",,ICT,Tanya Lyabik,,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,557058:a45a5ea8-6f14-4f87-b402-eaead1d584b5,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@7621b6e4,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[WEB] [Organisation]: Add organisation comment to NoShow model,TDD-652,10699,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,27/Oct/23 2:26 PM,21/Apr/24 10:02 AM,,21/Apr/24 10:02 AM,,0,,,,"When a freelancer cancels a JobAd last minute (between 24 hours before the job starts), they have to provide a reason. After cancelling, a NoShow object is created for the freelancer that contains this reason. Organisations receive an email stating that the freelancer cancelled last minute.

If they think the cancellation is inappropriate, they can report that by clicking a URL from the email and provide the reason why they think the cancellation is inappropriate. (Saving this report will give an Internal Server Error, [https://tadaah.atlassian.net/browse/TDD-616
column3: smart-link] deals with this). The freelancer account will be blocked after this report and they will receive an email. The organisation can do this in the view {{report_illegal_no_show}} in {{view_organisation.py}}

column1: We want to add the reason provided by the organisation to the NoShow model, upon saving their report. This makes it clearer for the advice team to know why this happened. Freelancers usually still call them asking why they are on non active. If the field for the Organisation reason on the NoShow model is not empty, the advice team knows the cancellation has been reported.
It would be clear to rename the existing {{message}} property on the NoShow model to {{freelancer_message}} and to add a new property {{organisation_message}}.

The organisation can also report a NoShow: when the freelancers doesn’t show up and the Organisation reports them as sick. The organisation provides a reason, and this reason is added to {{NoShow.message}}. It would be clear if this is added to the new property: {{organisation_message}}.
Acceptance criteria:
* Rename NoShow property {{message}} to {{freelancer}}
* org message
* Add Organisation message to {{NoShow.organisation_message}}when they report a bad cancellation from freelancer (view {{report_illegal_no_show)}}
* Add organisation message to new {{NoShow.organisation_message}} instead of old {{NoShow.message}}when reporting a freelancer to be sick from the Weekplanner (see image 1 and 2)
!image1.png
!Screenshot 2023-10-31 at 12.02.29.png
* Add freelancer message to new {{NoShow.organisation_message}} instead of old {{NoShow.message}} when freelancer cancels last minute in [https://dev.tadaah.nl/freelancer/job/451576/sick/
[https://github.com/TadaahBV/tadaah/pull/1162
column7: *_10011_*:*_1_*:*_1103988742,"31/Oct/23 11:48 AM;633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1;[~accountid:636cf7ab96243ac755ee69a0] I still need to discuss this ticket with Gulhan, so it was actually not ready for development yet. So it will be updated","31/Oct/23 12:57 PM;636cf7ab96243ac755ee69a0;[~accountid:633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1] I have implemented the model changes, added to admin, and made changes to view to add the reason to the model.

column1: After you discuss with Gulhan, you can edit the branch code.
The PR: [https://github.com/TadaahBV/tadaah/pull/1162

[WEB] [Organisation] [Weekplanner] Add function to transform interest job to speed,TDD-651,10698,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,27/Oct/23 2:01 PM,02/Feb/24 10:14 AM,,01/Feb/24 8:57 PM,,0,,,,"Add the functionality to transform a interest job to a speed job. This will help organisations to get their jobs filled quicker.

This would be added to the job options in the Weekplanner. The name of the functions is *Omzetten naar spoeddienst* (transform to speed job) (used in period jobs) and clicking this function will trigger a modal asking: *Weet u zeker dat u deze keuzedienst wil omzetten naar een spoeddienst? De dienst wordt dan zichtbaar voor geschikte freelancers op het platform en de freelancer die de dienst als eerste accepteert wordt gelijk ingepland.*  (Are you sure you want to transform this job to a speed job? This job will be visible for all suited freelancers on the platform and the freelancer that accepts this job first will be assigned.).
Modal options are *Ga terug* (go back)  and *Omzetten naar spoeddienst* (transform into speedjob)

When “Transform to speedjob” is selected, the {{accept_now}} property on the job will be set to {{True}} and the interested list will be cleared. So it doesn’t matter if the job already had some interested freelancers, though this function is probably used most when there are now freelancers interested.
The function will only be available if there are no freelancers already interested in this job.
*Acceptance criteria:*
* Add button the job actions in weekplanner *Omzetten naar spoeddienst*
* This function is only present in the function list when the job is a interest job and when there are no interested freelancers
* Upon clicking on the function, a modal will show

* Upon confirmation of modal, {{JobAd.accept_now}} will be set to *True* and {{JobAd.interested}} will be cleared.",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,31/Oct/23 1:58 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermafbeelding 2023-10-31 om 13.53.35 (8daf32be-a218-4323-8888-5ff304a163a8).png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10358,31/Oct/23 1:53 PM;637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3;Schermafbeelding 2023-10-31 om 13.53.35.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10357,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@6c44d1d1,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

integrate Tailwind merge library in front-end code,TDD-647,10694,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,26/Oct/23 12:17 PM,03/Jan/24 10:49 PM,,03/Jan/24 10:49 PM,,0,,,,"Currently we are using “classNames” to configure all the styling classes with tailwind.
The issue with this solution : when passing classes for same attributes with different values, it renders all the passed classes instead of the last one, (like css works).
multiple styling , layout bugs can take place with this solution especially on the core components.

Solution: Replace “classNames” with “tw-merge” in all front end code.",,Tellache Imad,,,,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@1f0b85af,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: New weekplanner - Interest jobs colour stays orange when interested freelancer is no longer available,TDD-629,10676,Bug,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,23/Oct/23 2:14 PM,25/Oct/23 11:14 AM,,24/Oct/23 11:10 AM,,0,,,,"Following Bug was reported by Kindergarden (Child care organisation):

*Case as decscribed:* One freelancer shows interest in a interest job at company A but then this one freelancer assigned to another jobad at company B. Company A sees that the interest jobad is still orange, sees the one freelancer listed on the jobad but cannot take action This should not be the case and need to be fixed.
To be checked:
* Does the system think there is interest and that's the reason that the colour orage is still shown?
*Acceptance criteria:*
* when a freelancer is assigned to any jobad at date X, his or her shown interest in lists of other jobads for date X should be cancelled as he/she is no longer available on that specific day

* When there is no available interested freelancer for an interest jobad, this jobad should be blank",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@13872d2b,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-10-23T19:43:41.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: [App] Adjust text for when freelancer cancels last minute,TDD-619,10666,Subtask,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Dharmesh Bhalala,6389c29d77acd224b341d312,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,17/Oct/23 4:21 PM,03/Jan/24 1:18 PM,,03/Jan/24 1:18 PM,,0,,,,"Inform freelancers they will be put on non-active for 24 hours automatically when they try to cancel the job within 24 hours of the job starting.
Message: [~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] could you please provide the message?
Places where freelance can cancel the job:
* acceptance job page
* the mobile app
There are now 3 screens with information for the freelancer for when they last minute cancel. This should be brought back to 1 screen and the info should be adjusted to this:
!app-freelancer-cancel-3.jpeg
!app-freelancer-cancel-2.jpeg
!app-freelancer-cancel-1.jpeg
Update 7 november 2023:
New text:
Weet je zeker dat je deze dienst wil afzeggen?

Voor organisaties is het heel vervelend om zo laat van tevoren een afzegging te krijgen. Ze moeten dan heel snel een nieuwe invaller vinden, anders kan het zijn dat er een groep gesloten moet worden en worden kinderen en ouders teleurgesteld.

Als je echt niet kunt, kun je jezelf laten vervangen. Onder ""Opdrachten"" kun je je dienst terugvinden, en op ""Vervangen"" klikken. Dan krijg je een link die je naar een andere Tadaah freelancer kunt sturen die je dienst kan overnemen.

Als je de dienst toch afzegt, kom je 24 uur lang op een blokkade te staan, waarin je geen nieuwe diensten kunt aannemen. Als je 3 keer per maand een dienst binnen 24 uur voor aanvang annuleert, wordt je profiel voor langere periode non-actief gesteld. Je kunt dan contact opnemen met het adviesteam.
!app-freelancer-cancel-new.jpeg

Weet je zeker dat je deze dienst wil afzeggen?

Als je echt niet kunt, kun je jezelf laten vervangen. Onder ""Opdrachten"" kun je je dienst terugvinden, en op ""Vervangen"" klikken. Dan krijg je een link die je naar een andere Tadaah freelancer kunt sturen die je dienst kan overnemen.

Als je de dienst toch afzegt, kom je 24 uur lang op een blokkade te staan, waarin je geen nieuwe diensten kunt aannemen. Als je 3 keer per maand een dienst binnen 24 uur voor aanvang annuleert, wordt je profiel voor langere periode non-actief gesteld. Je kunt dan contact opnemen met het adviesteam.

column1: [Web] [Organisation] - Report no show for freelancer link in email gives an error ,TDD-616,10663,Bug,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Madhav,636cf7ab96243ac755ee69a0,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,17/Oct/23 4:03 PM,02/Nov/23 10:53 AM,,31/Oct/23 10:41 AM,,0,,,,"2 organisations (1 is Compananny) reported that when they want to report a unjustified no-show for a freelancer, the link to the page where they can report this gives an Internal Server Error. This doesn’t happen for all no-shows of the organisation.
!Internal server error.png
The email they receive is {{job_no_show_organisation.txt}}, and the url leads to the view {{report_illegal_no_show()}}.
It seems that this error comes when you click on “Verwerken”.
!Screenshot 2023-10-26 at 15.47.24.png
Acceptance criteria:
* Find out why the Internal Server Error is generated

* Make sure that doesn’t happen anymore",,Jona Bosman,Madhav,,,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,636cf7ab96243ac755ee69a0,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-652,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,24/Oct/23 3:24 PM;633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1;Internal server error.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10352,26/Oct/23 3:48 PM;633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1;Screenshot 2023-10-26 at 15.47.24.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10355,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@1afea982,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-10-31T06:01:49.000+0100"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Web] [Backend] - 3 Freelancers got a double postcode on their invoices,TDD-615,10662,Bug,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,17/Oct/23 2:58 PM,10/Nov/23 11:18 AM,,10/Nov/23 11:18 AM,,0,,,,"There have been reports of 3 freelancers that see a double postcode on their invoices: Sanne Voskuijl (see image 1) and Charlotte Nachtegaal,  Astrid Holland.
!Image 1.png
The invoice should look like as in image 2.
!Image 2.png
On the Invoice model, the raw address is the full string of Street name, Number, Number extension, Postcode and City, leaving out the elements that are empty.

In {{invocie_pdf.py}}, first the raw address is shown, but then also the {{freelancer_address.postal_code}} and {{freelancer_address.city}} This would result in the double postcode, but then the question remains: why does this not go wrong for all freelancers?

During the creation of the Addresses model (to support a Home and a different Work address for freelancers), the addres-fields on the Freelancer model were migrated to the new Address model, including the raw address. Judging the code in {{invoice_pdf.py}}, it is likely that the old {{raw_address}} on the freelancer model consisted of only the street and number, and then the postcode and city were separate fields. So this would set the {{raw_address}} field on the Address model to the street and number. But upon saving the Address, the raw address is created by adding the street, number, extension, *postcode and city.*

This would mean that freelancers who’ve saved their address after the new Address model was released, would all have a double postcode on their invoice, and only freelancers who didn’t save it, would not have a double postcode. This last group would be getting smaller and smaller.
We can discuss what to do in refinement, I think there are 2 options:

# We run a management command to explicitly save the addresses of the freelancers, so that the raw_address contains all the elements, also postcode. And then we remove the extra postcode and city field from the invoice.
# We change the save code on the Address model to set the raw address to only the *street name, house number* and potential *house number extension.*
Acceptance criteria:
* The invoices of all Freelancers should show the postcode only once

Debug Export Invoices functionality,TDD-603,10650,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,11/Oct/23 4:54 PM,06/Feb/24 2:58 PM,,06/Feb/24 7:58 AM,,0,,,,"We export invoice data to Exact online via functionality on Staff page  [[https://stage.tadaah.nl/staff/exactonline/
Sometimes the run doesnt run smoothly and gets stuk/pauses. Can we please check and repair the following:
* Look into possibilities to refresh token and automate invoicing
* Check why the export is not working check if it needs debugging
* Check how we can atomatically refresh tokens

column1: New contract to replace old one for jobads,TDD-599,10646,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,09/Oct/23 12:49 PM,15/Feb/24 11:48 PM,,15/Feb/24 11:48 PM,,0,,,,"{color:#ff5630}New line in contract: 1.3.      De opdracht komt overeen met de dienst zoals geplaatst door opdrachtgever op het- platform Tadaah onder nummer [job id number - xxx.xxxxxxxxx]{color}
Contract content has changed due to changes in legal, used definitions (such as liability) are defined clearer.
We would like the old contract to be replaced by the new one attached.
Yellow markings in the text are to indicate where certain data (freelancer/organisation) has to be auto filled.
New contract template will only be used for jobads from 1st of February.

Old contract template will only be used for offline completed jobad prior to 1st feb.",,ICT,ICT Tadaah,,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-468,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@1df30453,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2024-02-14T15:33:33.000+0100"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,Impediment,,,,,,,,,1

column1: [FE - js] - On create regular Job Ads, add organisation input and get location and rate rule,TDD-585,10632,Subtask,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Madhav,636cf7ab96243ac755ee69a0,Madhav,636cf7ab96243ac755ee69a0,29/Sep/23 8:09 AM,18/Jan/24 11:09 AM,,18/Jan/24 11:09 AM,,0,,,,"Goal: When creating *any* Job Ad, the rate rule should automatically be filled based on the organization selected.
*Acceptance criteria:*
* Add a dropdown field to select the organization of the logged-in user.
* Based on organisation selected, fetch a list of Locations and Rate rules for that organisation via API.

* In case the rate rule for a specific competence is missing, inform the user that the selected competence rate rule is missing, and the standard rate rule is applied via a modal. This already exists. Check once more. [https://tadaah.atlassian.net/browse/TDD-464

* {color:#bf2600}UPDATE: apply to all type of jobads{color}",,ICT,Madhav,Saleh Rabbaniy,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,636cf7ab96243ac755ee69a0,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@14c33c46,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=3}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":3,""lastUpdated"":""2023-12-27T09:36:46.000+0100"",""stateCount"":3,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":3,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Bug: organisations cannot create or save admin accounts,TDD-570,10617,Bug,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,19/Sep/23 2:36 PM,10/Oct/23 4:26 PM,,10/Oct/23 4:26 PM,,0,Backend,,,"[https://tadaah.nl/organisation/settings/user/12074/edit/

As reported and demonstrated by the advice team, an organisation cannot save an admin user. It results in an internal server error, because upon saving, it assumes the user is a freelancer. But as these are organisation admin account, they will never have a freelancer. First, it should be checked IF the user has a freelancer.",,Jona Bosman,Yashavnt Andure,,,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,63e0a07bc2b1cb6b3472df23,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,27/Sep/23 1:43 PM;63e0a07bc2b1cb6b3472df23;image-20230927-114258.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10329,27/Sep/23 2:04 PM;633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1;image.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10330,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@7f26c999,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-09-27T10:27:00.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: For the labels I would consider thinking about what the colour is implying. I.e. is green good? Is a ‘persoonlijke’ shift good? The same with yellow. Yellow indicates some sort of warning or notice. Does the message ‘lange opdracht’ correspond with that colour usage?
If we would get this screen redesigned to the new colours, we could make the colour usage consistent.",,,,,,,,,10573,[WEB] Freelancer View - Show Jobad Labels ,Done,07/Nov/23 6:14 AM

column1: [WEB]: Replace labels for Freelancers and Organisation jobs/week,TDD-540,10587,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Tanya Lyabik,557058:a45a5ea8-6f14-4f87-b402-eaead1d584b5,Tanya Lyabik,557058:a45a5ea8-6f14-4f87-b402-eaead1d584b5,31/Aug/23 11:54 AM,19/Sep/23 10:27 AM,,16/Sep/23 11:43 PM,,0,,,,"PLs label the jobads according new definitions:
Interest jobs - keuzeopdracht [Keuze]
Urgent jobs (was invaldiensten) - spoedopdracht [Spoed]
Personal jobads (by invitation) - Persoonlijke opdracht [Persoonllijk]
( Period Jobads - to be confirmed after weekplanner and period job view is finalized.)
*Acceptance criteria:*
Please scan platform to check where these changes are required:
* For organisationview in jobs/week, archive/export following URL’s contain labels
[https://stage.tadaah.nl/organisation/jobs/week/
* For freelancerview in jobs/ads URL’s contain labels to be changed or added
[https://stage.tadaah.nl/freelancer/ads/all/
[https://stage.tadaah.nl/freelancer/ads/period/
[https://stage.tadaah.nl/freelancer/jobs/

VAT on freelancer invoice should be rounded up to two decimals,TDD-529,10576,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Madhav,636cf7ab96243ac755ee69a0,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,28/Aug/23 5:43 PM,23/Oct/23 3:41 PM,,19/Oct/23 10:39 AM,,0,,,,"Freelancers with VAT duty send invoice such as screenshot.
As is visible invoicetotal doesn’t match the sum of
Reason for this: 21% (VAT percentage) of €297,50 = €62,475
On the invoice the VAT line should be €62,48 and not €62,47
Acceptance criteria:
* invoice total matches the sum (total hours plus VAT)when VAT line is rounded up.
!IMG_7186.jpg
UPDATED:
* Round at each instance of calculation.
* Round hours, job totals, invoice total, invoice vat and invoice total after VAT

* Changes should reflect in Frontend, PDF",,ICT Tadaah,Madhav,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,636cf7ab96243ac755ee69a0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,28/Aug/23 5:48 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;IMG_7186.jpg;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10317,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@7f146118,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: Interest jobs bug: Break time Validation is not the same, need to apply for all jobs,TDD-527,10574,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,24/Aug/23 1:27 PM,16/Sep/23 11:42 PM,,16/Sep/23 11:42 PM,,0,,,,"[https://github.com/TadaahBV/tadaah/pull/1098
Break time Validation is not the same, need to apply for all jobs
*I. For short-term jobs break time limit is 0-90 min*
*II. For period jobs no break time limit user is able to put 1000 min*
*III. For interest-based jobs break time limit is 0-60 min*
SC-1:: [https://prnt.sc/gGnknt-gkRH8
SC-2: [https://prnt.sc/LXyXbjczTF74
*Acceptance Criteria:*
* All jobs break time should be between 0-90 minutes
[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1yJPeFQB6byKgDrK4YLzT7j7qjchhbLLzVBLGWna3umw/edit#gid=539613733

[WEB] Freelancer View - Show Jobad Labels ,TDD-526,10573,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,,,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,24/Aug/23 1:25 PM,10/Nov/23 11:18 AM,,10/Nov/23 11:18 AM,,0,,,,"This ticket relates to a new feature added to the freelancer view on the platform.
It’s nice for the freelancer to have an visual/ overview of which type of jobads were accepted by him/her at [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/jobs/week/
column2: https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/jobs/week/], for example by usung the labeling features we already have and use when freelancers select a jobad  via [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/ads/all/

column1: Find screenshot:  labels miss/could have been added to the jobads.
Identical label for both url’s [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/jobs/week
* “spoed” for speed or spoedopdracht(*)
* “keuze”
* “persoonlijk”
*  “lange opdracht” and “persoonlijk”

* when an organisation is posting a speedjob and they select 1 freelancer to invite, then the freelancer will see this job in the job ads page as ""Personal"". When they select 2 freelancers to invite, both freelancers will see the job in the job ads page as ""Speed"".
[https://prnt.sc/Cudyz92a115w

Make sure correct rate rules are applied when user is admin of multiple organisations,TDD-521,10568,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,22/Aug/23 10:58 AM,15/Jan/24 10:06 AM,,15/Jan/24 10:06 AM,,0,,,,"Case: When an user is admin of multiple organisations at the same time and places a jobad for a competence without a rate rule set for it at the settings… System uses rate rule from one of the other organisation’s hat the user is admin of.
This case became clear when we were adding modals for lack of rate rules for competences during the placement of a jobad
*Acceptance criteria:*

* Add field to select organisation name when user is admin of multiple organisations (dropdown) to all jobadforms. - filter based on selected organisation the correct rate rules and locations and fetched. -(API- details to be discussed at thext TECH MEETING) [~accountid:633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1]
* If user is admin of 1 organisation organisation name field is invisible/visible (no preference)
* system to inform organisation when rate rule is missing for the selected competence , via modal. This exists [https://tadaah.atlassian.net/browse/TDD-464
column3: smart-link] in case that competence rate rule is missing, organisation is informed that standard rate rule is applied.",,ICT Tadaah,Madhav,Tanya Lyabik,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,636cf7ab96243ac755ee69a0,557058:a45a5ea8-6f14-4f87-b402-eaead1d584b5,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@5aac7391,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: FreelancerView - Ask freelancer to confirm to accept jobad,TDD-492,10539,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,07/Aug/23 5:20 PM,27/Sep/23 10:11 PM,,27/Sep/23 10:11 PM,,0,,,,"Regarding all type of jobads:

Goal: Currently we show modal to inform the freelancer that the selected jobad has been accepted by her.   We need a step in between to avoid the number of cancellations. This causes problems especially when the specs of a spoeddienst (urgent jobad placed via wizard)  was not read carefully. We want to solve this problem by asking the freelancer if he/she is sure to accept the jobad for sure?
Acceptance criteria:
* First Ask freelancer is he/she is sure to accept the jobad via modal via question “are you sure to accept the selected jobad..”
New Message via modal should say:
>> “ Weet je zeker dat je deze opdracht wilt accepteren? “ >>
>> ja / nee << option
* Check if [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/ads/all/
column2: https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/ads/all/] is new React if so, use new toasts when clicked “yes” instead of modal visible in screenshot.
