column1: TESTING - Interest jobs,TDD-490,10537,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Yashavnt Andure,63e0a07bc2b1cb6b3472df23,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,04/Aug/23 2:35 PM,19/Sep/23 10:27 AM,,14/Sep/23 12:12 PM,,0,,,,"Please test the following criteria:
* Organisations can place an interest job at [http://localhost:8000/organisation/jobs/place/interest/
* Organisations cannot place interest jobs that start less than 72 hours from now
* Freelancers can see interest jobs at [http://localhost:8000/freelancer/ads/all/
* Freelancers can click Interest on Interested jobs
* 3 days before an interest jobs starts, organisations receive a reminder to assign a freelancer if:
** There are freelancers interested but no one is assigned yet
** There are no freelancers interested yet
* 2 days before an interest job starts, the job will be cancelled if:
** There are no freelancers interested
** No freelancer has been assigned.

Organisations will receive a message of this, also stating the reason of cancellation.",,Jona Bosman,,,,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@6fb90a31,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Organisation] Interest jobs: reminder modal for short term interest jobs ,WORKFLOW-69,10535,Task,To Do,WORKFLOW,Minor Workflow Improvements,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,04/Aug/23 1:58 PM,02/Nov/23 11:47 AM,,,,0,,,,"Organisations can place an interest job up to 72 hours before it starts. This means that they can place a jobad for Thursday at 8:00 AM at last on Monday 8:00 AM, no later. For Thursday at 12:00 PM, this will be Monday 12:00 PM. 3 days before the jobad starts, at 8:30 AM, organisations will get a reminder that they still have 24 hours to assign someone. The next day at 8:30, if no one is assigned, the job will be cancelled.

Something to be aware of, is that when an org places a JobAd on Monday 12:00 PM for Thursday, they will miss the reminder notification, because they should’ve been sent at 8:30 AM Monday morning. The job didn’t exist then, so they didn’t get the notification. But, the next day (Tuesday, at 8:30) the job will be automatically cancelled, if no one is assigned.
So, I would like to give the organisations some extra info when placing these jobads.
I would suggest to show a modal upon saving the interest jobad ([http://localhost:8000/organisation/jobs/place/interest/
column2: http://localhost:8000/organisation/jobs/place/interest/]) when this case applies. It should show when:

column1: * The jobs starts less than 96 hours from now, and
* tomorrow at 8:30 - now is less than 24 hours.
The modal can look like the modal in [http://localhost:8000/organisation/wizard/
column2: http://localhost:8000/organisation/wizard/] when the job is placed less than 24 hours before it starts.

column1: !Screenshot 2023-08-04 at 13.54.42.png
The text of the buttons can remain the same:
{{Annuleer opdracht}} and {{Akkoord, plaats opdracht}}.
The main text of the modal should be:

{{Let op: u plaatst een keuze invalopdracht die binnenkort plaatsvindt. U heeft nog tot {next_day at 8:30 AM} om een freelancer toe te wijzen. Daarna wordt de dienst automatisch geannuleerd. Als u meer tijd nodig heeft, kunt u een spoed invaldienst plaatsen.}}

To be clear, {{next_day at 8:30 AM}} is a variable. Preferably this would be bold.",,Jona Bosman,,,,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,04/Aug/23 1:58 PM;633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1;Screenshot 2023-08-04 at 13.54.42.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10300,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@57a19ef0,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Organisation] Interest jobs: add "action required" label for job status in weekplanner,TDD-487,10534,Subtask,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,04/Aug/23 1:36 PM,05/Feb/24 9:31 AM,,05/Feb/24 9:31 AM,,0,,,,"With the new restrictions for interest jobs (assign a freelancer two days before it starts otherwise it will be cancelled), it would be nice if orgs have an overview of which interest jobs will almost be cancelled, and which jobs already have someone assigned.
Currently, there are some colors
* Light green for when a job is assigned
* Orange for when there are freelancers interested in an interest job
I would suggest to change the orange to yellow, and to make an interest job orange (and if it is already yellow then a darker shade of yellow) when the job will almost be cancelled.

At 8:30 AM each morning, a crontab job is run that sends reminders to orgs when they have 24 hours left to assign a freelancer to an interest job. Let’s change the job color to orange as soon as they receive this reminder. We could check it like this: if tomorrow at 8:30 - now < 24 hours → orange.
So in summary:
* Speed job is assigned → light green
* Interest job is assigned → light green
* Freelancer is interested in job → yellow
* Freelancer is interested in job AND if tomorrow 8:30 - now is less than 24 hours → darker yellow
* No freelancers are interested AND if tomorrow 8:30 - now is less than 24 hours → orange
!Screenshot 2023-08-04 at 13.36.24.png
column2: width=1279,height=367!",,ICT Tadaah,Jona Bosman,Niels Rozemeijer,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2,,,,,,,,,,TDD-475,TDD-612,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,04/Aug/23 1:36 PM;633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1;Screenshot 2023-08-04 at 13.36.24.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10299,29/Aug/23 9:37 AM;ug:000c21e9-4191-46b8-9613-f65c4ad93239;Screenshot 2023-08-29 at 09.37.25.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10318,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@45d5bc7e,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1
column8: *_10014_*:*_1_*:*_2511,21/Aug/23 11:47 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;@niels PLs incorporate the new weekplanner UI with the jobtype ”interest job”,21/Aug/23 11:48 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Can you pls come with suggestions: using different colors showing urgency i.e. Action is required,23/Aug/23 1:51 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;[~accountid:70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2] ,"29/Aug/23 9:37 AM;70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2;Hi everyone. My proposal would be the following:

column1: * Use icons to show what the shift type is (i.e. spoed, keuze, etc). To make sure users understand these icons, use tooltips to explain the shift type.
* For the status of the shift:
** When the shift is assigned, shown freelancer name it is assigned to
** When shift is open, show banner to highlight that it is open
** When a freelancer is interested, show banner to highlight that there is interest
* When a shift is coming up in the next 24 hours and there is no freelancer accepted or interested, there is multiple options to go with. [I’ve added all options here

* I dislike the background colour. I’m afraid the page will quickly become a colouring book where every colour will lose meaning (which is exactly not the situation you want to be in), next to all the accessibility issues.
* I like the combination of border colour and copy most (see screenshot below)
!Screenshot 2023-08-29 at 09.37.25.png

What do you think? Let me know if I’ve missed some use cases.","30/Aug/23 11:08 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;@niels, Thank you for your suggestion. I will discuss this with the team following Wednesday during refinement session.
Is it an idea to add the jobtype icons to jobtype filter on the left of the weekplanner or a legenda?

It’s a bit of a puzzle for me as well. Can you pls confirm the arrows 😉","11/Sep/23 9:07 AM;70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2;[~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] I like that idea of adding the icons to the jobtype filters. It would build more knowledge for users to understand the icons.
What do you means with ‘confirm the arrows’? Which arrows are you talking about?
And let me know if you discussed it with the team and what the feedback was.",,,,,,,10659,[Weekplanner] - Move completely to new design,Done,05/Feb/24 9:31 AM

column1: Tadaah receives fixed sum when organisation cancels a assigned jobad within 24 hours to start,WORKFLOW-89,10531,Task,To Do,WORKFLOW,Minor Workflow Improvements,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,03/Aug/23 12:06 PM,02/Nov/23 12:39 PM,,,,0,to-refine,,,"Goal:
* If a jobad is cancelled within 24 hours before the jobad would start then tadaah invoicesthe mediation fee. (logic/trigger: late cancellation in jobad)
* Jobad should be invoiced equal to the fixed sum, €10 (not definitive)
* Mediation invoice should show “cancellation fee followed by info. of which jobad was cancelled, show location, freelancer.
Check Logic:
How does the current invoicing mediation fee work
Is it possible to invoice cancelled jobad via “late cancellation status in jobad”?
Examples of invoices (templates)
-invoice per location
-invoices aggregated (location and freelancers all in 1 invoice)
[^EigenWijs_2022_12.pdf]
Check how Steven and DIneke want to mention this on invoice per location and aggregated invoice

Alg VW en Bemiddelingsovereenkomst  should be revised if this rule is implemented",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,22/Aug/23 12:10 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;EigenWijs_2022_12.pdf;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10313,22/Aug/23 11:54 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;inv23702333.PDF;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10312,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@2105e7b,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[DRAFT] Organisationview - add selecting freelancer options for interest jobads (same as wizard),TDD-477,10524,Story,blocked,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,03/Aug/23 10:41 AM,08/Nov/24 11:54 AM,,,,0,to-refine,,,"Status:
Needs UX, best to pick up this ticket after the weekplanner/new react pages.

Once the interest jobs are reintroduced to the users we can continue the refinement of this option: giving the organisations the option to only invite favourites for interest jobs. This is an option that already exists for urgent jobs (wizard).
pls find screenshot for illustration

Acceptance criteria:

* After entering page 1 of interest jobad form, organisation is directed to the page where organisation can select freelancers, favorites or invite everyone as is with the [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/wizard/
column2: https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/wizard/]   [~accountid:6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d] does this function need to be developed better?   If yes, can we do the redesign later and use old design also for interest jobs? To be discussed at Tech meeting.

column1: * This pageand flow thereafter is identical to the wizard jobad form flow.
The main goal is to make it possible for organization to select a set of freelancer who can show interest in the  an interest job.
This feature already exists in the wizard where the urgent / personal job ads are created. So we can slightly extend the existing wizard in terms of functionality by adding  a selection field:
* automatic assignment ==> creates an urgent / personal job ad.
* manual assignment ==> create an interest job ad.
*Backend:*
To do so we must adjust the backend slightly to accept the new field and create the job ad based on the organization choice.
*Frontend:*
add a field to the job creation form (first step in the wizard page) with a nice explanation (help text).
** The wizard code is bad, we have two options :
* just extend the wizard and have the needed functionality for interest jobs. *( + fast   ,  - keep maintaining bad code)*

* recreate a proper wizard in the new react app.  ie: to migrate the wizard + add the feature. *(+ nice code and look  , - requires time)*",,ICT,ICT Tadaah,Tanya Lyabik,Tellache Imad,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,557058:a45a5ea8-6f14-4f87-b402-eaead1d584b5,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,07/Aug/23 5:31 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2023-08-07 om 17.22.45.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10301,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@34844b8d,,,,,{},,,,Impediment,,,,,,,,,1

Make contract static - mutations after assignment are not applied,TDD-468,10515,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,01/Aug/23 1:15 PM,18/Dec/23 10:54 AM,,11/Dec/23 7:28 PM,,0,,,,"Once a jobad is assigned to a freelancer the contract regarding the jobad (all jobdetails) is available in both freelancer - and organisation view.

Currently, this contract is dynamic, meaning that each mutation in the actual jobad is also changed in the contract. We would like to make the contract static: not susceptible to any mutations for variable used in the contract. This might be information such as KvK, VAT status, rates, location

Business Goal: All accurate information doesn’t have to be displayed in the contract. The contract is an initial draw up of an intention to work together and actual completion might differ from the initial intention, data provided/accepted.
Acceptance criteria:
* Contract is drawn up once at assignment and will not be susceptible to mutations =  static
* Jobad will show final data including any mutations
* Therefore, data used for the invoice, will be applied from the jobad itself. As is the case now. Nothing changes here
* VAT status will be taken from the freelancer’s profile at the point of the freelancer accepting the jobad..
* Store contract at the moment that is assigned and downloadable for both organisations and freelancers.
Technical:

* Refactoring needed for export function of contracts = secure these so only location admins have access the data in the contract. By default S3 URL details wil not be exposed, create s3 key, exposed users with permission.
* API changes (also for the app) are needed where contracts are used

* Check all places where contract are downloadable - also in app",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-666,,,,,,,TDD-599,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@517e97ef,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

CLONE of TD 425- Personal (staff/poule/freelancer) jobads copies VAT exempt rate rather than max hourly tariff from settings,TDD-459,10506,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,25/Jul/23 2:40 PM,14/Aug/23 3:23 PM,,08/Aug/23 10:32 AM,,0,,,,"We recently tackled the period jobad when the maximum rate of the organisation was not applied when the freelncer was VAT exempt. Possibly the same thing is the case for the personal “poule” jobads. That is, when a VAT exempt freelancer has a higher rate, the maximum rate of the organisation is overruled by the rate of the freelancer (this is problem when the rate of the freelancer is higher).

Organisations “Babino”, “SKBNM” and “Welschap Kinderopvang” have complained that after resolving ticket TD-425, 'the higher rate than indicated on the jobad' problem still exists. Can we hijack and test the flow of personal invitations?
Check folowing Facts:

* Period jobs which are assigned become individual personal invitations. Is this flow checked? Which rate applied when jobad is confirmed? We need to check both freelancers who are VAT exempt and VAT liable

* Poule jobads are personal invitations. Is this route checked? Which rate applies when you invite a freelancer who has a higher rate? We need to check both freelancers who are VAT exempt and VAT liable

* Have competence rates influence on the rates that are applied? We have reports of preset rates (settings) not being prefilled accordingly in jobadforms. Example: rates at settings for buitenschoolse opvang is €35 but the prefilled rate in a poule invitation jobadform shows prefilled rate of €40 [[https://tadaah.atlassian.net/browse/TDD-458
Below copy of TD-425
When an VAT exempt freelancer accepts a jobad which has a lower hourly rate than theirs, the system applies hourly rate of the freelancer. Anyone available asap to tackle/refine this problem?
Example 1: When VAt exempt freelancers hourly rate is lower than max rate of organisation
Luc got the jobad for €32.00  instead of  the max of €37.50.
!image008.png
Example 2:
When VAt exempt freelancers hourly rate is higher than max rate of organisation
Riana got the jobad for €40.00 instead of €35.00.
!image009.png

Freelancer - Adjust information screen for last minute cancel screen for freelancer,TDD-457,10504,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,21/Jul/23 7:23 PM,03/Jan/24 1:19 PM,,03/Jan/24 1:19 PM,,0,jona,to-refine,,"Inform freelancers they will be put on non-active for 24 hours automatically when they try to cancel the job within 24 hours of the job starting.
Message: [~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] could you please provide the message?
Places where freelance can cancel the job:
- acceptance job page
- the mobile app
There are now 3 screens with information for the freelancer for when they last minute cancel. This should be brought back to 1 screen and the info should be adjusted to this:
“Weet je zeker dat je deze dienst wil afzeggen?

Voor organisaties is het heel vervelend om zo laat van tevoren een afzegging te krijgen. Ze moeten dan heel snel een nieuwe invaller vinden. Zeg dus alleen af als je een hele goede reden hebt. Als je toch afzegt, kom je tijdelijk op een blokkade te staan en kun je voor 24 uur lang geen nieuwe diensten meer aannemen. Als je deze dienst niet kunt werken, kun je namelijk ook geen andere dienst werken.

Als je vaak kort van tevoren afzegt, zal ons advies team contact met je opnemen en kan je profiel op non-actief worden gezet.”",,Jona Bosman,,,,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@345538cb,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

User is able to post job at past days (past dates).,TDD-436,10483,Subtask,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,,,Yashavnt Andure,63e0a07bc2b1cb6b3472df23,Yashavnt Andure,63e0a07bc2b1cb6b3472df23,30/Jun/23 9:10 AM,05/Dec/23 6:12 AM,,05/Dec/23 6:12 AM,,0,,,,"When the user goes for post the job and select any past date and fill other mandatory details, the user can post that job without any validation message or alert.
Steps to reproduce the bug
* Open URL
* log in as Organization
* Enter valid credential
* click on the login button
* click on the post job
* fill in all mandatory details for the job post
* select a previous past date in the start date and check
*Expected result: If user tries to post job as previous past date then validation message should be displayed on screen.*
Issue video: [Job posting at previous past date.

Update "myself" api endpoint to be User data only,TDD-432,10479,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,27/Jun/23 9:22 AM,28/Sep/23 11:06 AM,,28/Sep/23 11:06 AM,,0,,,,"Currently we have two endpoints that are both used for the authenticated Freelancer:
{{url(r'^api/myself/$', views_api.ProfileView.as_view(), name='api_profile'),}}
and
{{url(r'^api/freelancer/$', views_api.FreelancerDetailsView.as_view(), name='api_freelancer_details'),}}Both of them are assuming that the user is a freelancer.
The ""myself"" endpoint should reference the authenticated User instance, without any assumptions whether this user is a freelancer/organisation admin/staff member.

We should remove and refactor all the freelancer related data and in the frontend fetch it from the {{/api/freelancer/}} endpoint instead. In the {{/api/myself}} endpoint we should have User-related data only, and in addition some flags like {{is_freelancer}}, {{is_organisation_admin}}, {{is_staff}} etc.

,,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-480,TDD-481,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@6b638209,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1|hzzvfr:,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD Sprint 20,TDD Sprint 21,TDD Sprint 22,,,,,,,,,,3.0,,,,,,,,2023-09-12 10:05:20.559,10008_*:*_4_*:*_5272605575_*|*_10007_*:*_3_*:*_1124395429_*|*_10009_*:*_1_*:*_0_*|*_10011_*:*_2_*:*_1639976208_*|*_10014_*:*_1_*:*_4427576,12/Sep/23 12:05 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;[~accountid:6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302] could you pls help Madhav find the location of the pr? Create a request to export all jobad contracts for organisations,TDD-431,10478,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,26/Jun/23 4:01 PM,25/Jul/23 10:19 AM,,19/Jul/23 4:29 PM,,0,,,,Each jobad contauins a contract which states the jobad specs, such as hourly rates, CoC numbers of both parties etc.

For each fulfilled jobad (accepted by a freelancer) a contract (opdrachtovereenkomst) is created (on the fly/not stored). This contract states the jobad specs, such as hourly rates, CoC numbers of both parties etc. Example page bottom
The Tax office has assigned our biggest customer, Kind en Co Ludens the obligation of Rensigning.
*What is the request of our client? What’s needed from the developers?*
Kind & Co Ludens has asked to receive all contract related to freelancer invoices over this year. Their request is:
# a one-off 6 months bulk exportfile of all contracts from jan-jun 2023
# The possibility to export the contracts on a monthly basis.
# Contract are saved in the following format:
{noformat}{noformat}
# {noformat}<<CompanyNameFreelancer_FreelancerName_JobadDate >>{noformat}
We will /might receive more of such requests from other childcare organisation. Furthermore, Kind en Co Ludens, would also like to be prepared for future audits.

Decision: We have decided that we can enable the organisations to request a download over a given/selected period via “Archive or Weekplanner” The organisation sees a message appearing : “your request for the export of contracts over the chosen period is successfully registered.
You will receive a file in an email where all requested contracts wil be bulk sent..”
Acceptance Criteria:
* Contract doesn’t need to match freelancer invoice
* Contract is therefore not needed to be dynamic
* Make contract static after the freelancer has accepted the jobad: meaning any mutations related to the jobad after the acceptation don’t result in changes in the contract (opdrachtovereenkomst).
* Organisation is able to download ( in bulk) contracts belonging to completed jobads over a selected period
* Request to export option to be displayed on [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/planner/
column2: https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/planner/] (best time to launch weekplanner now for all organisations?)

column1: * Export download period to be determined by the organisation using date filter.
* Message to inform organisation their request is received and receiving the file can take 24 hours.
* Message also states that the file will be in an email
* Limit amount of export requests (once a week/month)? Decision:
* Contract are saved in the following format: <<CompanyNameFreelancer_FreelancerName_JobadDate >>, for example <<TadaahBv_GulhanHoke_20230627 (format YYYYMMDD?)
* Received exportfile is zipped?

* Document specs in Confluence Page",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@1c0ddf67,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-07-18T11:19:28.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Adjust information on 'for-freelancers' page. ,TDD-429,10476,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,26/Jun/23 2:59 PM,28/Sep/23 11:49 AM,,28/Sep/23 11:49 AM,,0,,,,"It contains 'Screening', which should be change to 'Welkomstgesprek'.
Punt 2. Screening is niet meer van toepassing. In plaats daarvan is er na "" 3.Profiel compleet “ een Kennismakingsgesprek om het reilen en zeilen van ondernemerschap/platform te bespreken.
We mogen het woord “screening eigenlijk ook niet gebruiken omdat het dan lijkt of we een toelatingseis hebben anders dan alleen de diploma eisen ..
Mijn vraag:De blokjes die je je op deze pagina ziet (screenshot). Is dit iets wat we zelf en snel kunnen aanpassen: kunnen we de ‘blokjes” met andere tekst invullen of zijn dit plaatjes?
Want dan zou ik graag:
Huidige punt 3 wijzigen naar punt 2.
Huidige punt 2 verwijderen.
Nieuwe punt 3: *Kennnismakingsgesprek*. je maakt kennis met andere freelancers en krijgt informatie over de werking van het platfor.

Period jobads copies VAT exempt rate rather than max hourly tariff from setting,TDD-425,10472,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,22/Jun/23 2:44 PM,25/Jul/23 2:40 PM,,03/Jul/23 9:52 AM,,0,,,,"I have an urgent request from the advice team..Apparently the period jobad which are assigned to freelancer who have VAT status “exempt” doesn’t apply the maximum rate of the organisation by their settings.
When an VAT exempt freelancer accepts a jobad which has a lower hourly rate than theirs, the system applies hourly rate of the freelancer. Anyone available asap to tackle/refine this problem?
Example 1: When VAt exempt freelancers hourly rate is lower than max rate of organisation
Luc got the jobad for €32.00  instead of  the max of €37.50.
!image008.png
Example 2:
When VAt exempt freelancers hourly rate is higher than max rate of organisation
Riana got the jobad for €40.00 instead of €35.00.
!image009.png

Add filteroptions at https://stage.tadaah.nl/organisation/poule/  to give more control to organisations,TDD-406,10453,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Madhav,636cf7ab96243ac755ee69a0,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,14/Jun/23 1:32 PM,31/Jul/23 10:18 AM,,31/Jul/23 10:18 AM,,0,,,,"At [https://www.stage.tadaah.nl/organisation/poule/
# Familiar freelancers : freelancers who have either worked for the organisation/location before or are planned (not completed jobad) in the future.
# Favourite freelancers:: freelancers who are marked to be favourite for (specific) location/organisation
Business Value:

Organisations would like to know which freelancer is favourite and who is just familiar.. because a familiar freelancer doesn’t necessarily mean that the freelancer is a favourite. A favourite freelancer is usually selected more often than a familiar freelancer.
Acceptance criteria:
# Add filter option to page to see favourites or familiar freelancers

# Add visual/mark when freelancers is favourite",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@315c1435,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

VAT Number field accepting duplicate numbers without any validation,TDD-403,10450,Bug,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Highest,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Yashavnt Andure,63e0a07bc2b1cb6b3472df23,Yashavnt Andure,63e0a07bc2b1cb6b3472df23,13/Jun/23 1:51 PM,08/Oct/24 9:17 AM,,08/Oct/24 9:17 AM,,0,,,,"Two different users can able to add the same IBAN / VAT number / Mobile number without displaying any validation message on the screen.
*Update 5 march 2024*: Note: We dont ask freelancers for their bank account number in 2.0, therefore dont check on duplicate IBAN from 2.0 due to identification run by OPP
2 tasks:
# Duplicate / IBAN / VAT — number -  [Duplicate IBAN / VAT numbers.
# Provide a list if VAt dupicates are already present in current database
Task 1: Same as TDD 402-
* first do not allow new entries to be duplicates of already existung VAT numbers in Django
* Show error message if duplicate/ existing VAt number is entered
* error message:
* {noformat}Dit BTW-ID nummer is al bekend in ons systeem. Vul alsjeblieft een ander (geldig) BTW-ID nummer in of neem contact op met 020-7702280 als je hulp nodig hebt.{noformat}

Sequence: o.e. NL859318904B01. NL <<9 digits<<  Letter and 2 digits",,ICT,Yashavnt Andure,,,637df03c3e79f12e5720d7a3,63e0a07bc2b1cb6b3472df23,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-447,,,,,,,,,TDD-402,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@4336148f,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2024-09-27T14:59:10.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,Bug,,,,,1

column1: [DJANGO] [Freelancer] don't allow duplicate BSN numbers ,TDD-402,10449,Bug,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Yashavnt Andure,63e0a07bc2b1cb6b3472df23,Yashavnt Andure,63e0a07bc2b1cb6b3472df23,13/Jun/23 1:48 PM,08/Nov/24 10:41 AM,,06/Nov/24 8:03 AM,,0,,,,"*Problem*: BSN numbers should be unique. It stands for the Natural Insurance Number that is an identification method (for tax etc) and is unique for each person.
Our system doesn’t check for unique BSN: two different user able to enter same BSN number
screenshot: seen in: [https://platform.tadaah.nl/admin/register/freelancer/5752/change/?_changelist_filters=active__exact%3D1%26verified__exact%3D1
BSN filled in by freelancer (2nd screenshot) : [https://platform.tadaah.nl/freelancer/settings/personal/
*Acceptance Criteria: 2 tasks*
# *BSN number from UI should not accept duplicates , BSN alrady known in Django (pls use error message below)*
# *Provide a list of duplicates to correct by “advice team”*
*Error message for UI in case bsn is known to Tadaah:*

Freelancers would like to have an overview in which interest jobs they have shown interest,WORKFLOW-99,10448,Epic,To Do,WORKFLOW,Minor Workflow Improvements,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,09/Jun/23 1:47 PM,14/May/24 9:39 AM,,,,0,,,,"Freelancers can show interest to one or many jobads for assignments on one particular day. If organisations start placing interest jobs again the freelancers don’t have an overview (UX) of the the jobads they have shown interest in.
Problem:
# Difficulty to track the interest jobads they have shown interest in
# Cancel their interest in the interested jobad they are not interested in anymore
*Acceptance criteria (to be refined):*
* It seems logical to add an overview at [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/jobs/week/
* freelancer should be able to cancel shown interest

* freelancer should be able to see all jobdetails of his “interested jobads'",,ICT Tadaah,Niels Rozemeijer,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,13/Jun/23 11:11 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2023-06-13 om 11.09.06.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10260,15/Jun/23 2:44 PM;ug:000c21e9-4191-46b8-9613-f65c4ad93239;image-20230615-124345.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10266,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@676ac67f,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1
column2: hzzwhz:,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,2023-06-15 12:44:25.569,,15/Jun/23 12:03 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;[~accountid:70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2] Can you pls hep us with a design to give an overview of the intersts placed by freelancers on interest based jobads?,"15/Jun/23 2:44 PM;70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2;Hi [~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] very simple idea but why not use a banner to indicate that the user has ‘applied’ to the job already? That way they can return to the job and cancel it and they still have an overview of other jobs on the same day.

column1: I wouldn’t recommend adding a separate subnavigation item specifically for this category since freelancers might need to have an overview of all jobs including jobs they already applied for.",,,,,,,,,,,,,To Do,09/Jun/23 1:47 PM

[WEB] Organisationview - link to platform.tadaah.nl/organisation/personenregister/ should be always visible for organisations which have this enabled,TDD-400,10447,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,09/Jun/23 1:40 PM,21/May/24 10:37 AM,,21/May/24 10:37 AM,,0,,,,"Organisation use the tool Personenregister to keep track of freelancers who haven’t freelanced  for the organisation before. This tool indicates that the organisation will have to check whether this  freelancer, new to their organisation, is linked t the Personenregister to their organisation, in case of an GGD audit.
*Acceptance Criteria:*
* add permanent link to [https://platform.tadaah.nl/organisation/personenregister/
* Button/ link in weekplanner: suggestion next to “langere opdrachetn”?
* Hovering above button shows message {color:#0747a6}: >>{color}[{color:#0747a6}K{color}
column2: https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/personenregister/]{color:#0747a6}lik hier voor de Personenregister Controle Hulp om te zien of er {color}[pedagogisch medewerkers ingepland staan die volgens onze administratie nog niet gekoppeld zijn in het personenregister.

column1: * Keep Display warning message: *Let op!* *Let op!* [Binnenkort komen er pedagogisch medewerkers bij jullie werken, die volgens onze administratie nog niet gekoppeld zijn in het personenregister. Kijk hier om wie het gaat.
* I would also like to textual and make grammar changes to this page. The following word
{noformat}gekoppelt{noformat}
to be replaced by
{noformat}>>gekoppeld<<{noformat}
* Add as a message to page: [https://platform.tadaah.nl/organisation/personenregister/
{noformat}Let op! De controle hulp is enkel een hulpmiddel, deze maakt geen officiele koppeling in het PRK.
Want een daadwerkelijke koppeling kan enkel gemaakt worden door in te loggen bij DIGId. {noformat}
!Schermafbeelding 2024-02-27 om 12.29.48.png

column1: BUG - on production weekplanner page, the logo is not displayed.,TDD-371,10418,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,07/Jun/23 10:58 AM,23/Jun/23 1:11 PM,,23/Jun/23 1:11 PM,,0,,,,"!image-20230607-085840.png

Apply restrictions to mutating jobad hours after the shift (for invoicing purposes),WORKFLOW-94,10417,Task,To Do,WORKFLOW,Minor Workflow Improvements,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,06/Jun/23 12:15 PM,02/Nov/23 12:40 PM,,,,0,,,,"*The mediation fee:* The mediation fee is derived from the sum of: total completed hours  by a frealancer mutliplied by €2,39
We only invoice the mediation fee once a month. However, organisations and freelancers are able to make changes in the jobads continuously.

For example: we see freelancers adjusting their invoices to organisations because they forgot to change their worked hours.  They might have had a longer/shorter lunch break, started/finished early or late..

Exapmple when organisations forgot to add a jobad but the job has already taken place and is completed: A location manager has asked a freelancer to work a couple of days but failed to put it in the system. We might miss revenue if we don’t consider these exceptions.
Or a jobad wasnt cancelled by the freelancer who didnt perform the job. The system still shows a planned/completed jobad: leading to unjustified invoice
In conclusion: When freelancers or organisation adjust their hours then we should also adjust the mediation fee: 1. not to miss revenue but also not to send incorrect mediation invoices
Mutations after monthly invoicing should be considered.
How can we tackle this?
Adding restrictions to mutations by closing jobads  after 48 hours : completed jobad

This means the hours are confirmed and signed off by the organisation",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@4fcee8d8,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

BUG - Incorrect message on Jobs page,TDD-363,10410,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,31/May/23 12:14 PM,23/Jun/23 1:11 PM,,23/Jun/23 1:11 PM,,0,,,,"When there are no available jobs, on the “Losse Oproepen” (Individual Jobs), the bottom error message says: {{Er zijn op dit moment geen langere opdrachten beschikbaar.}} This should be {{Er zijn op dit moment geen losse opdrachten beschikbaar.}}

Web Frontend for SDB Integration,TDD-360,10407,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,31/May/23 9:12 AM,18/Oct/23 8:45 PM,,18/Oct/23 8:45 PM,,0,,,,"h1. Where do we want this functionality to be displayed?
h2. 1. On the week planner page - ""Opdrachten"" beside ""Exporteren""
* type: button
* text: ""Import SDB jobs"" (Translate to Dutch)
* UI: same as ""Exporteren"" button
* icon: yet to be decided
* On click →  open pop up →  take the start and end date → redirect to the fetched jobs page.
h2. 2. On the settings page
We can have two options here.
h3. A. Integrations page
Include a new item in the list on the settings page - integrations. This can help us in the future to group all integrations in one place.
*UI on settings page*
* text: Third-party integrations (Actual text yet to be decided - in Dutch)
* UI: same as items in the list on the settings page.
All the integrations can be handled here.
This will show all the Third-party integrations.
*UI in integrations page:*
List of cards where each card will contain specific third-party integration details.
Card contains:
* Title: Third-party name (For eg. ""SDB Integration"")
* API Key: Input field. (If the API key exists, show it in the input pre-filled. Like we have it in other forms like personal details)
* save button - disabled. Enable, if changes in API key input.
* delete button.
* Fetch jobs button → on click open pop up →  take the start and end date → redirect to the fetched jobs page.
!MicrosoftTeams-image.png
h3. B. SDB Integration page
Only SDB integration for the time being.
*UI for settings page:*
* text: SDB integrations (Actual text yet to be decided - in Dutch)
* UI: same as items in the list on the settings page.
*UI for SDB integration page*
* UI same as of personal details page
* title - SDB Integration
* Form with an Input field for API Key.
* help text: keep it blank to opt out from using it.
* save button
* Fetch jobs button → on click open pop up →  take the start and end date → redirect to the fetched jobs page.
h1. Fetched Jobs Page
Title: SDB fetched jobs
UI:
* list of cards. Two in a row. Same as we have on the job details page [Todo: ADD SS]
* checkbox to select which job ads to import. (position of the checkbox to be decided on the go)
* location drop down to choose from existing organization’s locations.
* Details on the card about the job ad
** Date
** start time
** end time
** address
** City

** postal code",,Saleh Rabbaniy,Tanya Lyabik,,,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,557058:a45a5ea8-6f14-4f87-b402-eaead1d584b5,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-392,,,,,,,,,TDD-223,,,,,,,,31/May/23 12:53 PM;ug:5bf3fc76-46f5-46aa-aadb-6cc67f68bbe9;MicrosoftTeams-image.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10257,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@5e7fb639,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-10-10T10:56:59.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: Add administrative tool for freelancers to keep track of paid invoices,WORKFLOW-74,10402,Task,To Do,WORKFLOW,Minor Workflow Improvements,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,30/May/23 9:58 AM,02/Nov/23 11:50 AM,,,,0,,,,"Freelancers send their invoices to the organisations via our portal.
They have asked us to help them to track their bookkeeping: to be able to mark the invoices that they have send that are cleared.
They would for example like to have a checkbox next to a sent invoice to mark as “payment received” by the organisation.  Please find screenshot
Acceptance Criteria:
* Changes to be made on URL: [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/invoice/billed/

* ",,ICT Tadaah,Niels Rozemeijer,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,30/May/23 10:07 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Adding administrative tool to mark received payments.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10247,30/May/23 10:14 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;WhatsApp Image 2023-05-30 at 10.08.09 (1).jpeg;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10248,31/May/23 12:16 PM;ug:000c21e9-4191-46b8-9613-f65c4ad93239;voorbeeld facturatieflow.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10254,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@449aa217,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: Hey [~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] , I’ve created them in the new design language. Not sure if that was required, otherwise happy to change it. I would do a couple of things (some are optional):

* I would update the existing buttons to a ‘more menu’, this will declutter the UI from all the buttons. I’ve used the regular actionsheet from iOS (for the example) but the design system for android also offers actionsheets.
* The content of this actionsheet can be dynamic to the state of the invoice.
** When an invoice is created, the options can be ‘download invoice'
** When an invoice is send, the options can be to ‘send reminder’, ‘download invoice’ or ‘mark as paid’
** When an invoice is paid, the options can be to ‘download invoice’ or ‘mark as unpaid’
* To communicate the state I’ve used banners from the design system.

What do you think? Again, happy to remake it to fit more with the current system. Just looking for feedback and this was the quickest for me to represent the flow.",15/Jun/23 11:22 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;[~accountid:70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2] We are happy with this design. Do you also have a UI for the web part?,,,,,,,,,,,,To Do,30/May/23 9:58 AM

APP - Add contract to assigned jobads to be downloaded,TDD-354,10401,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Dharmesh Bhalala,6389c29d77acd224b341d312,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,30/May/23 9:39 AM,11/Jul/23 10:57 AM,,05/Jul/23 9:17 AM,,0,,,,"All assigned jobads have a digital contract as an attachment. This is called the “opdrachtovereenkomst'. The opdrachtovereenkomst states all agreed upon jobdetails such as Kvk numbers, agreed rates, date of jobad, time that jobad startes/ends. Freelancers aren’t able to download this document in the app. They have to login on the web app to gain access / download this file.
Aim: Freelancers would like to be able to download this documents as a PDF also in the app.
Acceptance Criteria:
* Make it possible to download the “opdrachtovereenkomst” / contract also in the app.
* Download of the contact is in pdf format

* The contract should be visible on the page where the assignments are displayed, pls find screenshot",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-369,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,30/May/23 11:22 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;WhatsApp Image 2023-05-30 at 11.20.03.jpeg;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10251,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@e4e2aff,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

App needs to show message and redirect when a new release is available. ,TDD-347,10394,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Yashavnt Andure,63e0a07bc2b1cb6b3472df23,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,24/May/23 10:42 AM,14/Jun/23 3:27 PM,,13/Jun/23 10:31 AM,,0,,,,"We had a ticket requiring the app to insist on updating when a new release is available. We noticed that the message of having to update is not clear to users on IOS devices. Does the message to update disappear after 1,2 attempts to log in?
We have several freelancers complaining and Advice team sending troubleshooting tickets after the last release. I think this might be all related.
Aim: Can we make sure that the message to update to a newer version is shown to the user until the update has been performed?
*Acceptance Criteria:*
* In case of a new version of the app, Android and/or IOS, all Iphones should show a message when attempting to log until update is performed.
* The message should show despite of phone settings
* Redirect to App store when new version is available

* Redirect to Google Play when new version is available",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@7cf9d0c0,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

fix period jobs confirmation process & link personal job ads to their related Period Job,TDD-339,10386,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,22/May/23 11:01 AM,29/Jul/23 1:01 PM,,29/Jul/23 1:01 PM,,0,,,,"When a period job is confirmed to a freelancer, the period job is placed as individual personal jobads in the planner.
What does the organisation  want for example:  in case of confirmation to one freelancer when then cancels..
If the chosen freelancer doesn't accept the jobads then the old list of interested freelancers should be available to choose another freelancer.
* Notify organisation when an already confirmed period job is again to be confirmed to another freelancer?
* Can we make it possible to personal invite a second freelancer only to the remaining jobads that first freelancer didn't accept?
* Organisation Period job page should show how many jobads were accepted out of the total jobads: accepted/ remaining vs total  within the period job
* Create a model: {{invite remaining open jobs}}
* Organisation Card should show accepted/total jobads and have a button to invite other freelancer from the list of interested from the period job ad page of that specific period job
* This is only possible if there were other interested freelancers.
* The card will show accurate number of accepted jobads after 48 hours of assignment.
* The 48 hours accepted/remaining jobad status waiting period is also shown as a msg in the period job page.

* create notification emails and push notifications for the freelancers",,Tellache Imad,Yashavnt Andure,,,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,63e0a07bc2b1cb6b3472df23,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@1e75bb34,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-07-21T18:21:27.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

All jobads, also Period jobs, should have minimum rate of €30 -,TDD-335,10382,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,16/May/23 10:17 AM,25/May/23 4:16 PM,,25/May/23 4:16 PM,,0,,,,"A few weeks ago we had a ticket stating that no jobads under €30 scan be placed on th eplatform.
We have an example of a period jobad that was placed for an hourly rate under €30.
Period jobads are placed on URL: [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/period_jobs/create/
Acceptance criteria:
* All Jobads: Organisations hourly rates can only be higher or equal to €30 excl VAT
* Jobads: Organisations hourly rates can only be higher or equal to €30 VAT Exempt
* Organisation settings for Hourly rates per competence:  hourly can only be higher or equal to €30 excl VAT
* Organisation settings for Hourly rates per competence:  hourly can only be higher or equal to €30 VAT Exempt
* All placed and accepted jobads shouldn’t be editable to a lower hourly rate than €30
Check following URL’s:
* [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/period_jobs/create/
* [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/wizard/
* [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/settings/rates/
* [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/jobs/schedule/
* [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/job/703892/edit?next=/organisation/jobs/week/

BUG - After placing job, redirected to the old /jobs/week instead of weekplanner,TDD-334,10381,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,16/May/23 9:48 AM,23/Jun/23 1:11 PM,,23/Jun/23 1:11 PM,,0,,,,"When an organisation has use_weekplanner = True, when they click on Opdrachten, they are correctly navigated to the new React weekplanner. However, when creating a job, after successful submission, they are redirected to organisation/jobs/week/ instead of the new weekplanner.
Acceptance criteria:
# Only For organisation that use the new weekplanner
# Check correct redirection for all tyoe of jobads: urgent and period jobs

# Redirection after placing a jobad should be to : [https://stage.tadaah.nl/organisation/planner/?fromDate=2023-05-29&pageNumber=1&pageSize=10&tableFromDate=2023-05-29&tableToDate=2023-06-02&toDate=2023-06-02&viewType=grid

BUG - server errors not displayed in frontend on wizard,TDD-333,10380,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,16/May/23 9:38 AM,28/Jun/23 3:00 PM,,23/Jun/23 8:58 AM,,0,,,,"When creating a Spoed job and make it recurring > 30 days, and move to the last screen and try to submit (Bevestigen) the job, the asynchronous call to /api/job fails with
{noformat}{""success"":false,""errors"":{""__all__"":[""Eind datum van herhalen is meer dan 30 dagen""]}}
{noformat}
However this error is not displayed on the frontend and the screen just seems stuck.

Form error message to be added",,Saleh Rabbaniy,,,,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@54f42c88,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-06-19T14:51:20.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Mobile APP: evaluate UI design inconsistencies for iPhone,TDD-332,10379,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Dharmesh Bhalala,6389c29d77acd224b341d312,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,15/May/23 12:06 PM,21/Aug/23 5:22 PM,,21/Aug/23 1:25 PM,,0,,,,"It’s important to evaluate the app also from the view of an iPhone user. The app team has reported inconsistencies in design for android users.
We know that most of our users use an iPhone to log in to the app. For an actual overview of full devices, you can check:: [https://www.tadaah.nl/admin/fcm_django/fcmdevice/?o=-7.4
Please create same report for iPhone users as is done for the android version of the app.
Check inconsistencies based on current app components, for example:
# alignement
# Symmetrics
# logo
# font
# size
# pop ups
# etc.

Any functional issues found to be reported seperately and not to be handled directly",,Aiyub M,ICT Tadaah,,,6115470a8ad5b600706b3c78,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-343,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@459fe61d,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Don't give Emailaddress and phone number of the freelancer on long period jobad,TDD-322,10369,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,09/May/23 11:02 AM,25/May/23 4:17 PM,,25/May/23 4:17 PM,,0,,,,"*Period jobs:* [*https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/period_jobs/*

When  a freelancers reacts to a longperiod jobad the organisation sees the complete profile of that freelancer. This includes their telephonenumber and emailaddress. We would like to remove those data and not share them with organisations.
*Business model:*
* Organisations receive full information on freelancers to be able to dp business outside the platform. Tadaah could/misses revenue.
* Sharing Telephone number and emailaddress is also not in line with AVG/GDPR
*Acceptance Criteria:*
* organisations don’t see telephone number of the freelancer when the freelancer shows interest in their jobad

* organisations don’t see email address of the freelancer when the freelancer shows interest in their jobad",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,09/May/23 11:03 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2023-05-09 om 10.57.37.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10238,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@9ff2e1e,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Remove redirect from freelancer & organisation welcome pages,TDD-321,10368,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,04/May/23 3:28 PM,25/May/23 4:34 PM,,25/May/23 4:34 PM,,0,,,,"Hoi Saleh,
GA4 werkt naar behoren en de data komt daar goed op binnen.
We hebben nu alleen een probleem met de huidige bedankpagina’s.
Als je een freelance aanmelding voltooid verschijnen er 2 bedankpagina’s.
Eerst: [tadaah.nl/welcome
column2: http://tadaah.nl/welcome] en vervolgens word je geredirect naar /freelance

column1: En bij organisaties krijg je eerst [tadaah.nl/welcome
column2: http://tadaah.nl/welcome] en word je vervolgens geredirect naar /organisaties.

column1: Dit zorgt ervoor dat we de conversies niet goed kunnen meten in GA4. Mijn voorstel zou zijn om de volgende bedankpagina’s aan te maken zonder redirect:
* [Tadaah.nl/inschrijving_freelancer
* [Tadaah.nl/inschrijving_organisatie
Is dit voor jullie werkbaar? Zo ja dan graag doorvoeren.
",,Saleh Rabbaniy,,,,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@6aa1aba6,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Add message regarding issues removing interest jobs,TDD-320,10367,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,02/May/23 5:22 PM,04/May/23 10:33 AM,,04/May/23 10:33 AM,,0,,,,"Sinds 1 Mei zijn de interessediensten komen te vervallen, op de wijze zoals u die kent. Wij hebben deze aanpassing moeten doen ter voorkoming van schijnzelfstandigheid en om de inzetbaarheid van de pedagogisch medewerkers te vergroten. Hierbij hebben we een aantal dingen over het hoofd gezien die we de komende weken zullen aanpassen.
We ontvangen reacties en vragen vanuit organisaties en freelancers. We inventariseren momenteel alle feedback en suggesties, want jullie input is voor ons belangrijk.
Wil je een suggestie aandragen, dan ontvangen we die graag per e-mail. Deze mag je sturen naar: [info@tadaah.nl
column2: mailto:info@tadaah.nl] met als onderwerp: werking platform.

column1: Tot een volgende update is het mogelijk de interessediensten uit te zetten via de keuzeoptie: Tijdelijke inhuur. Na de volgende update zullen de interessediensten terugkomen in aangepaste vorm.",,Saleh Rabbaniy,,,,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@4ab10707,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-05-03T10:24:30.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

{APP] changes frontend ,TDD-306,10353,Subtask,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Dharmesh Bhalala,6389c29d77acd224b341d312,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,25/Apr/23 11:41 AM,17/May/23 10:37 AM,,17/May/23 10:37 AM,,0,,,,Disable the input field “name and surname” for verified freelancers,,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@2e8ce07f,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: Test sign up flow,TDD-305,10352,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,25/Apr/23 11:18 AM,21/Nov/23 2:32 PM,,15/May/23 10:25 AM,,0,,,,"Added by Saleh:
User Flow Scenarios:
* Start signup flow once user clicks on “Aanmelden als Freelancer” button on HomePage
** scenarios:
** if user not “verified” and not “ready for verification” > normal signup flow (start landing page)
** if user not verified, but already “ready for verification” > redirect to “application submitted” page
** if user already verified > redirect to /freelance/ page (freelancer home page)
* Login as Freelancer normally without being verified > signup flow fill information page
* Signup through Invitation journey > User goes through old signup form. On successful submit > Complete new signup flow journey on Fill Information page
Additional changes:
* Change routing of all new signup flow to ‘/freelancer/’ instead of ‘/freelancers/’
* Clean up / remove old signup flow code
** Views
** Unit Tests

* Unit Tests for New Signup flow",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@216bcf9a,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Adjust Verification Process on Staff pages following new signup flow,TDD-300,10347,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,20/Apr/23 9:20 AM,11/May/23 8:47 AM,,11/May/23 8:47 AM,,0,,,,"(added by Saleh)
Add a tile to the staff page “Verificatie nieuwe freelancers”
* Show all freelancers who are “ready for verification” and not yet verified
** show details: Name, city, phone, email, statuses
** actions: verify, profile
** search: name
* Adjust /verify page to include “reject application”
** add reason box
** send email to freelancer:
*** subject:{{Je aanmelding als Freelancer bij Tadaah is afgewezen.}}
*** content: We hebben je aanmelding als freelancer bij Tadaah beoordeeld. Helaas kunnen we deze niet goedkeuren.
* Toelichting: {{ reason }}
*TODO: Check with* [~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] *:*
Some of the information that the staff members have to check here are not relevant:
* Documenten:
** Here the staff member is supposed to check the Personenregister and Insurance?

I think both should have been automated in the signup flow already? {color:#ff5630}Signup can be completed by uploading any file regardless of qua.ity or relevance. The advise team will still have to check the uploaded documents individually. I do agree tho that hese boxes could be removed if that doesn’t have any other implications on the platform{color}
Other information that is not requested in the signup flow and thus always empty or incomplete: {color:#ff5630}*Check = logical that these field remain empty and incomplete.* {color}
* Werkervaring - {color:#ff5630}*can be removed*{color}
* Status: - {color:#ff5630}all {color}{color:#ff5630}*can be removed*{color}

** Profile Information > This is determined by profile_checks.py > is_profile_complete, which checks if the following attributes exist. The problem is that these attributes are not requested during the signup flow so will always be empty. As a result, the “Profielinformatie” will always be incomplete (crossed):
*** rekening_nummer
*** btw_nummer
*** rate
*** Picture
** KVK-Uittreksel > in the signup flow we automated this with an API, should we still check the uittreksel? {color:#ff5630}*AT still do need to check this, this section can remain*{color}
* Beschikbare dagen {color:#ff5630}*can be removed*{color}
* Werkervaring in sectoren  {color:#ff5630}*can be removed*{color}
Check:
* Ik heb het identiteitsbewijs gecontroleerd > We don't ask to upload identy during signup flow? [~accountid:6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302] {color:#ff5630}this can be removed{color}
Also check below if we still need those:
* VOG gecontroleerd - {color:#ff5630}remains{color}
* Personenregister gecontroleerd- {color:#ff5630}remains{color}
* SKJ gecontroleerd - {color:#ff5630}remove{color}
* BIG-register gecontroleerd - {color:#ff5630}remove{color}
* Verzekering gecontroleerd - {color:#ff5630}remains{color}

* Voorstellen - {color:#ff5630}remove{color}",,Saleh Rabbaniy,,,,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@7fb7482e,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-05-24T11:29:48.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: BTW-keuze "VAT Exempt" only to be selected once in 3 years. ,WORKFLOW-72,10341,Task,To Do,WORKFLOW,Minor Workflow Improvements,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,17/Apr/23 12:51 PM,02/Nov/23 11:47 AM,,,,0,to-refine,,,"Acceptance criteria
* BTW-keuze is renamed to BTW-status (VAT-status)
* BTW-Status is always on 21% btw by default

* Textbox underneath BTW-status:  {{De Kleine Ondernemersregeling (afgekort: KOR) is een vrijstelling van de Omzetbelasting (de BTW). Je kan deelnemen aan de KOR als je omzet onder de EUR 20.000 per jaar blijft. Deelname aan de KOR geldt voor 3 jaar. Je neemt pas deel aan de KOR als je een aanvraag hebt gedaan bij de Belastingdienst en als deze schriftelijk is goedgekeurd}}
* Clicking/selecting BTW choice item “*VAT exempt*” pop-up appears with see (coded) msg below*
* Freelancers to accept pop up msg to be able to select *“VAT-Exempt”.*
* Once VAT-EXempt is selected/changed, system should time stamp.
* VAT status (BTW-status)  can only to be changed into VAT Exempt once in 3 years time
* Deselecting VAT exempt should be possible (i.e. to change/reset to default *BTW21%*)
* System remembers when VAT Exempt is deselected.
* When trying to reselect VAT Exempt for a second time within 3 year system should show a msg stating that choice is not possible, to contact the Advise team.

* msg:  Je kunt maar 1 keer deelnemen aan de Kleine ondernemers Regeling binnen een periode van 3 jaar tijd. Op {{timestamp date *deselecting* VAT Exempt} heb je aangegeven dat je niet meer btw-vrijgesteld bent.
* 3 years after timestamp “selecting VAT-duty”, system should reset freelancers to default VAT status: BTW 21%
* previous invoices sent by freelancers shouldn’t change when VAT status is changed
* (BTW-keuze to be changed to  VAT EXEMPT only once in 3 years).
*Pop-up box appears msg below with the :
{noformat}“LET OP!
Deelnemen aan de KOR geldt voor 3 jaar: wijzigen van deze instelling in jouw profiel is hierna (na Opslaan) voor de komende 3 jaar niet mogelijk (uitsluitend te wijzigen door Tadaah).
Je geeft aan deel te nemen aan de KOR (Kleine Ondernemers Regeling). Dit is een vrijstelling voor de BTW.
Je bevestigt hiermee dat je:
-Een bevestiging van deelname aan de KOR van de Belastingdienst in je bezit hebt.
-Je deze bevestigingsbrief aan Tadaah zult opsturen binnen 30 dagen na ontvangstdatum van de brief van de Belastingdienst.
-Deze bevestigingsbrief zult overleggen aan opdrachtgevers wanneer zij daar om vragen.
-GEEN BTW op je factuur zult vermelden aan je opdrachtgevers.

-Dat jij als freelancer zelf altijd verantwoordelijk bent en blijft voor het juist toepassen van de KOR en de BTW regels. Door je Profiel/Instellingen en jouw KOR deelname te bevestigen, vrijwaar je Tadaah van elke aansprakelijkheid op dit gebied.”{noformat}",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-267,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@727a89a6,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Thumbs up/Thumbs down Freelancer rating on profiles to be deleted,TDD-293,10340,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,17/Apr/23 10:23 AM,25/Jul/23 10:19 AM,,19/Jul/23 4:29 PM,,0,,,,"Freelancers’ profiles contain a thumbs up/down illustration' to organisations.
Thumbs up meaning: good, Thumbs down meaning: bad
The thumbs system is used for:
* *Completing accepted jobads.*  For example, cancelling too many accepted jobads would give you a thumbs down.
* *Accepting jobads.*  For example, not being very active on the platform would give you a thumbs down. Whereas being available almost every day, working every day would give yo u a thumbs up.

This thumbs up/down system doesn’t consider a minimum of needed data  This means that new freelancers always get a thumbs down in the thumbs system. Organisations see them as not reliable freelanecrs and don’t want to select them.
The idea is to come up with a ‘new rating system’ soon but until then this thumbs system needs to be looked at to stip the complaints.
Acceptance criteria:
* if there isnt’t enough data, as in accepted jobads, cancellations etc. then the thumbs system shouldn’t show a thumb.
* Active Bonus (scales from 0-10) above 5 is thumbs up and below will be thumbs down
* Each completed jobad is 1 point
* Active bonus is calculated over the past month
* If the new freelancer doesn’t complete  more than 5 jobads in the past two months then there still won’t be a thumb visible for “active”.
* If the new freelancer doesnt’t complete  more than 5 jobads in the third month then there there will be a thumbs down for “active”
* If the new freelancer completes  more than 5 jobads in the past months tthen we show a thumbs up for active
* “afzeggen/cancellation” not to show any thumbs for new freelancers
* “afzeggen/cancellation”  uses variable “sick days”, above or below 1 shows thumbs down
* No need for change in the afzeggen/cancellation thumb rules  for new freelancers
* Same for app

Screenshot to show “thumbs system”",,ICT Tadaah,Tellache Imad,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,30/May/23 10:43 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2023-05-30 om 10.41.40.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10249,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@62f0c3ee,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column2: width=1834,height=967!","17/May/23 9:18 AM;6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d;[~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41]  I added few details to the description, let me know if we should add more details?","17/May/23 10:57 AM;70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2;Hi everybody, as discussed yesterday I created some designs. I created them very roughly, they are definetly not final. The goal here is to share some options:

column1: *Option 1 - show period jobs in current view*
This is the option to display OPEN and ASSIGNED period jobs in the current overview. In the overview we use an icon and tooltip to signal period jobs.
* When a user clicks on a open period jobs, they come to a page where they see details off the open period jobs. They can edit the period jobs and assign a freelancer from the list.
* When a user clicks on a assigned period job, they come to a page where they see details off the assigned period jobs. They can edit the period job.

* On the detail page we need to signal clearly that this is a period job with multiple instance. Currently I do this by showing the type ‘langdurig’ and by displaying when the period job re-occurs (i.e. ‘maandag en dinsdag’)
!option 1 - use existing table view.png
*Option 2 - button navigation*
This is a second option to display assigned period jobs in the current overview. The open period jobs will not be shown there but will be accessible via button navigation.
* When a user clicks on the button navigation, they will be taken to an overview screen where all open period jobs are displayed (sorted on date?).
* When they click on an open period job, they come to a detail page similar to the one we use in option 1. Here they can assign a freelancer and manage the job ad.
* When the user is on the job overview page, they do see assigned period jobs. Once they click on this they are taken to a similar page as in option 1.
!option 2 - button navigation.png

In all honesty I have a strong preference for option 1. Why do NOT show open period jobs but do show assigned period jobs? I understand the technical difficulty but from a user perspective it doesn’t make sense to add a middle step for managing these open period jobs.

Curious to hear what everyone else thinks. As said, keep in mind these designs are very rough drafts. Once we agree on a direction I can work on finalising these.","17/May/23 12:24 PM;6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d;Hi [~accountid:70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2] , thanks for the quick update and I would say it looks really nice even if it’s not final. I just wanted to clarify something about the period jobs: practically, I don’t think we are adding a middle step for period jobs. an open period job is converted to a set of regular jobs that fit correctly in the week planner once it’s  assigned to someone (an assigned period job is no longer considered as period job), Also how can we display long period jobs that take 2 weeks in the week planner table . that’s why I would prefer option 2 maybe?",30/May/23 10:20 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;I’m happy to go with option 2.  [~accountid:6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d] Do you need my input/help with this?,30/May/23 12:33 PM;6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d;Hey [~accountid:70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2]  Can you please share the link for the design when it’s ready? ,01/Jun/23 7:50 PM;70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2;Hey [~accountid:6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d] I looked at the designs and they look pretty ready. Here is the [link
column2: https://www.figma.com/file/0hou4LuJPXQ9WIh6nUq3sn/Refinements?type=design&node-id=4%3A2627&t=yaT9EBTMxV3XXGdO-1]. Let me know if you miss any states or variants while developing. Happy to help!,02/Jun/23 10:49 PM;6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d;thanks [~accountid:70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2]  I requested access to the file. can you please approve it,"06/Jun/23 2:54 PM;70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2;Hi [~accountid:6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d] . I created the [responsive designs for the period jobs screens
column3: https://www.figma.com/file/0hou4LuJPXQ9WIh6nUq3sn/Refinements?type=design&node-id=87%3A1942&t=Aazf1obZIOhxZLgr-1]. It’s pretty straightforward but couple of things to keep in mind.

column1: * I used the screen sizes from tailwind css (xl, lg, md and sm). I also included a xs size for mobile (360px).

* I kept the navigation design very minimal. I believe the current implementation is already responsive (enough). I would recommend using that for now as we are also working on updating the entire navigation component. This will also mean we will tackle responsiveness there (see Slack if you didn’t see my update yet)

* I didn’t spend time on the actual weekplanner. I know it’s currently not responsive and I’d like to make it responsive. I do have some ideas on how to make it more responsive but that will take a lot more time and effort from my side which I currently don’t have. [~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] if this is a priority please let me know and I can adjust accordingly.
Please let me know if you have any questions here or via Slack!",21/Dec/23 11:10 AM;557058:a45a5ea8-6f14-4f87-b402-eaead1d584b5;Deploy: the 3d of January,,,Done,03/Jan/24 10:49 PM

Deleting "interest based" jobads - Freelancer View ,TDD-277,10324,Subtask,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,11/Apr/23 9:57 AM,30/Apr/23 10:23 PM,,30/Apr/23 10:23 PM,,0,,,,"Interest based jobads give Tadaah freelancers a lot of insecurities for their income.

The primary purpose of these jobads was to offer childcare organisations the choice to select a freelancer for an jobad themselves. This is because some childcare organisations have a particular concept, vision that they would like to see reflected in the profile of a freelancers.

*Problem*: This option is used for other purposes and this has not always benefited the freelancer. Organisations see this option as a way to avoid compensation: with this option, they currently have the freedom and opportunity to confirm a jobad very late or even decide not to react at all. There are no restrictions.At the same time it offers the organisations too much freedom to decide which freelancer is allowed to perform the jobad.
*Business Model:*

These services create uncertainty, lots of questions, paranoia, and stress among freelancers. All in all, this results in less enthusiasm for these choice jobads and Tadaah image/reputation ultimately suffers as a result.

Our goals is to create more confidence in Tadaah and transparency on the platform. We believe that interest based jobads can easily be replaced by spoedopdrachten (wizard) by the childcare organisations.
*Goal*: Deleting the option to place interest jobads
Deleting the interest based jobads has to be tackled from both freelancer view and organisational view [https://tadaah.atlassian.net/browse/TDD-262
Acceptance Criteria:
* Freelancers will see a message above page [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/ads/all/
* Deadline 1st may no more interst based jobads to be placed
Pages on the freelancer view plus screenshots are added as attachments:
* [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/ads/all/
