column1: Organisations should not have 15 minutes to cancel a spoeddienst jobad ,TDD-268,10315,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,04/Apr/23 1:33 PM,27/Jun/23 5:14 PM,,27/Jun/23 5:14 PM,,0,to-refine,,,"*Current situation:* organisations have 15 minutes to cancel a jobad placed via the spoed dienst. “Grace period”
This is done by Eike because the planners sometimes made mistakes with certain information in the jobads.

*Business Model:* We believe that this spare 15 minutes is not necessary anymore because we now have improved the jobad placing process/journey. We now give a full overview of the jobad in several screens in terms of“ costs”, locations”,  times”. This 15-minute rule is  outdated.
*Acceptance Criteria:*

* Jobads placed and cancelled within 15 minutes are also subject to compensation criteria. (E.g. if a joibad is place and cancelled within 15 minutes, within 24 hours of commencing jobad, then the freelancer is due compensation)

* NEW to situation: please add: Organisations should receive a message: You are placing a jobad that starts within 24 hours.  “Let op, je plaatst een opdracht die binnen 24 uur plaatsvindt. Freelancers hebben recht op een vergoeding als een aangenomen opdracht binnen 24 uur voor aanvang van de dienst worden geannuleerd”
* Add the comment avove the submit button  on the final page

{quote}“Let op, je plaatst een opdracht die binnen 24 uur plaatsvindt. Freelancers hebben recht op een vergoeding als een aangenomen opdracht binnen 24 uur voor aanvang van de dienst worden geannuleerd”
{color:#ff5630}buttons{color}
{{<< Akkoord, plaats opdracht >> (acknowledge, place jobad)}}

{{<< Annuleer opdracht >>}}{color:#ff5630}              {color}(cancel jobad){quote}",,ICT Tadaah,Jona Bosman,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,25/Apr/23 11:35 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2023-04-25 om 11.29.10.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10237,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@7746b9d6,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-06-22T13:34:35.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: Kvk related changes to the freelancer settings page,TDD-267,10314,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,04/Apr/23 11:20 AM,17/May/23 10:16 AM,,17/May/23 10:16 AM,,0,to-refine,,,"The new sign up changes and the creation of new address models requires us to redesign to the company pages of the freelancer, e.g check which field can remain read only, fields to be added, fields to be adapted.
URL: [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/settings/company/
Acceptance Criteria:
* Create field to change Kvk-number
* Allow freelancer to change business information via KVK-api
* Add info that freelancer business address can only be changed by resubmitting Kvk number.
* Allow freelancer to choose relevant business name (bedrijfsnaam) if kvk-api fetches multiple nusiness names under kvk-number
* Allow freelancer to choose which business address is to be used on their profile if multiple addresses are found via Kvk fetch
* Kvk-api flow same as in sign up flow
* Ask freelancer to save selected information related to the new kvk-number on their profile
* Read only Fields: {{Bedrijfsnaam, KvK Nummer, SBI-code, Business address}}
* BTW-keuze to be changed to be clickable only once in 3 years.
!Settingspage_freelancer_ https___www.tadaah.nl_freelancer_settings_company_.png

column1: Weekplanner: assigned jobads: make it possible for all documents on freelancers profile to be downloaded not just diploma's,TDD-264,10311,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,04/Apr/23 10:36 AM,18/Oct/23 8:44 PM,,18/Oct/23 8:44 PM,,0,,,,"In the new weekplanner, organiations don’t have the same documents visible for download.

Deleting jobads option "interest based jobads" ,TDD-262,10309,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Madhav,636cf7ab96243ac755ee69a0,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,04/Apr/23 9:35 AM,01/May/23 10:37 AM,,01/May/23 10:37 AM,,0,,,,"Interest based jobads give Tadaah freelancers a lot of insecurities for their income.

The primary purpose of these jobads was to offer childcare organisations the choice to select a freelancer for an jobad themselves. This is because some childcare organisations have a particular concept, vision that they would like to see reflected in the profile of a freelancers.

*Problem*: This option is used for other purposes and this has not always benefited the freelancer. Organisations see this option as a way to avoid compensation: with this option, they currently have the freedom and opportunity to confirm a jobad very late or even decide not to react at all. There are no [restrictions.At
column2: http://restrictions.At] the same time it offers the organisations too much freedom to decide which freelancer is allowed to perform the jobad. To the extent that organisations

column1: *Business Model:*

These services create uncertainty, lots of questions, paranoia, and stress among freelancers. All in all, this results in less enthusiasm for these choice jobads and Tadaah image/reputation ultimately suffers as a result.

Our goals is to create more confidence in Tadaah and transparency on the platform. We believe that interest based jobads can easily be replaced by spoedopdrachten (wizard) by the childcare organisations.
*Goal*: Deleting the option to place interest jobads
Deleting the interest based jobads has to be tackled from both freelancer view and organisational view [https://tadaah.atlassian.net/browse/TDD-262
Acceptance Criteria:
* Organisations will see a message above page [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/jobs/place/
* Deadline 1st may no more interest based jobads visible as an option on the frontend
* Organisations can place interest jobads until jobad date performing date 30 april 2023
* Interest based logic is hidden on 1st of May
* Organisations will receive newsletter stating to remove unneccessary interest based jobads and
* all remaining interest jobads after 1st of May will be automatically changed into spoedopdracht (wizard)
Pages on the freelancer view plus screenshots are added as attachments:
* [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/jobs/place/

Limit notification to organisation to once a week after expired/unpaid invoice,TDD-254,10301,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,28/Mar/23 1:40 PM,13/Apr/23 12:17 PM,,13/Apr/23 12:17 PM,,0,,,,"Freelancers have the possibilty to send a reminder for their invoices after the payment period had expired.
They are now able to click the button “send reminder” / “herinneren” as many times as they want.
This confuses the organisations. We would like to limit the reminder button to once a week
[https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/invoice/17259/
Acceptance Criteria:
* Show msg to freelancer that reminder button can be clicked once within a week
* Reminder button “herinneren” is  a different colour button
* When attempt to send another reminder by freelancer within a week then freelancer gets a msg

Suggestion for msg: “reminders can only be sent once a week. The last reminder you sent was on {{date}} and you can send next one on {{new date}}",,ICT Tadaah,Jona Bosman,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,30/Mar/23 1:09 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2023-03-30 om 13.09.13.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10223,30/Mar/23 4:14 PM;633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1;Screenshot 2023-03-30 at 16.05.11.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10224,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@65991b05,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=2}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":2,""lastUpdated"":""2023-04-21T15:05:21.000+0200"",""stateCount"":2,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":2,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,Impediment,,,,,,,,,1
column5: *_10011_*:*_2_*:*_488434223,"30/Mar/23 4:13 PM;633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1;[~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] When an invoice is already sent, but not expired, freelancers still see a “Herinneren” button, but it remains unclickable until the invoice is expired. I think it is logical to remove this button, until the invoice is expired. They of course will see the unclickable button when they’ve already sent a reminder. Do you agree? ",,,,,,,,,,,,10094,Fast-Track / High Urgency,Done,13/Apr/23 12:17 PM

column1: Create logic to delete freelancer registration automatically after 30 days,TDD-251,10298,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,28/Mar/23 12:10 PM,23/Jun/23 1:11 PM,,23/Jun/23 1:11 PM,,0,,,,Related to the sign up flow - if freelancer doesnt complete sign up in 30 days.,,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-228,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@30f8a9be,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: Freelancers can see maximum rates for jobads in the app,WORKFLOW-81,10297,Subtaak,To Do,WORKFLOW,Minor Workflow Improvements,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,28/Mar/23 10:25 AM,02/Nov/23 11:52 AM,,,,0,,,,"*Current Situation*
The freelancers now only see whether a jobad matches their hourly rate.
For example, a freelancer who has a rate of €40 first will only see all jobads up to €40.
The effect of this ‘rule’ in our system causes  freelancers to put up their hourly rates  to be able to see the best paid jobads.
*→ Effect*: We now have lots of freelancers setting their hourly rate on €75-90 to see all available jobads.
Increasing their hourly rate to go around the system has become a problem for (new/old) organisations.
*This creates the next issue for our business model:*
When organisations see profiles of freelancers with a high hourly rate, they get second thoughts.
They don’t know that the freelancer will also be happy to accept an hourly rate of €35-45 and complains that the freelancers ask too much on Tadaah platform.
This leads to bad publicity and less jobads.
*Goal*: To stop this “game” of increasing hourly tariff to see all high paid jobads we would like to offer transparency.
We would like all maximum rates for a spcific jobad placed  by organistions to be displayed for all freelancers.
In other words: We would like all freelancers to be able to see the maximum rate an organiation is prepared to pay for a specific jobad.
Hopefully this will result in: e freelancers setting realistic hourly rates on their profiles and not scare off the organisations.
Acceptance criteria:
* Freelancers should see all jobads even if they have a lower or higher hourly rate
* Organisations hourly rate, set for a specific jobad, should be displayed in the jobad
* This hourly rate should be visible to all freelancers
* Depending on VAT status, freelancers see the max rate: either VAT exempt or VAT duty Rate for that  specific jobad.

* *App*: acceptance criteria also applies to app.",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@64306c18,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1
column2: hzzxx3:,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,10291,Make organisation rates transparent for freelancers,To Do,28/Mar/23 10:25 AM

column1: Check how to gain and give advise team access to Tile "knowledge"/Kennis" in freelancers account,TDD-249,10296,Task,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,27/Mar/23 4:48 PM,12/Jul/23 9:07 AM,,12/Jul/23 9:07 AM,,0,,,,"The freelancers used to have/see tiles in their account when they logged in. Those tiles have been replaced with links to menu items.
Tile “knowledge/kennis” disappeared but URL still exists: [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/knowledge/
(Same tile is used for organisation and the information seems identical, url link is different: [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/knowledge/
*Goal*:

Tile “Kennis” was used to provide the freelancer with information such as documents, pdf files or links.  We would like to update presented files and info information on URL: [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/knowledge/

We would like to use this tile to offer information to the freelancer. For example in the onboarding flow which will be th next step after the sign up flow. We will add video demo’s, animations, links to  subjects on Tadaah CMS pages  etc.
*Acceptance Criteria:*
# Distinguish between organisation knowledge tile and freelancer tile
# Not all information in knowledge is visible for both freelancers and organisations
# Admin/Advise team has access to Knowledge Tile of Freelancers and Organisations via staff page
# Advise Team should be able to upload items to knowledge
*Technical Goal: Explore what is needed:*
Where do we like to place the knowledge tile for freelancers ([~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41])
Create new functionality to make the knowledge tile dynamic
Making database fields
create seperate view

(future: upload might be video, not just pdf)",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@5cca5c66,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1
Maybe if needed we can add more categories but for now this will cover it: knowledge Childcare, General and Manual/guides (how to docs/videos)
Categories Organisation
* Algemeen (General)
* Kenniscentrum Kinderopvang
* Handleiding
Categories Freelancers
* Algemeen (General)
* Kenniscentrum Kinderopvang
* Handleiding",,,,,,,,,,,,,,Done,12/Jul/23 9:07 AM

Pls add text when placing job at the section of selecting certificates,TDD-236,10283,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,16/Mar/23 1:20 PM,11/Apr/23 10:52 AM,,05/Apr/23 8:00 AM,,0,,,,"This tickets is to inform organisations that selecting certificates when placing jobads will limit the number of freelancers seeing their jobads.
*Current Scenario:*
Organisations: Jobads requiring a/lots of ceritificates will be visible to a smaller group of freelancers. This may results in less jobads being fullfilled
Freelancers: See less jobads when they don;t have certificates required for a jobad
Tadaah: missed out on revenue if a jobad is not able to be seen or accepted by all freelancers.
*Goal ticket*: inform organisations in the jobads screens to “not to select certificates if it is not urgently necessary/required for that specific jobad”
Please check screenshot to see text to place on user interface/organisation:
Acceptance Criteria:
* Text: certificaten to be replaced by text “ Vereiste certificaten”
* Infobox added with text:  “ Let op! Als je hier certificaten selecteert dan beperk je het aantal freelancers die kunnen reagereren op je opdracht. Selecteer alleen wat dringend vereist is! “
* texts should be added  on: [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/wizard/
* texts should be added  on [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/jobs/place/interest/
* texts should be added  on [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/poule/
* texts should be added  on [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/period_jobs/create/
Pls find screenshot:
*text info box* “ _Let op! Als je hier certificaten selecteert dan beperk je het aantal freelancers die kunnen reageren op je opdracht. Selecteer alleen wat dringend vereist is! “_

*Replace* Certificaten → “Vereiste certificaten”",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,16/Mar/23 1:20 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;www.tadaah.nl_organisation_all job placing options.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10214,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@4be5936c,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Make jobads visible to freelancers even if they miss the certificate to accept it. - Needs UX-design,WORKFLOW-77,10282,Task,To Do,WORKFLOW,Minor Workflow Improvements,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,16/Mar/23 12:07 PM,02/Nov/23 11:52 AM,,,,0,to-refine,,,"This ticket is to make the freelancer understand that there are more jobads online but the freelancer doesn't have all required certificates or other things to accept them.
# This will create more transparency and put freelancers mind at rest (the dont feel the need to rely on Discord type of practises) Make jobads visible to freelancers when the miss certificates.
# This will encourage them to study an get certificates so they have more job prospects.
+Potential Extra jobads to be shown (to discuss with dev team) based on 3 categories:+
* *Missing certificates*, explain which certificate
* *Availability* - jobs commencing/ending earlier/later than their abailibilty for a specific day

* *Personal settings preferred competency* : for example if freelancer is allowed to work with babies “competency babygroup) but has unselected this competency because he/she doens’t want to work in a babygroup. We could still show jobad?
* *Travelling distance (and freelancer rate).*
*Acceptance criteria:*
* Freelancers will able to select in filters “relevant jobads” and non-matching jobads
* Non-matching jobads will state in different colour which requirements/options/certificates are not met
* Non-matching = Darker shade of grey
* Hovering over this darker shade of grey will show inofrmation why freelancer can’t accept jobad
* They shouldn’t be able to accept displayed non-matching criteria jobads
* Within the day: Sequence of showing search results: show matching results in prior to non-matching search results.
* Frelancers shouldn’t see jobads if they are blacklisted by the organisation
Backend:
* differentiate: relevant(matching) and non-matching
* non-matching provide a reason
* explore: [https://www.tadaah.nl/staff/visibility/
Frontend:
* Create messages per instance
* Adding filtering options
[~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] decide Dutch names for relevant jobads - non- matching jobds
Refine wih Niels:
* Possibilties to share non matching jobads

* Hover over the jobads to show description why a jobad doesnt match freelancers criteria/diploma’s/availabilitycompetences",,ICT Tadaah,Niels Rozemeijer,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,17/May/23 9:32 AM;ug:000c21e9-4191-46b8-9613-f65c4ad93239;all jobs ads - all states.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10243,17/May/23 9:32 AM;ug:000c21e9-4191-46b8-9613-f65c4ad93239;all jobs ads v1.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10242,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@6b324b0a,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1
column2: hzzwnb:,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD Sprint 14,,,,,,,,,,,,21.0,,,,,,,,2023-05-15 07:50:50.762,,"15/May/23 9:50 AM;70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2;I think I understand the scope of this ticket. It makes the platform more transparent if we show all jobs ads even if they don’t match the skillset or availability of the freelancer. That being said I’m worried about matching skillset and availability as two concepts. Skillset is something that the freelancer needs to work on and that takes time. Availability is something more fluid and relative.

column1: Let’s say I’m a freelancer and there is a shift which has a start-time 30 minutes earlier than my stated availability, I might ask my partners to bring the kids to daycare so I can accept this shift.
The other way around, when I’m a freelancer but I don’t have a certificate for an upcoming shift there is nothing in the short-term I can do to accept this shift before it starts.

I think we should differentiate between these two concepts: shifts that don’t fit someones availability but the freelancer might be able to accept it anyway and shifts that don’t fit someones skillset. The first is good for the freelancer to find more shifts, the second is good to show that there are a lot of shifts (transparency).

[~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] Does that make sense? what do you think?","17/May/23 9:32 AM;70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2;Hi [~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] [~accountid:6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302] , I’ve drafted some initial proposal. For now I’ve only looked at the mobile app, if we agree on the way forward I can easily transfer the ideas to screens for the web app as well.

The idea is that we add a filter to the filter menu. This filter will show all jobs ads even though a freelancer might not be available or be qualified (or any other reason). One the questions I have here is how this filter should work in synergy with the other filters. Does it overwrite the filter for ‘new job ads’ and ‘full day job ads’? Or does it respect the other filters?

Once the filter is enabled, the freelancer will see all job ads. Job ads that don’t fit their profile will have a little warning icon displayed along with some generic copy. If a freelancer unfolds a job ad that does not match their profile, we can use the same icon and different copy to highlight the area where the job ad doesn’t match.
!all jobs ads v1.png

Now keep in mind, that a job ad can not match a freelancer on a number of items. It could be that the job ad is to far away, the date is not available, the required competency is not met and the hourly rate is not what the freelancer is looking for (see example on bottom right)
!all jobs ads - all states.png

I don’t know how often this would happen that someone doesn’t fit the job ad on all aspects so it’s very hard for me to judge if this is to become an issue. Alternatively we could use the same approach as the top-left and use it for all individual cases but we need good copy as I don’t want it to span multiple lines.
What do you think? I’m still understanding your product so I’m sure I missed some use cases here, feel free to let me know.

One last note: I’ve worked on trying to make the design look like the current style in app. I’m not sure if this is what you prefer but I thought it would be best since the redesign is a different project?",,,,,,,,,,,,,To Do,16/Mar/23 12:07 PM

column1: [Sign Up]: Add new notifications for the new sign up flow.,TDD-228,10275,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Tanya Lyabik,557058:a45a5ea8-6f14-4f87-b402-eaead1d584b5,Tanya Lyabik,557058:a45a5ea8-6f14-4f87-b402-eaead1d584b5,13/Mar/23 1:05 PM,23/Jun/23 1:11 PM,,23/Jun/23 1:11 PM,,0,to-refine,,,"[https://miro.com/app/board/uXjVPeFDUiQ=/?share_link_id=192537185936

Notifications emails will be written by  [~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] and filed under mail notifications in Confluence,  [https://tadaah.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SD/pages/4653057/Email+notifications+sign-up+until+completion
8 notifications, 5 scenario templates:
# Confirmation of receiving all submitted documents when sign-up flow is finished and. Email should contain thanking user to finilize their submission and that advise team will verif/check documents.

# When account is created but incomplete, we send notification after: 24h, 48h, 7 days, 14 days, 28 days en 30 days. These notifications are only sent  if accound is still “incomplete”. If an account is completed the reminding notifications to complete account should stop.
# 28 days: also contains warning that account will be deleted within 48 hours
# Notification 30 days : Confirming that account is deleted
# Confirmation mail that advise team has checked submitted documents and invitation to the freelancers' welcome call. emails
Please find draft notification mails in Confluence.

To be edited together with [~accountid:633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1] during sprint 11",,Tanya Lyabik,,,,557058:a45a5ea8-6f14-4f87-b402-eaead1d584b5,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-251,,,,,,,,13/Mar/23 1:08 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2023-03-13 om 13.07.58.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10207,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@5ab3248d,,,,,"{repository={count=2, dataType=repository}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""repository"":{""overall"":{""count"":2,""lastUpdated"":""2023-06-15T13:43:15.000+0200"",""dataType"":""repository""},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":2,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: When jobad is performed by replacing freelancer, contract should show addendum,WORKFLOW-90,10272,Task,To Do,WORKFLOW,Minor Workflow Improvements,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,08/Mar/23 10:36 AM,02/Nov/23 12:39 PM,,,,0,,,,"When a freelancer accepts a job then a contract is digitally made on the backend. When this freelancer decides to send a replacing colleague then the contract should state name of replacing freelancer.
Replacement now is done with a whatsapp link.
We would like different ways to share the jobad that needs replacement.
Acceptance criteria:
* replacing freelancer can be someone within or outside tadaah community
* contact mutation after replacement stating name replacing freelancer

* different options to share “replacement request”",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@11c2e81e,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Notifications before and after of expired certificates,TDD-224,10271,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,Tanya Lyabik,557058:a45a5ea8-6f14-4f87-b402-eaead1d584b5,08/Mar/23 9:37 AM,01/May/23 10:36 AM,,01/May/23 10:36 AM,,0,to-refine,,,"* notify freelancer when certificate/document (is about) to expire (to be refined/discussed)
* Notification email to be sent to the freelancer 1 month before the expiry of the certificate
* Notification mail to be created.
* notification on the homepage screen about certifications expired
The copies for notifications you can find here:
[https://tadaah.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SD/pages/4554753

SDB API follow-up,TDD-223,10270,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,07/Mar/23 2:22 PM,29/Aug/23 10:51 AM,,28/Aug/23 10:34 AM,,0,to-refine,,,Questions Gulhan
* Jobs from the past? (we think no)
* Should we only filter status=open? (we think yes)
* Should we do something with the employee. (not in MVP we think)
* How do we deal with job-type (we need job type from SDB, and add input field)
* How to deal with selecting who to invite (invite all / invite selected) / assign to job
* Should we import all SDB jobs, or only ones that are not already assigned to an employee object? (we think only unassigned)
Questions for SDB
* What exactly is the definition of a Period? How should we consider the gaps between the periods? Can we consider it break_time?
* Can a duty (single SDB Job instance) be only for a single day? (data says only single day)
* Qualifications are always empty. What is definition here (can we map it to competences)
* In the test data all the status options are ""open"", can we have test/production data with other statuses
* How do get job type (urgent/interest) / filter
Comments dev:
* let's not overcomplicate 1.0 (MVP) > no mapping of employees or creating jobs that are already assigned on SDB side.
* No mutations at this point. Later we can decide if we want to handle mutations ourselves, or wait for a webhook.
* For v1 we won't do anything with interest list / employ

SDB is a company that has a childplanning software which many of our customers, the childcare organisations use.  One of our larger customers has asked us, a few yrs ago, for solutions to export data from the SDB software into our platform.
For example, they would like to see the gaps in their planning, chilcare locations which need freelancers and set these gaps in their planning out as jobads in Tadaah.
*Business Model:*
# SDB charges the chilcare organisation for ‘filling in gaps in their planning” and doesn’t charge Tadaah for the use of the Api
# Tadaah charges the chilcare organisation the mediation fee per hour
*API development:*  Madhav and Eike have worked together with Laurens Wormer (dev at SDB) on n API:  and there’s already an integration available. However, this project has not yet been completed.
To pick up this project I believe it’s best to begin from the very start; reviewing what we have so far and testing to see wha else we need.
*What do we have so far:*
* We have a testing account at SDB pls ask Madhav or Eike for details
* We have documentation ( is attached, needs more detail)
*GOAL* to complete and finish APi for chilcare organisations to use. Because our competitor already make use of an api with SDB and they have increased revenue by using this Api.
*Acceptance Criteria:*
# We would like Childcare organisations to be able to implement the API to enter multiple jobads from SDB planning software to Tadaah
# Freelancer planned on  a jobad derived from SDB Api will follow normal Tadaah flow”: in terms of contract (opdrachtovereenkomst), notifications, replacement, invoicing, mediation fee etc.
# GDPR agreement/AVG- verwerkersovereenkomst to be signed by the childcare organisations to use of APi.
To be discussed with organisation:
* how many days in advance we can export jobads to Tadaah
Key and URL for testing
definitions APi, what feedback does SDB want: - sdb data transfer related to mutations of status imported jobads?,
how to map freelancer: do you see freelancer data (name credentials) in planning software? Should freelancer then also be warned?
# SDB-Get-job-api (To get the jobs) - we already have this.
# 2. SDB-change-job-assign-api (To communicate job assignment/cancellation etc from tadaah to SDB.) ststus changes communicated bac to sdb
To always have accurate status: we need a webhook- to keep track of mutations, this is activated when something happens
Acceptance Criteria:
* Decision is to use API-key only for import
* Phrase as “import jobs button”
* Check legal permissions
* Show figures to SDB with jobads accepted via Tadaah (and not communicated back via API)
[https://tadaah.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SD/pages/8716289

Make it possible to manually blacklist freelancer of the platform ,TDD-200,10239,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,23/Feb/23 10:14 AM,25/Jul/23 10:19 AM,,12/Jul/23 9:07 AM,,0,,,,"Users who don’t abide by the rules are ‘removed’ or placed on inactive by Advise Team or Directors.
Reasons:
* accepting jobads but selling them on to other people who don;t have the correct dipoma’s and papers to work in childcare organisations.
* Send other people using false id’s
Organisations
Acceptance criteria:
* blocked or blacklisted users cannot registrate at Tadaah under a new username
* We save anonimised kvk-number to recognise from blacklist model
* Add button for Advise team to “blacklist” an user
* Add textbox for Advise Team to enter reason for blacklisting
* In the blacklist model the advise team member performing the blacklist is registered
* Add textbox to add info why user was blacklisted
* Send notification to the freelancer with entered reason (textbox staff) to the blacklisted user
* Create menu blacklist in admin with kvk numbers

[~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] Add Confluence pages for notification when user’s blacklisted",,ICT Tadaah,Niels Rozemeijer,Saleh Rabbaniy,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-173,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@5d4b7d72,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-06-23T11:05:44.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1
Some questions from me.
*Organisations*

I don’t see a concrete use-case for blocking Organisations here. When we blacklist an organisation, what does this mean exactly? We don’t want new organisations to be created with the same name? Or do you mean to blacklist a User from becoming an admin of an Organisation/Location?
*Freelancers*
What should be the process of blacklisting a freelancer?
Suggestion:
* In [https://stage.tadaah.nl/staff/poule/freelancers/
column2: https://stage.tadaah.nl/staff/poule/freelancers/] add another action-item in the action-dropdown: ""blacklist”

column1: * Once clicked:
** add the user to the blacklist
** ""soft-delete/deactivate” the user (i.e. don’t delete the account, but anonimse the data and keep kvk number)
* Do we want to send some notifications?","06/Apr/23 2:10 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;@ saleh, sounds like a good solution in the scenario that an advise team member blacklists an user.

How can we deal with: when a user deletes their account? Does that user (the kvk nummber) go on the blacklist automatically?","06/Apr/23 2:12 PM;6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302;Ok, then I will implement that [~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41]
To your question, no, the user will only go on the blacklist if a staff member clicks on the ""blacklist” action on that page. At the same time, the user account will be deactivated.

And how about notifications? I assume we should notify the freelancer that he has been blacklisted. Anything else missing from that journey?","06/Apr/23 2:14 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;[~accountid:6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302] As we aren’t able to create a log of deleted accounts? Can we create a pause time - say 30 days until the account is completely deleted after user clicks on button ""to delete account?

So the advise team has team to add notes (data for the blacklist reason in the created model) before the exact deletion is processed","06/Apr/23 2:28 PM;6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302;[~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] We might be confusing two things here ""blacklisting” and “freelancer deleting his own account"".
This story is strictly about the blacklisting process. As I understand it, the only way we want to blacklist a user is when a staff member does this on the poule page.
About your question if we can wait 30 days before an account is completely deleted. sure we can do that, but it’s part of another story: [https://tadaah.atlassian.net/browse/TDD-173
column3: smart-link]  Also, when it comes to a freelancer deleting his own account, do you also want this freelancer to go on the blacklist? I don’t think so right? Why should the advise team have to add a blacklist reason here?","15/May/23 9:43 AM;70121:d515905e-be36-4808-b3f3-45af7b329bd2;Hi [~accountid:6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302] [~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41],

column1: From what I understand, you would like a function for staff to blacklist freelancers from the platform. This action is to be performed by filling out a reason for blacklisting. Once they are on the blacklist, this should be displayed on their profile (for other staff to see) including why they were put on the list. Some questions:
* Should there be a function to un-blacklist the freelancer? If this is the case:
** What is to happen with the earlier blacklist-comment, should that be deleted? Or should these be communicated as status-updates?
* Should there be a notification to the freelancer that they have been put on the blacklist?
* Should the freelancer be able to appeal the blacklist?
Some screens I think I should work on:
* Freelancer page with blacklist feature (comment + button)
* Freelancer page for blacklisted user (statusupdates)
* Freelancer page for blacklisted user to unblacklist user *(if required)*
* Confirmation dialog for blacklisting and unblacklisting
* Sign-up page with error message when user is on blacklist
* Notification to blacklisted user *(if required)*
Let me know if you have any thoughts, happy to also discuss them tomorrow",,,,,,,,,Done,12/Jul/23 9:07 AM

Remove link Tadaah reserve diensten (user id),TDD-198,10232,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,22/Feb/23 12:10 PM,01/May/23 1:34 PM,,01/May/23 1:34 PM,,0,,,,"Tadaah Demo reservediensten was used to generate standy freelancers.
Organisations would rely on these freelancers when an assigned freelancer called sick/canceled jobad.
In Django admin  [https://www.tadaah.nl/admin/register/organisation/1/change/?_c
“is standby” was used to make the account “Tadaah demo reservediensten” the standby account for
This code/link “is standby “ should be removed because its not used anymore

Remove the logic for back up services and document this in confluence",,ICT Tadaah,Jona Bosman,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,08/Mar/23 11:47 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2023-03-08 om 11.47.13.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10200,28/Mar/23 12:01 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2023-03-28 om 11.52.45.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10220,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@3be0d78a,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: Improve staging environment,TDD-197,10231,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,22/Feb/23 12:09 PM,21/Nov/23 2:32 PM,,31/May/23 12:45 PM,,0,,,,"Data in staging environment seems out of date or not recent.
* Wipe out old staging
* We don’t have to remove all data
* Keep admin/document types
* Test to delete only one account at a time to see which data is deleted (cascade storage of data)
* Check manually what is removed and check what needs to be removed
* we all create dummy accounts - freelancers and organisations
* create multiple accounts by adding useraccounts  emailaddres+freelancer/organisation@tadaah.nl
* Banner on staging: “this is the staging environment”
* IN all notifications there should be a text saying: “this is a msg from staging” either in subject or in the notification
* create emailaddress info.staging@tadaah.nl
* Verify on SES
* Create dummies and share 1 master password  on Confluence

* Document generic info about staging environment on Confluence",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@c2b6ac3,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Restrict Google API Key to internal domains,TDD-193,10226,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,15/Feb/23 2:16 PM,03/May/23 10:32 AM,,03/May/23 10:32 AM,,0,to-refine,,,"We have currently 2 google API keys being used on our platform. 1 of them is exposed to the frontend, but is unrestricted (and hardcoded into the HTML Template).
# Restrict the currently-used API key to the domains [tadaah.nl
# create a new unrestricted API key to be used for development environment only
# set GOOGLE_API_KEY in settings.py to the unrestricted key in development, and to the restricted key in our Staging/Production enviornments

# use GOOGLE_API_KEY in any frontend templates instead of the currently hardcoded variant.",,Saleh Rabbaniy,,,,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@76f8208c,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-04-13T10:42:12.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Automate implications of expired certificates ,TDD-190,10223,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,14/Feb/23 11:36 AM,30/Apr/23 6:02 PM,,30/Apr/23 6:02 PM,,0,,,,"Cerificates have a validation period: they are valid until a certain date.
We would like to inform the freelancer with:
1. messages on the  [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/settings/diplomas/
column2: https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/settings/diplomas/] and by sending the same messages as mail notifications

column1: Msgs/notifications period: 30 days, 7 days, “certificate =expired
*Acceptance criteria:*
*  *Technical aspect: system needs to check for “expiring documents* daily cron job after 12 am
* Web should display messages that a certificate is about to expire on [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/settings/diplomas/
* the APP should display the same message as WEB on the home screen [https://tadaah.atlassian.net/browse/TDD-208
* The msg shown depends on the time prior to expiration, pls find 3 msg scenarios below: 30 days, 7 days, expired
* The notification mails the freelancer receives has same content  as the messages the freelancer sees on settings/homescreen (web/app):
* notification mail templates:[https://tadaah.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SD/pages/4554753
* update certificate validity in the Django: certificate is expired → so jobads related to certificate are not visible.
* Add validation period filter to the jobab
* Expired documents can be deleted
* profile of the freelancer doesn't display the certificate after the document has expired.
* freelancer isn’t able to see jobads requiring the certificate when the document is expired:
*Copies of message for setting section web/app:*
* Message scenario “Certificate is about to expire within 30 days” / Certificaat >>Certificate Name<<

certificate <name> is valid until <date> and is soon to expire. Please make sure to update this certificate before >Validation date certificate<<. Once, your certificate is expired, you will not be able to accept or perform assignments which require this document.
* Message scenario “Certificate is about to within 7 days”

certificate <name> is valid until <date> and is to expire within 7 days. Please make sure to update this certificate before >Validation date certificate<<. Once, your certificate is expired, you will not be able to accept or perform assignments which require this document.

* Message scenario “certificate is expired” : This certificate is no longer valid and not visible on your profile”",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-179,,,,,TDD-224,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@1324e24,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[APP] - jobads - only display rate for VAT/VAT exempt depending on freelancers profile,TDD-189,10222,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Dharmesh Bhalala,6389c29d77acd224b341d312,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,14/Feb/23 10:53 AM,01/May/23 11:33 AM,,01/May/23 11:33 AM,,0,,,,"Job ads should display hour rates depending on vat choice of freelancers. Make sure this is adjusted for all types of jobads
Example: On web the freelancers only see the hourrate related to their own vat choice. In the app they see both rates: vat duty/vat exempt.
Pls only show rate matching their vat choice
SCreenshots to show my profile: Vat exempt.

Screenshot App shows both rates whereas web only shows vat exempt rate",,Dharmesh Bhalala,ICT Tadaah,,,6389c29d77acd224b341d312,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,06/Mar/23 5:37 AM;ug:485834d9-faf3-4c58-b2bc-acde72ee95ea;VAT_EXEMPT(LONG_JOB).png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10196,06/Mar/23 5:37 AM;ug:485834d9-faf3-4c58-b2bc-acde72ee95ea;VAT_EXEMPT(SHORT_JOB).png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10197,14/Feb/23 10:57 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;WhatsApp Image 2023-02-14 at 10.53.48.jpeg;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10173,14/Feb/23 10:58 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;https___www.tadaah.nl_freelancer_ads_period_.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10174,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@ba004b6,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Gulhan) remove https://tadaah.nl/region/ from website,TDD-182,10202,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,07/Feb/23 9:44 AM,13/Mar/23 10:34 AM,,13/Mar/23 10:34 AM,,0,,,,"The map displayed on [https://tadaah.nl/region/
column3: smart-link]  shows freelancers where Tadaah jobads can we expected (geographically). This map seems to demotivate freelancers from other ares where there are less/no jobads to register at Tadaah. This results in less growth in business.

column1: We would like to have the region section on this URL removed.. I can see the banner from the home page here as well. The whole page can we removed if no other consequences.

Switching shifts should not be possibe if new freelancer doesnt also meet required certificates for the placed jobad,TDD-181,10201,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,06/Feb/23 5:40 PM,27/Mar/23 9:46 AM,,24/Mar/23 10:16 PM,,0,to-refine,,,"Freelancers are allowed to find replacement for a jobad they have accepted when they aren’t able to work on that day.
If a specific jobad requires a certain certificate then the freelancer replacing/switching should also have this certificate. If not the switch is not possible.
* Currently replacement is via Whatsapp link, for example: [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/job/623981/switch/68m-0d40e05aa203eff07efe/
* Please show message when freelancer can’t take over an assignment due to lack of certificates/competency.
* This ticket also applies to Mobile
[~accountid:6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d] [~accountid:6389c29d77acd224b341d312]
Msg to be shown when a freelancer can’t replace another due to insufficient certificates:
“Helaas, je beschikt niet over de vereiste certificaten voor deze opdracht. ”

Relates to Modal ticket TD 180",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,06/Feb/23 5:42 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;https___www.tadaah.nl_freelancer_jobs_all_.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10161,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@ae62c12,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: switching shifts should be renamed on the frontend: https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/jobs/all/,TDD-180,10200,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,06/Feb/23 5:35 PM,05/Apr/23 8:00 AM,,05/Apr/23 8:00 AM,,0,to-refine,,,"Switching shifts should be renamed on the frontend due to legal reasons..
Replacement rather than switch covers the correct definition.
Acceptance criteria:
* For the user interface, Button text  on “Wisselen” therefore should be renamed to “vervangen”
* When you “click on “vervangen” a pop up text should come up. Text for pop up is provided below.
* In the web, the pop up has 2 buttons:  1. to “continue/”Ga verder”  2. To read contract “Lees opdrachtovereenkomst”
* In the app, the pop up has 1 buttons:  1. to “continue/”Ga verder”
* Button 1 “Ga verder” links to share replacement request message  via Whatsapp
* Button 2 “Lees opdrachtovereenkomst”, opens the contract to tis assignment in a new tab.
* Existing Notification automails should be checked and the word “wisselen” should be replaced by “vervanger” rather than “gewisseld”. [~accountid:633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1]  could maybe pick this up.
* Scan UI freelancers/organisation for words ”gewisseld/wisselen” to be changed to “vervangen/vervanger” [~accountid:633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1] ?
* Implications also for application side (mobile developers), seperate screenshots attached
Text for Pop up when user clicks on “vervangen:
Header Pop-up: “Vervanging”

Content:  “Ik ben opdrachtnemer en laat me vervangen voor deze opdracht conform art. 4 in de opdrachtovereenkomst. Als opdrachtnemer blijf ik verantwoordelijk voor de uitvoering en financiële afhandeling van deze overeenkomst.”
>>Add Button<< “Ga verder”  (to link to Whatsapp)”
>>Add link to read “opdrachtovereenkomst”  (opens in new tab)

Pop up via MODAL?",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,21/Feb/23 1:03 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Pop up after clicking vervangen .png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10190,21/Feb/23 9:59 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2023-02-21 om 09.30.37.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10179,21/Feb/23 12:54 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;WhatsApp Image 2023-02-21 at 11.43.56.jpeg;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10189,21/Feb/23 3:30 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;WhatsApp Image 2023-02-21 at 12.49.38.jpeg;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10191,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@516b6ed1,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-07-12T08:56:25.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Gulhan]Add selectionbox "validation period required" to Document types,TDD-179,10199,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,06/Feb/23 5:04 PM,13/Mar/23 10:37 AM,,13/Mar/23 10:37 AM,,0,,,,"Some document types have a validation date/period, such as BHV and First Aid (EHBO). When that type of document expires within a freelancers profile then this competency should be cancelled.
i.e.  if someone’s first aid certificate is expired organisations should see their name displayed when they are looking for freelancer who have a first aid certificate.
Validation date is already part of  backend uploaded documents [https://www.tadaah.nl/admin/register/document/50877/change/?_changelist_filters=q%3Dbhv

-validation date is obligated and has to be still valid.

The reason they are in 2 PRs, is that the first PR has to run database migrations to remove the jobboard related models from the database. After this has run on all environments, the second PR can be merged and deployed.",,,,,,,,,,,10021,Support-Tickets,Done,27/Mar/23 9:51 AM

Freelancers shouldn't be able to remove/delete uploaded documents after verification of account,TDD-178,10197,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,06/Feb/23 12:43 PM,27/Mar/23 9:47 AM,,24/Mar/23 10:17 PM,,0,,,,"[https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/settings/diplomas/

Once a freelancer has been verified, their uploaded diploma’s, kvk uittreksel, screenshot personenregister, and certificates shouldn’t be able to be removed by themselves. All possibilities to delete these files on the frontend should be removed for the users.

These uploaded files have been checked thoroughly by the Advise Team on authenticity. Based on this check the freelancers were given access to see/accept jobads. Removing a qualifying document such as a diploma/certificate/screenshot personenregister means their account is not 100% complete and lacks evidence we need to be able to provide to organisations.
What needs to be done:

*All, and* +*only*+*, freelancers who have already been verified should have the posibilty to request an update of all uploaded documents via button ”update mijn profiel” and a remarksfield where they can summarize their request to remove/add/replace extra or new documents*.

The button: “Update my profile”  would trigger a request email/msg to be sent to the Advise Team with the notes (in the remarks field) made by the freelancer. A seperate tab/tile “profile updates” would be useful to directly have an overview of all requested updates.

! Uploaded new documents are saved but not visible on frontend until validated by Advise Team and only the Advise Team can delete files/documents from their profile.",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-232,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,06/Feb/23 2:51 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;https___www.tadaah.nl_freelancer_settings_diplomas_.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10156,06/Feb/23 2:51 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;https___www.tadaah.nl_staff_profileupdate.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10157,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@5c585a21,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-07-12T08:56:24.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Backend] - Address changes,TDD-176,10195,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Madhav,636cf7ab96243ac755ee69a0,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,02/Feb/23 12:23 PM,01/May/23 10:35 AM,,01/May/23 10:35 AM,,0,,,,"Move the address-related fields of the Freelancer to a new Address model, with a Freelancer ForeignKey to Address.
The point is that a Freelancer should be able to have multiple addresses
* Home address
* Business Address (from KVK - Readonly)
* Change API endpoints to update Address Fields
# Create model
Address()
* address_type (business address / home address)
* raw_address (charfield)
* street_name
* house_number
* house_number_extension
* postal_code
* city
* country
* geo_coordinates
2. Migrate existing Freelancer-address fields into Home Address instance
* use management commands for this
3. Adjust existing uses of Freelancer-address fields
* address creations/updates (signup flow / settings)
* changes to API
Known pages uses address fields:
* [https://tadaah.nl/freelancer/ads/all/
* {{do_geo_lookup}} in signals
* {{personal_data_percent}} & missing_freelancer_fields  in profile_checks.py
* forms
* API / serializers
* invoice_pdf.py → Business Address
* missing_freelancer_fields
Additional information about the info that is returned by the KvK-API: For the address, a list of addresses is returned, which means there could be multiple addresses.

{code:json}{""adressen"": [ { ""type"": ""bezoekadres"", ""indAfgeschermd"": ""Nee"", ""volledigAdres"": ""Abebe Bikilalaan 17 M 1034WL Amsterdam"", ""straatnaam"": ""Abebe Bikilalaan"", ""huisnummer"": 17, ""huisletter"": ""M"", ""postcode"": ""1034WL"", ""plaats"": ""Amsterdam"", ""land"": ""Nederland"" } ]}{code}
The full address is returned (“volledigAdres”), but also the components that make up this address are also returned separately.
[https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/geocoding

Keep all data when freelancer deletes account from the website.,TDD-173,10192,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,31/Jan/23 10:36 AM,25/May/23 4:34 PM,,25/May/23 4:34 PM,,0,to-refine,,,"When a user deletes their account everything, all information and data related to this user is deleted from Django.
This give a problem related to the following:
# the Tax office asks Tadaah BV to keep proof of all data that relates to sent invoices for a minimum of 7 years
# We should at least keep data from the freelancer for 2 years for audit purposes but GDPR doesnt allow us to do this.  i
*Goal*: Save all data when a user deletes their account by anonimising all related data to this user.
*Suggestion*: Keep user id instead of nameof the accountholder to keep data history in place
*Acceptance Criteria:*
* We save/store an anonimised record of data: username(?), telephone number, emailadress, diploma, jobads, organisation with all locations etc.
* A Deleted user is remembered as an user by the system after entering kvk-number
* A deleted user registrate as a new user, he/she is allowed complete  the steps of the sign-up flow
* Advise team member is alerted by kvk-recognistion that a deleted user is trying to regain access to the platform. (*Notification* needed -Advise Team)
* If a user registers again and is allowed to be verified then he/she doesnt have access to old account
* If a user registers again then system will “warn” that this new user had a previous account
* After 2 years (keep track of deletion date)diploma’s and all uploaded documents by the deleted user could be removed
* As soon as a freelancer deletes profile by pressing button settings/delete profile, useful data is encrypted and other data is deleted

* Add a textbox for Advise team to note why user was blacklisted",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,TDD-200,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@5a061e68,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: [Gulhan] Spoedticket Hertoghs Advocaten - Omzet Q4-2022  freelancers btw procedure,TDD-168,10186,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,23/Jan/23 10:15 AM,26/Jan/23 2:20 PM,,24/Jan/23 8:56 AM,,0,,,,"Om het financieel belang m.b.t. de btw procedure aan te kunnen leveren bij Hertoghs advocaten hebben we informatie van het platform nodig.
*Spoedticket:*
Momenteel doen er 77 zzp’ ers mee aan de BTW procedure. Zie bijlage voor een overzicht van deze ‘deelnemers’.
Graag willen we van elk van deze 77 zzp’ers een overzicht van de totalen over Q4-2022:
# Het totaalbedrag aan omzet (som van facturen die vanuit hun account is verstuurd) per deelnemende freelancer (te vermelden in  kolom E in de bijlage)
Omdat deze informatie elk kwartaal gecommuniceerd dient te worden aan Hertoghs is het misschien een goed idee om de totale omzet wat makkelijker te kunnen opvragen in Django.
Misschien kunnen we de deelnemende freelancers selecteren/onderscheid maken in het systeem?
[^contactoverzicht zzp btw procedure.numbers]

column1: Django doesn't allow to split a jobad into two shifts ,TDD-151,10153,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,21/Dec/22 3:20 PM,27/Mar/23 9:46 AM,,25/Mar/23 12:51 PM,,0,to-refine,,,"Organisations sometimes divide a planned jobad into 2 different jobads in case the freelancer is needed on 2 different locations. In the  Django environment we made this possible: [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/job/593476/split-shifts
Organisations aren’t able to split shifts. Please find screenshot attached.
Certificate field gives an error. Selecting a certificate seems required but you are unable to select a box.
Please make sure that:
* Selecting certificates are not required
* pls test that splitting shifts is possible after this change in the system
[https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/job/593476/split-shifts/

[Gulhan]Add filters, set limits on page https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/poule/,TDD-150,10152,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,21/Dec/22 3:06 PM,28/Feb/23 9:38 AM,,28/Feb/23 9:38 AM,,0,,,,"Page [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/poule/
column2: https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/poule/] is the page where organisations can find freelancers who have worked for their organisation before: Bekende freelancers,, translates to “familiar freelancers”. Respecting Data protection regulation, we should only display freelancers who are known/familiar to the organisation.

column1: In summary, we would like to see the following changes.
* Page Heading should be : Poule Bekende Freelancers

* Box below Header to be changed to: “Onderstaand vindt u freelancers die eerder hebben ingevallen bij uw organisatie. Let op: U maakt de meeste kans op vervulling van uw opdracht als u meerdere freelancers uitnodigt.”

* Add filter Locations: User can use a dropdown menu to find a location and see which freelancers have worked at this location before. List of locations should be displayed alphabetically and  locations should only be displayed if the user is admin of a location)

* Limit all search results to display only known freelancers :“freelancers who have worked for this user specific organisation",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,22/Dec/22 10:18 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;https___www.tadaah.nl_organisation_poule_.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10131,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@7dd86b95,,,,,"{branch={count=1, dataType=branch}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""branch"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-01-07T23:06:49.000+0100"",""dataType"":""branch""},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,Impediment,,,,,,,,,1

column1: Hi Imad,
We would like to only display/provide information about a freelancer if the freelancer has had previous assignments on the specific location at this organisation.
We dont think its necessary to make it user specific. Some locations have two or more planners/substitutes. They should be able to find a freelancer based on location.
To your recap: familiar with organisation and locations but not user/admin specific
Does this sound ok?",,,,,,,,,,,,10021,Support-Tickets,Done,28/Feb/23 9:38 AM

[Gulhan]Freelancers would like to have extra filters to filter jobads,TDD-149,10151,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,20/Dec/22 4:47 PM,05/Apr/23 8:01 AM,,05/Apr/23 8:01 AM,,0,,,,"[https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/ads/all/
Add Filter options:

* Add field Postcode when filtering on distance (postcode should be preset on the freelancer’s postcode (in their account) but the freelancer should be able to change the postcode in this field. Field should be writeable. Postcodes apply to locations (not to organisation).
* Freelancer shuld be able to look for an Organisation by name: Not  a dropdown menu but enter text to see best match according to entered text

* Add the ability to filter jobads based on compentencies. Freelancer should be able to select multiple competencies.  The list of competencies you’ll find in Django: [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/settings/competences/)

Filters should be saved for their next login session",,ICT Tadaah,Tellache Imad,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,21/Dec/22 10:07 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Add filteroptions jobads.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10129,10/Mar/23 8:25 AM;ug:2257c32d-0458-4860-a73c-59a1454031bc;exemple 2.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10203,10/Mar/23 8:25 AM;ug:2257c32d-0458-4860-a73c-59a1454031bc;exple 3.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10201,10/Mar/23 8:25 AM;ug:2257c32d-0458-4860-a73c-59a1454031bc;params.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10202,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@1904751f,,,,,{},,,,Impediment,,,,,,,,,1

column1: the new parameters are:
* *competences* : string    ex: (*baby,peuter, vve*) . the field is not required, and the competences list must contain only the freelancers competences and not all of them.
* *post_code*: string.  not required  ex *1076 SM.* by default the post code field is filled with the freelancer's postal code from (*api/freelancer*)

* *organisation*: string.  not required , freelancer enter the organisation name in an autocomplete field. then when the input length >= 4 the api call is triggered [api/autocomplete/organisations/?q=""*your query*""]. after selecting an organisation. the backend is expecting an organization ID parsed to string.
!exple 3.png
!params.png
!exemple 2.png

column1: [Gulhan]Organisations complaints: set hourly tariff changes automatically,TDD-138,10140,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,15/Dec/22 12:36 PM,13/Mar/23 10:33 AM,,13/Mar/23 10:33 AM,,0,,,,"Several organisation have reported their hourly tariffs automatically change. They havent changed it themselves.
[https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/settings/rates/
Example: SKBNM (organisation).

Their hourly rates have been changed to €30 from 14 december to 15 december without any reason. This “bug” only affects the rate for the day care centers. Company manually changes hourly rate back to 37.. This also happened  twice on 8 december. The bso rates dont show the same problem, the rates there remains at 40.00.
!image001.png

column1: ik heb gekeken naar de oorzaak:

* Er worden alle tarief instellingen van de organisaties behorend bij de huidige gebruiker/beheerder ingeladen en weergegeven op de instellingen pagina: [https://github.com/EikeDehling/tadaah/blob/master/tadaah/register/views_organisation.py

* Als bijvoorbeeld iemand beheerder is van meerdere bedrijven (bijv. een van de service medewerkers maakt zichzelf beheerder) dan kan het tarief object aan meerdere bedrijven gekoppeld raken.  Dan veranderd het tarief bij meerdere bedrijven op zo’n moment.

* In de screenshots hierboven kun je zien dat er meerdere tarieven voor VVE zijn, dat geeft inderdaad aan dat een tarief object aan de verkeerde organisatie gekoppeld is geraakt","28/Jan/23 6:51 PM;6347f8adb380bb46a091729a;Mijn suggestie om dit te herstellen:
* We zorgen dat bij opslaan de tarief instellingen nog maar aan een bedrijf gekoppeld zijn, dus nooit aan meerdere.   Dan kan dit in de toekomst niet nogmaals gebeuren.
* ",29/Jan/23 3:11 PM;6347f8adb380bb46a091729a;Pull request met bugfix: [https://github.com/EikeDehling/tadaah/pull/914

Add possibilty to add jobads with a past date,WORKFLOW-86,10121,Task,To Do,WORKFLOW,Minor Workflow Improvements,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,,,,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,06/Dec/22 5:02 PM,02/Nov/23 12:02 PM,,,,0,to-refine,,,"It happens frequently that freelancers work for organisations without a jobad placed for that specific day on the website.
We would like to make it possible for organisations to
1. add a jobad in the past and
2. to assign a freelancer to a jobad in the past.
Current situation: system gives an error if the placed jobad is not placed in the future.
Pop-up to inform/confirm jobad place in the past
(Imad: jobad is “mannually” assigned to the freelancer/freelancers doesn't see this available jobad)
Need check all places where jobads are placed or updated: how the date is validated
-wizard
-interest
-long period
-poule
*Acceptance criteria:*
# possibility to enter past date when jobad is created
# after created past jobad invoice need to be generated
# freelancers need to get an email notification
# jobad is placed in archive

# digital contract is created",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@12eacb5d,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column1: Web - Registration Process - Chamber of Commerce registration Scenario,TDD-109,10111,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,Shrey Shah,636cf7b09cde5926182a2cdc,28/Nov/22 4:11 PM,11/May/23 12:37 PM,,11/May/23 12:33 PM,,0,,,,"We have adapted the screens for the KVK screens in het sign -up flow.
1 feature is missing : Figma screens should show buttons “skip” (overslaan)  and “ next step (volgende stap)”  so user should be able to skip or continue.
Web: Follow design components of the app, dropdown info KVK contact when fetched API -info is incorrect
*Step 1* : User first enters Kvk number.
# Make sure only numbers are accepted and not other signs/letters.
# Number length validation. Kvk number exist of 8 digits
*Step 2*:  Kvk APi fetches info
scenario 1: If an entered Kvk-number doesn’t exist or is wrong then we will display error message.
scenario 2:  If entered Kvk-number exists,  KvK API is able to fetch information:
# Registered business name(s) - read only/select box
# Registered SBI code(s) - read only
# Registered business address(es) - read only/select box
It’s possible that a KvK-number is linked to multiple business names and addresses.
* in the case that there are multiple results we show a selectionbox.  A selection has to be made to be able to continue to the next page.
* in case there is 1 result, the result is show “read only”
* all sbi-codes will always be saved and are always read only.
Acceptance criteria:
* User is able to enter Kvk number and the APi fetches business related information
* When only one result for business adress or business name the those are automatically selected.
* When multiple results are fetched, the user can select from one  address and one business name
* Selected business Name is used on the business profile settings of the freelancer: [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/settings/company/
* Business Address field to be added to [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelancer/settings/company/
* Selected business address and business name is to be shown on the invoices the freelancers send to childcare organisations, currently home address is being used for invoicing. This needs to change
* User should be able to skip or continue throughout Kvk screens, for example if fetched info is incorrrect or when user doesnt have a kvk-number yet. This need to be added to the designs.
* When user choses to skip after a “ API fetch” we dont have to save information.
* User is allowed limited API calls per minute and is shown error msg when 3 calls a minute is exceeded plus a 5-minute waiting time.
* All Kvk-Screens include information  “Klopt je bedrijfsinformatie niet?”
* Error messages are shown when filled-in information is incorrect,  API-fetch has failed, has no results or when entry was incorrect.
Which error messages does the API fetch. Find here below the message translated, to be displayed to user:
[~accountid:633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1] [~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41]
Please find adapted KvK flow screens via link here:
*  for Mobile : [https://www.figma.com/file/6HV64Kzj8lchKXTzZ89Ydw/Aanmeldingsflow-2.0?node-id=2933%3A41277&t=J1DVK6d18fawySTg-0
* for Web: [https://www.figma.com/file/6HV64Kzj8lchKXTzZ89Ydw/Aanmeldingsflow-2.0?node-id=2933%3A41277&t=J1DVK6d18fawySTg-0

column1: [App] Signup Complete (Submit Application),TDD-96,10098,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,,,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,24/Nov/22 10:18 AM,16/Feb/23 12:27 PM,,16/Feb/23 12:27 PM,,0,App-Frontend,,,"When all documents are uploaded, signup is complete.

user submits application click on bar “aanmelding indienen” (--> receives a confirmation email “ thanks for you application, your documents will be reviewed.., they will receive an invitation to attend a welcome meeting for  new freelancers”)

[App] Mobile - Home Page,TDD-91,10093,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Dharmesh Bhalala,6389c29d77acd224b341d312,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,23/Nov/22 8:21 PM,19/Jan/23 11:44 AM,,19/Jan/23 11:44 AM,,0,App-Frontend,,,"Registered new user will always see this pas as their home page, each time they log in,  until registration is completed.
The registration is divided into 4 segments (25% progress each).
Under the title of the page , the next segment is also “announced”
This pages shows what the user has  completed or still to do.

Clicking on an arrow will take you to the part where you have to enter details/upload for that segment documents or user can click “ga verder” to go to the missing information pages ",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,23/Nov/22 8:22 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2022-11-23 om 20.20.02.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10077,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@6ad5405,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Gulhan] Remove all content on user interface & Django related to becoming a top pedagogisch professional,TDD-88,10090,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,23/Nov/22 7:38 PM,02/Feb/23 12:00 PM,,02/Feb/23 12:00 PM,,0,App-Frontend,Web-Frontend,,"Remove all content in both Django as in User interface (freelancers). [https://www.tadaah.nl/freelance/
Tadaah tried to motivate Freelancers by challenging with 3 terms to become a top freelancer which would enable them to see jobads prior to others (who aren’t tp professionals).
* only one cancellation
* a personal invitation for a jobad
* a positive review
We would like to remove this concept and its content entirely.
Check thoroughly where top pedagogisch medewerker is referenced.
[https://www.tadaah.nl/freelance/
column8: *_10012_*:*_1_*:*_1981468405,27/Nov/22 1:50 PM;6347f8adb380bb46a091729a;[~accountid:609bc80e2614ec006846100b] dit is een belangrijke functie in het platform om professionals te informeren.  Ik begrijp niet waarom we dat zouden verwijderen?  Ik heb deze uit de sprint verwijderd en geblokkeerd gezet.,"01/Dec/22 1:05 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;[~accountid:6347f8adb380bb46a091729a] Freelancers zijn bang dat ze jobads niet zien omdat ze niet top professional” zijn. We ontvangen dagelijks mails waarin freelancers zichzelf vergelijken met anderen die geen top professional zijn maar dat de anderen wel alle meldingen eerder ontvangen.

column1: Kunnen wij die belofte überhaupt  nakomen? Dat top professionals alle meldingen van opdrachten al eerste ontvangen? Een algemener issue is nl. dat Freelancers   en organisaties aangeven dat meldingen niet aankomen.
Daarnaast heeft het adviesteam beaamd dat dit alleen voor onrust zorgt onder de freelancers.

Ik zal komende maandag hier nogmaals met ze over gaan overleggen om een officieel “go ahead” van ze te krijgen.","01/Dec/22 6:37 PM;6347f8adb380bb46a091729a;Bedankt voor de uitleg, dat goed om te weten.  Ik denk dat de betere oplossing is om de tekst aan te passen zodat het duidelijker is.
Wat de bedoeling is, dat men zich realiseerd dat betrouwbaarheid en kwalitatief goed werk gewaardeerd worden.
Ik denk dat je met advies team beter kan overleggen, hoe de communicatie te verbeteren.

,20/Dec/22 10:59 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;[~accountid:6347f8adb380bb46a091729a] Would like to run this story  ,,,,,,,,,,,Done,02/Feb/23 12:00 PM
[Gulhan] Unable to Invite favorite freelancers when placing a job ad,TDD-87,10089,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,23/Nov/22 4:55 PM,22/Dec/22 9:43 AM,,22/Dec/22 9:43 AM,,0,,,,Organisation tries to invite favorite freelancer for a jobad but can’t “click”.
