See screenshot as an example

Please check if “inviting favorites” is working correctly.",,ICT Tadaah,Tellache Imad,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,23/Nov/22 5:04 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;https___www.tadaah.nl_admin_register_organisation_1_change___changelist_filters=q%3Dreserve.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10069,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@1eb066b7,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1
column4: *_10013_*:*_1_*:*_932372420,"04/Dec/22 12:06 PM;6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d;[~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41]  I’ve noticed this issue when I was working on certificates. this problem is resolved. Now the Invite button is enabled when there are favorite freelancers that meet the job criteria (certificates, competencies, availability…etc)",,,,,,,,,,,,,,Done,22/Dec/22 9:43 AM

column1: [Gulhan] Data request by managers,TDD-85,10087,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,23/Nov/22 2:34 PM,30/Nov/22 7:03 PM,,29/Nov/22 9:40 AM,,0,,,,"We require the following datasets per year, over the years: 2020/2021/2022
* number of active freelancers on our platform within a periode of a year
* number of inactive (no jobs taken) freelancers on our platform within a period of a year
* Average hours freelanced per week
* Average invoiced tariff (divide VAT liable/VAT exempt) - check invoices
* Average job ad tariff (that would be their maximum tariff)  placed by the organisations
* Average freelancer's tariff throughout a year, is this tariff stable?
* Geographical spread of all freelancers (please use map to display), i.e. [https://www.tadaah.nl/staff/map/poule/

* Number of cancelled job ads within a year over the total number of completed jobs. Please use data in the situation where a freelancer was already planned. Is there a possibilty to find out when the cancellations have taken place?
* We would like to know whether the cancellation (see bulletpoint above) took place:
-cancellations more than 24 hours prior to job starttime

-cancellations within 24 hours to job starttime",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@5262e2f5,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[Gulhan] Add "free parking" selection box as a field to locations and job ads,TDD-84,10086,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,23/Nov/22 1:10 PM,22/Dec/22 9:43 AM,,22/Dec/22 9:43 AM,,0,,,,"Freelancers would like to know whether free parking is a possibilty when they accept an assignment, this should be visible in the jobad as well
Add checkbox “free parking” to locations: [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/settings/locations/
Add checkbox “free parking” to all 4 job ad options at : [https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/jobs/place/

Checkbox is not to filled in obligatory by organisations",,ICT Tadaah,Tellache Imad,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,23/Nov/22 1:16 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2022-11-23 om 13.11.20.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10068,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@6d2c906f,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1
column7: *_10013_*:*_1_*:*_1190349132,"04/Dec/22 12:16 PM;6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d;[~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41]  I think this information is important for freelancers. column1: [App] should insist on updating the app before logging in when there's a new release,TDD-83,10085,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Dharmesh Bhalala,6389c29d77acd224b341d312,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,23/Nov/22 10:11 AM,01/May/23 11:33 AM,,01/May/23 11:33 AM,,0,,,,"Tadaah app users complain they can’t log in or use functionalities after a new release.We dont want to indivually respond to complaints/questions of these users. We now ask them to update the app to see if the problem persists.

We would like the app to notify the user that they have to update the app in Apple Store/Google Play Store, and the app should redirect them to one of these two. Then we can eliminiate the possibilty that ‘not updating the new version of the app’ is the reason of their problem and solve (if necessary) the real problem.",,ICT Tadaah,Saleh Rabbaniy,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,23/Nov/22 10:23 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Screenshot App store_Tadah app update.jpeg;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10063,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@225b1fd2,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

[App] Password Forgot & Reset,TDD-77,10079,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,22/Nov/22 10:05 AM,19/Jan/23 11:43 AM,,19/Jan/23 11:43 AM,,0,App-Frontend,,,"Screens:
* Wachtwoord Vergeten (Forgot Password)
* Wachtwoord Resetten (Reset Password)

In this case the registered Emailaddress is asked, then filled in an via a button a link is sent to the registered emailaddress to change the previous known password. User changes password and is then automatically logged into their account without a step to having to log in with the new password

This frame seems to be straightforward to me.",,Jona Bosman,Saleh Rabbaniy,,,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,22/Nov/22 10:32 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2022-11-22 om 10.32.27.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10062,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@67387f27,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1
column6: *_10013_*:*_1_*:*_1106453355,"06/Dec/22 3:21 PM;633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1;Updated the Forgot Password page, but the link to reset your password directs to the website now, even if you open the link on your phone. When you are logged in, there is a settings option to change your password, but this is a different function, since you need to know your password to change it.

column1: Suggestion:

We could look into the possibilities to click the reset password link and then be redirected to the app (if you have it installed). But this will take some time and is not related to the new sign-up flow, so I would say we can pick this up later, in a different EPIC.",,,,,,,,,,,,10074,App - Sign-Up Flow,Done,19/Jan/23 11:43 AM

column2: width=551,height=89!","06/Dec/22 9:33 AM;6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302;* As discussed in a call on Monday 5 December with Gulhan and Eike, most of this functionality seems to be already covered by the new week planner, which should replace this Archive feature anyway.

column3: *_10009_*:*_1_*:*_0,"18/Nov/22 7:46 AM;6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d;Good morning [~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] there is no bug in this case, ie: the freelancer has an assignment from 08:30 to 09:00 but she is considered available from 09:00 (after she completes her assignment at 09:00).

column1: this is the reason why she can see available jobs for that day, but she can’t see any job where the duration overlaps with her first assignment.",,,,,,,,,,,,10025,Bugs,Done,18/Nov/22 8:09 AM

column1: [Gulhan] Clear interest list when one freelancer is assigned to interest jobad,TDD-46,10048,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,08/Nov/22 3:01 PM,30/Jan/23 1:58 PM,,30/Jan/23 1:58 PM,,0,,,,"Organisations choose one freelancer for an interest jobad out of a list of interested freelancers.
Other ‘not-chosen freelancers’ receive an email stating they are not chosen.
I would like the non-assigned freelancers  not be visible anymore to the organisation anymore.  The list of not assigned freelancers should be cleared as soon as the jobad is assigned
Investigate whether the jobad is still open when someone cancels, whether the freelancers can still show interest.
(imad) reset interst list and keep jobad open.
!Schermafbeelding 2022-11-08 om 10.29.47.png
column7: *_10010_*:*_1_*:*_141133905,"07/Jan/23 3:34 PM;6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d;[~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41]  I added the necessary changes to clear the interested freelancers list just after the job is assigned.

column1: I made few tests to validate the changes and I noticed that if the freelancer cancels the job, the job becomes available one more time with an empty interested list which means that all freelancers might be able to apply to it including those who have received email (saying that the job is no longer available) .
can this confuse them?

maybe we can adjust the email content by adding this detail for example: “if the chosen freelancer cancels the job, you would be able to apply to that job again?”","09/Jan/23 3:10 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;[~accountid:6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d] Good question and good solution!

Freelancer list should indeed be cleared when a freelancers is assigned. If that freelancer cancels the jobad then the jobad should be available again. It might indeed lead to confusion therefore I agree we mention (in the emails sent to the freelancers who aren’t chosen/job is unavailable) that the jobad will become available if the chosen freelancer cancels/rejects the jobad.
Do you know which specific automail we will have to adjust?
","09/Jan/23 8:31 PM;6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d;[~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] I believe this is the email we are looking for
*De onderstaande opdracht is helaas bevestigd door de opdrachtgever aan een andere professional.*
*Wij herinneren je graag dat je voor meerdere opdrachten interesse kan doorgeven per dag*!","10/Jan/23 3:05 PM;6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d;[~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41]

Make the term '..verzekering' one consistent term across the website,TDD-36,10038,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,07/Nov/22 11:48 AM,24/Nov/22 1:30 PM,,10/Nov/22 1:49 PM,,0,,,,"* +aansprakelijkheidsverzekering+
* +zakelijke aansprakelijkheidsverzekering+
* +bedrijfsaansprakelijkheidsverzekering+
* +beroepsaansprakelijkheidsverzekering+
Beste Heer, mevrouw,
Ik ben bezig met het inschrijven op jullie website maar ondanks de handleiding blijft mij nog iets onduidelijk en dat is welke verzekering jullie nou precies van mij willen.
Bij het uploaden van de verzekeringsbewijs staat vermeld ‘+zakelijke aansprakelijkheidsverzekering’+.
Onder het kopje ‘freelancen en zzp’ vermelden jullie dat een kvk inschrijving nodig is voor een ‘+bedrijfsaansprakelijkheidsverzekering+.

Maar vervolgens staat in de handleiding onder kopje ‘benodigde documenten’ Polisblad van je +beroepsaansprakelijkheidsverzekering+ en vervolgens alleen +aansprakelijkheidsverzekering+ en daarna bij het voorbeeld van documenten staat als kopje ‘voorbeeld van een scherp en leesbaar polisblad van een +Beroepsaansprakelijkheidsverzekering+ en via Tadaah moet je ten alle tijden een +aansprakelijkheidsverzekering+ hebben. Maar het document zelf betreft een +bedrijfsaansprakelijkheidsverzekering+.

Nu weet ik echt wel wat een zakelijke/bedrijfs aansprakelijkheidsverzekering is, maar een beroepsaansprakelijkheidsverzekering is toch wel degelijk iets heel anders. Een bedrijfsaansprakelijkheidverzekering dekt namelijk schade welke tijdens werktijd wordt veroorzaakt, denk hierbij aan het omgooien van een bloempot. Een beroepsaansprakelijkheidsverzekering dekt de schade die door foutief handelen tijdens het werk wordt veroorzaakt, denk aan het laten vallen van een kind.
Bovendien wordt de verwarring nog groter doordat in de volksmond onder een aansprakelijkheidsverzekering een prive aansprakelijkheidsverzekering wordt verstaan.

Derhalve wil ik jullie verzoeken duidelijkheid te verschaffen over welke verzekering jullie vanuit Tadaah nu werkelijk bedoelen. Tevens zou ik jullie willen adviseren op jullie website een eenduidige benoeming van de daadwerkelijk bedoelde verzekering te vermelden in plaats van deze met 4 verschillende termen te benoemen.
Afwachtend uw reactie,
Met vriendelijke groeten,

Jeritza Almary",,Saleh Rabbaniy,,,,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@49002fc8,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

column6: *_10013_*:*_1_*:*_693915036,"01/Dec/22 4:25 PM;6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302;* Is the requirement only to remove okido as an option for NEW jobads?

column1: * I assume by Tariff we mean the Rate Rules?
* What to do with existing JobAds with ‘okido’ competence?

* If freelancers currently have an okido competence, should we remove this from the database?","01/Dec/22 5:16 PM;6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302;* Removed “okido” from COMPETENCE_CHOICES > this means that it can no longer be selected as a competence choice for any new JobAds, or as competence choice for freelancers.
* Added management command ""delete_old_competences"", which removes okido from competence list of Freelancers
* Did not remove everything related to okido, due to possibly breaking Invoices for existing JobAds with okido competence
Remaining items:

jobs.count = 527 jobs for these organisations this week.
hypotheses:
Freelancer object kan niet verwijderd zijn, want is one-to-one link
# user object is deleted
# user is geen freelancer meer > freelancer object deleted

# user is nooit freelancer geweest, maar is van type admin of organisatie.","07/Nov/22 1:51 PM;6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302;<JobAd: JobAd 537561 - Smallsteps - 2022-11-14 (open=False, invited=1, rejected=0, assigned=Jacky Bonnet)>
user Jacky Bonnet is geen freelancer (meer), waardoor er een error komt in de export

Simpele oplossing is in de export een extra check of een user ook een freelancer attribuut heeft met if hasattr(job.assigned_to, 'freelancer') alleen hiermee los je denk ik het echte probleem niet op. Want dan staat assigned_to op None, terwijl er wel degelijk een freelancer gewerkt heeft.

Volgens mij zou het freelance object niet verwijderbaar moeten zijn, en in plaats hiervan een active flag, waardoor je de informatie van de freelancer altijd houdt (in JobAd, Invoice, etc.)",,,,,,,,,,,10025,Bugs,Done,10/Nov/22 1:49 PM

[Gulhan]As a Freelancer, I don't want an organization to lower the hourly rate after I have already accepted the Job Ad for a spoed dienst.,TDD-3,10023,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Tellache Imad,6342985e53df3c01231f3f5d,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,01/Nov/22 2:33 PM,28/Feb/23 9:38 AM,,28/Feb/23 9:38 AM,,0,,,,"Organisation aren’t allowed to lower the agreed tariffs in already planned job ads (wizard)
Changing houly tariff shouldnt be possible (lowered). If lower tariff is wanted then a new job ad should be created. Changing to higher hourly tariff is possible
[https://www.tadaah.nl/organisation/wizard/

[Freelancer] Remove all content related to Trial period,TDD-13,10016,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Highest,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,19/Oct/22 4:03 PM,08/Dec/22 10:05 AM,,08/Dec/22 10:05 AM,,0,Backend,,,"We would like everything related to a trial period (freelancers) to be removed from the freelancers interface as we have consulted legal parties, and were advised not to use this terminology as the term “trial period” could cause confusion, i.e. Tadaah being a employer rather than a platform.

As a platform we aren’t allowed to add rules/regulationsother than opening it up for everyone who has the needed qualifications to perform jobs/assignments at childcare (their approved competenties by our advisory team/helpdesk).
Is it possible to clear all freelancers from their trialperiods?

We might be able to use this ‘ready to use technical functionality’ in the future for other ends.",,ICT Tadaah,Jona Bosman,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@566da20,,,,,{},,,,,,,,,,,,,1

Add  Dutch language 3F selection box to a document type ,TDD-16,10013,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Lowest,Done,Jona Bosman,633ff6fe2eaaa5dcfa178eb1,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,19/Oct/22 1:39 PM,25/May/23 4:17 PM,,25/May/23 4:17 PM,,0,to-refine,,,"h1. Add selectionbox Taaleis 3F (Certificaat) to all document types

“Taaleis 3F” is an indication of your command of the Dutch language.  Some competences, such as VVE (preschool education), require the competency via a certificate “taaleis 3F” along with different courses.
“Taaleis 3F” is one of the document types in Django.
*How can a freelancer obtain the competency that gives the Taleis 3F?*
# You can obtain this language diploma by either entering special language courses +OR+

# an obtained higher education diplomas give you the competence of the 3F Taalvaardigheid For example, with a university degree you will automatically have obtained the competence “Taaleis 3F”. For example, a freelancer with an HBO or Bachelor degree will automatically have a Taaleis degree 3F

*Currently situation:* our advise team verifies the university degree as the diploma and then adds a copy off that diploma as document type “Taaleis 3F” in the freelancers profile. This shouldn’t be necassary.
*Acceptance Criteria:*

* We would like to be able to register, per entered document type, whether that document gives you the competence of “Taaleis 3F (which is also a document type : [https://www.tadaah.nl/admin/register/documenttype/441/change/?_changelist_filters=q%3Dtaal
* Diplomas/degrees that give Taaleis 3F competence should be linked to document type “Taaleis 3F”
* Adding a diploma that gives you the competence Taaleis 3F automatically means the freelancer profile is updated with the Taaleis
* Profile of the freelancer should show Taaleis 3F competence.
[~accountid:6332d801409249995ee9cc41] provide a list of which diploma’s give taaleis competence HBO, WO and when MBO-4.

make sure all diploma types are all correctly filled in",,ICT Tadaah,,,,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,07/Nov/22 4:06 PM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;LANGUAGE 3F selectionbox added to admin_register_Documents.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10038,10/Jan/23 10:42 AM;6332d801409249995ee9cc41;Schermafbeelding 2023-01-10 om 10.41.54.png;https://tadaah.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachment/content/10137,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@2811ee27,,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2023-05-16T10:53:43.000+0200"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""dataType"":""pullrequest"",""open"":false},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",,,,,,,,,,,,,1

In some cases, it is possible to assign a Freelancer to a JobAd twice.,TDD-27,10010,Bug,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Highest,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,17/Oct/22 2:17 PM,01/Dec/22 10:45 AM,,01/Dec/22 10:45 AM,,0,,,,"* When assigning a Freelancer to a Job, it once happened that the Freelancer was assigned to the Job twice, creating 2 identical JobAds. It seems that this happend within seconds. There is a restriction on assigning Freelancers on Jobs when they are already assigned to a Job with overlapping times, but these restrictions seem to have been ignored in this case.
* Reproduction needed first, because there is only one report of this issue
Explanation in Dutch:
Hi Jona,

Dit hebben we samen getest.. Het is mogelijk om een een freelancer 2x op dezelfde dag/tijdstip in te plannen bij direct toewijzen van een opdracht. Mogelijk moet je nog meer test doen om erachter te komen wat er nog meer bij komt kijken? Bijvoorbeeld kan een organisatie iemand direct toewijzen als deze niet beschikbaar is voor die betreffende dag?
Het voorbeeld dat we hebben getest heb ik hieronder staan:
Beide opdrachten zijn binnen een minuut  toegewezen  aan Chaimae,
!Schermafbeelding 2022-10-13 om 12.51.19.png
!Schermafbeelding 2022-10-13 om 12.03.41.png
!Schermafbeelding 2022-10-13 om 12.50.21.png
column7: *_10011_*:*_1_*:*_669426432,"23/Nov/22 3:27 PM;6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302;Manually checking, we confirmed that it is possible for a freelancer to be assigned to multiple jobs at the sime time.

column1: Jumping into the code, we can see that in some views, the UI explcitly forbids organisations from assigning freelancers if they already have a job. But not always.

To prevent this behavior consistently and explicitly, I applied a restriction on Model level in JobAd.clean() that raises a ValidationError if the assigned freelancer already has an overlapping job assigned.
Since full_clean() and clean() are not automatically called upon every model save, I added self.full_clean() to the save() method.
After implementing the change, around 50 tests failed. This is due to these reasons:
# A fixture (invoice_data_tests.json test data) itself already had multiple overlapping jobs and most tests were using this fixture
# many tests create random Jobs and assign random Freelancers, without taking into account that freelancers shouldn’t have overlapping jobs
# due to adding full_clean() to JobAd.save(), many jobs created during tests failed because fields such as ‘competence’ are not allowed to be null. This was the case for other fields as well.
The pull request includes fixes to the test data and tests.
[https://github.com/EikeDehling/tadaah/pull/839

,,,,,,,,,,,,10021,Support-Tickets,Done,01/Dec/22 10:45 AM

column1: Create an overview of organisations/locations/admins ,TDD-22,10006,Story,Done,TDD,Tadaah Development,software,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,,Medium,Done,Saleh Rabbaniy,6360f4b61db4d2ebcf64e302,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,ICT Tadaah,6332d801409249995ee9cc41,11/Oct/22 9:50 AM,17/Nov/22 12:55 PM,,16/Nov/22 4:54 PM,,0,,,,"Aim: To show in an overview the locations within an organisation, a user (planner) is added as an admin (organisation)

Problem: Job planners call helpdesk to ask why they can’t place a job add for a specific location. Most of the time, they are not an admin for that location and that is the reason why they can’t place a jobad.
General:
Organisations have a one or more accounts within Tadaah: [https://www.tadaah.nl/admin/register/organisation/
Each organisation account has  1 or more admins (users with a organisation signup) able to sign in and add job ads. I will call them the “job planners”
These job planners are responsible for placing job ads  ONLY for selected locations within their company, screenshot below:
!Schermafbeelding 2022-10-11 om 09.52.49.png

I chose this example because, For example, the admin ‘beheer oproep’ in this screenshot is or should be allocated as admin to all locations of this organisation. That admin records all 'job ads” for their finances.
Option 1: To add a list of lorgansations and locations on the page: [https://www.tadaah.nl/admin/auth/user/
!Schermafbeelding 2022-10-11 om 10.13.34.png
Option 2 (easier):
To add a search option  for users at:  [https://www.tadaah.nl/admin/register/location/
!Schermafbeelding 2022-10-11 om 10.15.14.png
